hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Disappointing
desc: Arrived at 6.30pm after 13hr flight from UK and room not ready! Supplied free drinks and snacks, but just wanted shower and sleep. Staff all very friendly, but feels as though they need more people working there. Breakfast room bit of a disaster with dirty plates around and only paper cups for hot drinks. Housekeeping didn’t come until 5pm next day when we’d just got back from day out. Overall, a good location but a disappointing experience and not what we’ve experienced from other hotels in this chain on other visits to Singapore.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great location
desc: Arrived middle of the night but room was ready for us. Check-in was smooth and easy. Took a family room so it was relatively large. This time it was on the opposite end of the corridor, facing towards the city rather than Parkway Parade. Could see the pool from the room. Had two huge queen beds. Empty bar fridge, which is good. However, the smart phone was no longer there. Seems like they no longer provide this. Supermarket right below the hotel, so easy to get stuff. Would stay again if in Singapore for a short trip.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: My stay at the Village hotel Katong
desc: I love the room with bathtub and the peranakan style. Simply amazing And comfortable. Will definitely go back for staycation soon. However, one thing I am not secure about is the room door, I feel there is a need to install a door latch for security reasons.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Mt les fraser
desc: This is the second time we have stayed at this hotel stayed in the club room which was very nice club facilities are quite good Wendy from the club room is a real gem she looked after us perfectly the only complaint that we have is On their monitor They display when you book club room you can have 4 pm check out however when I went to Receotion they said no only if you book direct with the hotel which I find quite discriminative however after much to-ing and fro-ingI was able to check out at 4 pm apart from that we enjoyed the hotel

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Really bad experience
desc: We booked a superior double room 3 months before, specifying that it was our honeymoon. We arrived and they told us that they only had a twin room with separate beds because the double rooms were all already taken. We insisted showing our booking for a double room, they tried to sell us an “upgrade” to a deluxe double room for 140$ more (plus taxes) per night! I couldn’t believe how they were trying to scam us and ruin our honeymoon, I got really upset and after a while they said they would upgrade us to this “deluxe” room for free. Well, if that was a “deluxe” room then I must be Santa Claus, the room was old, stinking of humidity and with cheap motel-style, broken furnitures (look pictures down). The “king-size” bed were just two single beds put next to each other (again look

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Another great visit
desc: We have stayed numerous times before and this visit did not disappoint. We were particularly pleased that we were allowed a late check-out as our flight was after midnight. This meant that we could stay in the hotel until the last shuttle, which was most helpful.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Value for money and fantastic service
desc: We had a wonderful stay in this hotel for 4 nights in Dec. The service provided from front desk to room ...was simply good and fast, and the staffs are friendly and helpful. Room was clean and spacious. Located in a strategic place and plenty of local foods to try out nearby. Value for money. Our stay here was a memorable one. We would like to thank Sankar from housekeeping for recommending us this hotel. It's because of him that we decided to stay in this fantastic hotel. Another thank you note to Sankar and team for keeping our room clean and tidy. We will definitely come back to this hotel the next time we visit Singapore.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Bad Experience
desc: We were 29 pax. 7 families. Had booked 8 rooms. Cockroaches and mosquitos in our rooms. Shower water overflowed into the entire room. No proper drainage. Had to shift/ change the rooms. Overall average hotel.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Singapore Driving trip Dec 2019
desc: Spacious room and overall cleanliness maintain at high quality. Value for money and complimentary car parking is a plus for those driving to Singapore. Strategy location at Katong area with varieties of food outlet nearby.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Everything ok
desc: Everything was fine about the room (nothing wow, but ok). A lot of roadworks on the road near reception, but if wanting to walk round the area the road at the rear of the hotel is best. Would stay again if for 1 night.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Lovely place and Great value for money
desc: Hotel was having a year end promotion and gave excellent value for money. While not at city center, it is only 20 minute ride away. Lovely peranakan decorative in lobby and room was spacious, clean and comfortable.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice hotel
desc: Good place to relax and unwind. Even though my check-in was delayed as the room was not ready, the hotel was kind enough to offer a late check-out and also to wait in the club room while the room was being made up.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent Hotel
desc: Excellent hotel. Our room was beautiful. We only stayed one night but I would have liked to stay longer The bed was comfortable. It felt like a 5 star but at such a great price. Definitely recommend this hotel if you are travelling to Singapore

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: A tried and trusted Hotel on Singapore's East Coast
desc: Village Hotel is the new name for the original Paramount Hotel on East Coast Road, Katong, Singapore. The new style is Pernakan and is extremely well done in all respects. Rooms are spacious and all have a balcony which is rare in Singapore Hotels.. Facilities are excellent - a well equipped 24 Hour Gym, and adjacent Pool. Location is in the heart of the bust Marine Parade shopping complex. THe Marine Parade MRT subway station is currently under construction, so there is ongoing resultant noise. But definitely bearable as the finished product will be superb.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Spacious rooms, hotel concierge provides outstanding service
desc: This hotel is located in the heartland of Singapore. The hotel provides wonderful service - high-speed wifi I happened to have a call from work all across the globe. I have to say it's amazing. Also, I need cab service on a daily basis and when I reveal my travel plans to the concierge, they were extremely helpful. I remembered having a hard time getting back to the hotel late in the night of CNY. They arranged for a cab to pick me up from where I was and sent me back to the hotel. There's a courtesy shuttle that leaves the hotel every hour at 8:00 a.m. So if you want to visit JEWEL in the morning, take advantage of that. The rooms are all spacious and the daily room service is wonderful. I even asked for a change of bed sheets every day- disposable provided on a daily basis.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Comfortable Stay
desc: Not too far away from the airport. Taking a bus also can reach the hotel. There are many bars and restaurants near the hotel. The swimming pool is quite nice especially in the morning. The room in level 8 is quiet and comfortable.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Pleasant stay
desc: Checked in to Club room for 2 nites on 28 Jan for a staycation... Good choice for my 60th year getaway as the room was very clean and spacious and personally liked the welcome note! Had a late dinner at Katong kitchen within the hotel. The food were delicious and surprisingly very good comparatively. Ordered fish and chips, roasted chicken and ribeye grass fed hor fun. Most importantly, staff were attentive and cheerful tho near to closing hours. Well done guys and to the chef- cheers!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice room but room for improvement
desc: Room presents nicely and had a balcony view but it was locked and not possible to go out. Reception staff not as helpful and welcoming as we have experienced before in Singapore but the cleaning staff always had a friendly hello. The local neighborhood is interesting but the hotel itself is a bit far from city centre and public transport. It would be good if the hotel supplied a little map of how to get to the bus stop and which numbers go to the city centre. Breakfast offering was quite large but food quality was very average - flat noodles in a pool of oil, cold hash browns, over ripe warm cut fruit. They did have a fresh egg making service though which was good. Room service arrived with plastic wrap on top which was not very appealing. The food was ok however a bit cool -

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Stay At Village Hotel
desc: It was a breeze check in and check-out. Excellent Service and great location. Having 2 supermarkets and a shopping center a stone throw away made it a bonus. The rooms were spacious and the breakfast buffet was a nice spread with local and Western fare on offer. Will definitely be staying here again.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: The room attendant in the hotel is very good
desc: The room attendant in the hotel is very good, Name Mr Wei Kang. He is very professional and diligent. The room is about several hundred meters away from the sea and about 10 minutes' walk. The windows in the south are better, and those in the north are wetter. The hotel is some distance from the subway station. It's suitable for people taking a taxi. It is also suitable for buses.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great experience, will be back
desc: Had my company's annual 3 days kickoff meeting at Village Hotel Katong earlier this month and was very pleased with the service and facilities. Would like to especially thank Four Wong, our event coordinator for his excellent services in ensuring that everything goes smoothly. Thank you Four!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Friendly hotel guest officer and the room is big and spacious!
desc: Book the room thru agoda and i was given a choice between smoking or non smoking room. I chose a smoking room but when I arrived , I was told by the front desk officer that the whole hotel is a non smoking hotel and there is no connecting room as we were two colleagues traveling together.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Super location
desc: I really enjoyed staying here. The shuttle service from and to the airport was super efficient. My room and its cleanliness and view was also excellent - as were the gym, sauna and swimming pool facilities. The only reason why I am rating this as 4 and not a 5*+ is due to the staff member's inability to express herself audibly in English - I have a hearing disability and wear hearing aids. I am of the view that the staff member should have made a bit more of an effort with me being at a disadvantage and not able to understand her or - due to her manner of enunciation - read her lips. My hearing aids are visible as was my indication that I was struggling to understand her. Never mind, I will be back in the next few months.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Very pleasant and friendly
desc: Lovely stay at the hotel. We even got upgraded with both our rooms. Love the atmosphere and the close proximity to the yummy eateries across the road. The staff were friendly and ready to help. We will definitely be looking at returning to this hotel for our future stays.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Family stopover
desc: Great room for 2 adults and 2 kids, with free airport shuttle and breakfast. Poor transport access and not flexible with early or late checkin/ out. Keep in mind if arriving early in morning from long haul flight.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Family break
desc: Excellent accommodation and value for money. Nothing I could fault. Staff are amazing and very helpful and polite. Easy access to public transport and a handy grocery store on site. Would highly recommend.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice hotel, about 15 min from city
desc: Liked this place as was good quality and a reasonable price, and only 15 min away from the city. Nice big room. Pool was nice and not heavily used, we were allowed an early check in (though at a cost), and were also able to store our bags on day of departure and use their showers to freshen up which is great when you've been out in 30 degrees before a 10 hour flight! Only downside was slightly loud air conditioning unit which bothered my partner.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Awesome
desc: Overall from check in till check out service is awesome... You will not regret to choose this village hotel katong by far east hospitality...just experience your self and feel their service... Thank you

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent food, service, comfortable rooms
desc: This is our third time staying at the Village Hotel Katong, and we would recommend it highly for the quality of the beds, the attentiveness of the staff, and the quality of the hotel food. The hotel location is also very convenient, and there are many malls and restaurants within walking distance nearby. The in-room facilities are quite basic, but the rooms are spacious and the beds are very comfortable, a perfect balance between softness and back support. Some days we just relax in the room, lie in bed, and watch TV. The shower water pressure is also very good, but at night can take time to warm up. The dishes at the hotel restaurant, the Katong Kitchen, are always well-prepared, especially when you order from the a la carte menu, and the quality of service is top-notch.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Unique stay with Village hotel katong!
desc: Our overall experience with Village hotel katong was amazing with a in room bathtub! staff were friendly to meet our day to day request and the club benefits really surprises made us feel like VIPs in the hotel!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: GREAT!!
desc: Hotel was great, underneath was a supermarket that had everything. Bus stop outside. Mac Donalds around the corner (we have kids) Brilliant location. Staff were friendly, room was lovely, beds were very comfortable as were the pillows. No complaints whatsoever.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Good Staycation in Singapore
desc: Always have been a fan of Katong area. This might be the 4th hotel I've try in this area and Village Hotel is definitely my top 2. Located just steps away from major shopping malls in Katong area, there's also a mini-mall attached with the hotel. Don't be fooled by the exterior of the hotel which looks old. They are only trying to preserve the traditional look in this area. It's the kind of place in Singapore where you'll like if you want to escape the hustle bustle. There's nothing I don't like from the hotel, service was excellent, room is surprisingly comfortable especially the bed, the shower was nice too. There's also a shuttle bus to and from Changi Airport and also shuttle busses to the nearest MRT station I think on weekdays. Would definitely come back and try their

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Worst hotel ever
desc: I had a booking for the made in Singapore room, the only one of its kind in the hotel. The booking was made several months in advance, was paid, and confirmed the week before arrival. When I arrived to the front desk they informed me that the room was occupaid for someone else, how's that possible?, there was a mistake, the said. I think they sold the room for a more expensive price that I bought it, knowing I had the Booking. They offered to stay in another room, or give my money back. Eventually, I stayed in an old room, hearing, all the night long, the lift up and down.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Very clean hotel
desc: Very helpful staff and all could speak good English. Your team member Timothy was very accommodative! The room was clean. Had a lot of choice for breakfast. The reason why I booked this place is because of free transfer from Airport and back.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Beautiful property
desc: Pernakhan club rooms are super good and also the club benefits this hotel provides are amazing. Must stay in the club rooms. They have huge club rooms with some beautiful room structure. Also, provide good amenities overall

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Stays at Family Room
desc: My stay is in the family room. Feedback wise staying in the best hotel and the cleanliness is well maintained and comfy stay overall. The place is like peranakan modern style and entertained with the artefact of peranakan styles. Location wise easy to access and many good areas to see around katong, east coast side, is a food paradise, very convenient we can walk to shopping mall and there are a lot of buses to go around the city.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Stay at the Peranakan Club Room!
desc: The room was large and lovely with a unique in-room bathtub (and extremely good water pressure). Louis was excellent in checking us in and giving us information about the hotel and club benefits. As it was a birthday celebration, Louis even got a gift for us, ice cream! It was definitely value for money, and the beds were extremely big and comfortable. Would definitely stay again!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Value for money
desc: We stayed i in the family room for 4 nights. The hotel and room is modern, clean and beds were comfortable. The value for money in Singapore was very good. It was easy to get taxis and only 10-15 minutes ride away from the places we wanted to visit. Good base for visiting Singapore. Breakfast was good and the gym (even if small) OK. There is supermarket in the same building which was convenient and across the street a bigger mall with big variety of restaurants.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: The staffs are very friendly and helpful. Room is spacious and it is very good and convenient if you travel with toddler
desc: I was very happy with my stay. The staffs are very helpful and they catered to my request. It made my stay more comfortable as i was travelling with a toddler. Room is spacious. Cleaning services and room services are very good too.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Never fail to impress!
desc: We got married in Novotel Clarke Quay 2 years ago and wanted to stay here for our dating anniversary before it closes permanently end Mar. Kumi attended to us and was very friendly and welcoming. She prepared some small compliments in our room and gave us a room with the views similar to the bridal suite we had when we got married. She was chatty and made us feel so at home! Truly enjoyable experience; the hospitality received, fantastic views and the place will truly be missed!! Thanks Novotel Clarke Quay :)

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent hotel
desc: Great accomodation; very friendly staff; perfect location; shuttle service to airport; delicious breakfast; spacious rooms and nice pool outside; we would stay here again and recommend to our friends.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Staycation
desc: Good View of East Coast Park, Relaxing and Quiet Location to let your body and mind rest. Room was Big and Shower was Good. Good for stress relief and learn more about the Nonya Culture. Plenty of Hawkers and Shopping Centre to get your food and Shopping Items

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Good experience
desc: The room is clean and the staff are friendly. The location of Village Katong Hotel is fantastic too. There are lots of good food around the hotel. Bus stop is right in front of the hotel. Overall a very good stay.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Short staycation
desc: Have a few restaurants and supermarket within the same building which is nice. Round shaped wimming pool is a tad small. Gym quite well equipped but towels were unavailable even at 9. WiFi n breakfast were good but building is a bit dated. Not sure what's the use of the balcony when the door is locked.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Staff were warm and friendly.
desc: Staff were really friendly and warm. Feel free to ask for things and they will try to meet your needs with a smile. I personally will come and stay at the katong branch another time. Remember to try their breakfast buffet.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Convenient and Good Airport Proximity
desc: We flew into Singapore at 1am in the morning. This property’s proximity from the airport is ideal especially after a long trip. The front desk was very friendly and helpful. We were traveling w. kids stayed so we stayed in a bedroom with 2 queen beds. The room was a standard configuration and had standard amenities. The bathroom had a large shower (slippery floor so be careful) and great water pressure. You could hear some road noise at night, but since we were at a higher floor, it wasn’t so loud. Breakfast was included and was a large buffet consisting of various fruit, warm Singaporean dishes, cereal, juices, etc. and an egg omelet station. The dishes were tasty and flavorful, and my kids liked the egg station and cereal. My only concern was when I was getting fried

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Best stay in Village Hotel Katong
desc: The place was wonderful. Thank you for the excellent service you have given us. Special thanks to Joey and Amy for giving us a warm welcome. I recommend this hotel if you are travelling to Singapore. See you again next time.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice hotel
desc: Location is near the mall and there are restaurants nearby. Bed is very comfy. Big and clean room. I would recommend this to my friend. Although I requested for king size bed, they only give me twin bed. They ask me to pay additional if I opted for king size room. I am happy with my stay here. Not a big issue.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
desc: It was my first time at the hotel. It was a last minute plan to have book the hotel due to the good offer pricing. Was on staycation with my bestfriend. I am very particular about the hotel view when i am on vacation nevertheless it is just a 2D1N stay. So i couldn't aspect more. It is a fine staycation afterall. 🙂

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great!
desc: Enjoyed a fine staycation at this hotel, squeezing this in just before Circuit Breaker measures were introduced. Staff were friendly and accommodating. Due to what I assume to be low occupancy, we were pro-actively upgraded to a Club Room. If only it came with the club benefits as well! But the upgrade was still much appreciated. The room was big and clean. The bed was comfortable. And the breakfast was lovely. Would definitely consider a repeat visit when the pandemic dies down.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: My Stay at Katong Village Hotel
desc: Not a bad place. Except the Air Con wasn't very cold. Very spacious. Was given a free upgrade. Staff is friendly. Very reasonable price and location is great. Fairprice is located below and very convenient. A lot of eatery nearby too,

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Review of Village Hotel Katong
desc: There are shopping centers and F&B outlets within walking distance of 10 minutes and less. Room comes with a balcony. Rooms are clean and the beds are comfortable. Hotel's Front Line Staff are courteous and attentive. There is a supermarket, NTUC Finest at the ground floor of the hotel.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Staycation during Convid-19
desc: Upon arrive hotel lobby no temperature screening was done (mean anyone can just walk Ard here) however temperature was taken during checking in. Staff was friendly at the checking counter, however phone are hardly pick up (maybe due to man power) hotel does not serve buffet dinner at this period. But Parkway Parade is just across the road where you can have all kind of food. All room Come with a balcony. Rooms was clean, good water pressure . However they don’t provide bottle drinking water. (Not all people like drinking direct from the tap) Swimming pool Was not big, water is abit cold. (You don’t need to be a guest here to go to swimming pool as no room card needed to access in) Complimentary parking given. Open un shelter carpark lot (next day car will full of dry leave and

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Honeymoon Staycation made memorable
desc: I would like to compliment Ms Naazreen and Annaliza for making our honeymoon staycation a memorable one. The room is big, clean and spacious. Put in a special request as we had to do a honeymoon staycation instead because of travel restrictions. Was so surprised and touched by the thoughtfulness of Ms Naazreen. We were happily surprised with the deco and complimentary champagne. Thank you for making our honeymoon experience a wonderful one despite the circumstances. Will return again. Thank you!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Look to Return Again
desc: There is free shuttle service to the airport and this is such a plus to choose this hotel. The peranakan decor is reflective of the history of Singapore. The town center is merely 10 mins away by Grab or taxi if the traffic is smooth. Will look to host guests here in the near future.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: a very nice hotel
desc: The staff were so friendly and helpful, they really went out of their way to make my son and my stay comfortable. It was nice to be away from the city area, lots of good food available in the area as well.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Birthday Celebration
desc: Lovely Staycation at Village Hotel Katong. Staff were professional and friendly. With a birthday promotion, had a free upgrade to Club Room. A huge room and comfortable bed. Surprise me in the room with a birthday cake after check in. The spread at Peranakan Lounge from 6-8pm was pretty extensive, laksa, satay, kueh, creme brûlée etc.... Just like to compliment the staff, Ravin. Friendly, & chatty. Make you feel welcome. Thanks for the lovely experience at the hotel.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great room at a great price!
desc: Spacious room, nice decor, good service etc. What more can I ask for? Convenient with a bus stop nearby to get you to places. A good number of eateries and drinking spots just opposite. Comfortable bed. Looking forward to return!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Just a short stayaway from home.
desc: Cosy and convinient hotel in the east, with eateries of variety choices, along the East Coast Road. Hotels rooms are refurbished but it is much more spacious than many other hotels room standards, which is very good.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: An amazing place to stay! Highly recommended!
desc: We had our short vacation in Singapore with my family. Hotel was great! Room was very tidy and clean, the Chinese room helper was very good and polite. Hotel facilities was very good, pool area was good too. We had our breakfast on 4th floor. The lady on podium greeted all of us promptly, she’s very attentive and friendly she don’t have name tag that’s why we ask her name, it’s Ms. Mary. She’s very helpful on what food suit for us. She recommended the Egg station lady Chef is nice, Nasi Lemak which is yummy, cut fruits was juicy, and coffee machine great taste hope that there’s a chocolate drink for kids. Thankful also to Chinese guy on front office he teaches us what’s the place to go. We will come back and stay again.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Will be really sad to checkout
desc: We’ve been staying in the service Appartment for 14 days and all the staff have been amazing. Especially the team in Katong Kitchen. Ken and Amy even bought us out a slice of their special crepe brûlée cheesecake. We will definitely be coming back.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Worst breakfast ever
desc: The hotel was nice and clean with big rooms (pool was basic and old/small) but what killed it for us was the terrible breakfast. No bacon, items had been left out for hours without being replaced (such as the cheese 'selection') and the chapati next to the cabbage curry was hard and dried out - it was inedible. My advice is do not pay for breakfast - go over the road to other restaurants and have a much better breakfast for a third of the price.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Pleasant Service and Nice Room
desc: Upon arrival, front desk agent was smiley even though her face was covered by mask, I felt it from her tone. Very nice gesture of complimentary upgrade to Club room as the room category that I booked is not available. Room is spacious and very comfortable bed. Nothing to complaint about toilet, shower room has been installed with rain-shower. The only thing that's not functioning well is the minibar. I had to bring my item down to reception for storage. Overall, a good stay in this hotel. Hope to return again.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Worth staying
desc: Nice hotel, helpfull staffs especially Wendy See of Guest Service Exe. Very clean and big room, bathroom very spacious, near to shopping mall, water pressure very strong. Overall Worth Staying. Kenny Ko

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Stellar service
desc: Amazing experience and exceptional staff especially Madeleine Low, Front Office Manager. The rooms are gorgeous and great attention to details. Had a balcony with a nice view. And most of all, heartfelt care from all the staff. Definitely will go back!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Kind and helpful staff
desc: I went with my family for a SHN (COVID quarantine). But they treated us so well that we almost felt like in vacation. Room was clean and the staff was very thoughtful and did everything they could to make our stay more comfortable as possible. Wendy See of Guest Service was especially carrying with us, sending gifts to our son, special gifts for me in occasion of my birthday and more goodbye gifts when we checked out. We definitely would stay in another circumstances.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Lovely time during my SHN
desc: I was quite pleased to know that I've been given a room with balcony and no carpet for my 21-day SHN due to my allergies. But the Village Hotel Katong team has exceeded my expectations as they have been very warm & friendly (over the phone and through the little snacks I receive from them throughout my stay) and very accommodating to my requests. It's not easy being isolated for a long time but the team definitely made my stay as comfortable as possible. Wendy See has been super sweet as she even went to the nearby store to buy me the snacks I like - thanks Wendy for the chocolates and chips! Melvin and Ravin were also nice to send me notes and snacks. My room is spacious and clean. They also have ample cabinets to store my luggages and things so I don't have them exposed in my

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent Hotel with Fantastic Staffs
desc: It was a wonderful 3 weeks SHN stay. The staffs are very friendly and helpful. Take the extra step to meet the request. The room is clean and spacious. Excellent Hotel with Fantastic Staffs. Thanks for making my stay comfortable and wonderful.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Incredible!
desc: Google listing says the hotel is a 4-star hotel, but they definitely have 5-star service here (would give more if I could). Staff were extremely kind, reassuring, and prompt while I stayed here for three weeks on Stay-Home Notice - everyone I spoke to at reception were patient and amazing. Thank you to the folks at the hotel for making the isolation period so bearable! Rooms were clean, and food was excellent for what it is: a viable meal plan to meet the needs of a large number of people - easily supplemented by the great food delivery options in the area. Hotel also provided fruit, and I supplemented it with my own fruit/veg/chia smoothies. Staff were also amazing with deliveries - so fast! I took the Asian option for the meal plan, and was surprised by some local breakfast

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: 21 days SHN stay
desc: So thankful to be assigned a quarantine room here. Tbh, I was a bit apprehensive at first when I first found out my quarantine hotel is Village Hotel as I have never heard of the chain prior to this. However, my 21 days stay has been nothing but pleasant and felt more lile a staycation than quarantine. As I am completing my 21st day stay here, it felt apt for me to leave my review of the hotel. I would like to give a special shout out to Zydney who warmly welcomed me when I first arrived, Ervina who never failed to call and check on my well-being (physical, mental and emotional) every other day throughout my entire stay, and the small little gifts and encouragement cards from Ravin, Zydney and the team. Apart from the excellent customer service, the room is very clean and

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: 21 Long Quarantine days
desc: I was so grateful to be assigned to Village Hotel at Katong. I know what to expect from Far East Group Hospitality in terms of service. They have fulfilled my stay with Excelent service, good food and even they are provide me something unusual request that I asked them - DETERGENT, Yes, 21 days can be too long for me and I need to wash some of my training clothing as I am doing workout everyday during my quarantine days. It was a very simple request, but I really appreciate how they provide me this odd request. I am touched. In terms of the room for the hotel, there's not much to say, I am sure there are a lot of reviewers have mentioned how spacious, clean, the room is and especially with Open Window Balcony which is a real game changer for my 21 days stay. Quite neighborhoods

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Perfect for stay during SHN or business travel
desc: I had a great experience staying at this hotel during my 14 days SHN. From the moment I arrived, the staff made me feel really welcome. The explanation over what to expect for the next 14 days (initially supposed to be 21) was very clear. It was nice to be told that I can let them know anytime about my food preference and they will do their best to accommodate to my request. I was given a room at the highest floor with quite an unblock view. It faces the morning sun which is great for me. There is a balcony so I was able to get fresh air. I seldom turn on the aircon during daytime as the weather can be windy and nice. Flooring is laminated (no carpet) which is great as it will be easier to clean. I asked the hotel to provide me with a broom and disinfectant spray. They also

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: SHN 2 week nice and best service Staff, big room with balcony.
desc: SHN with my daughter at Village Hotel Katong 2weeks, friendly staff & Many surprises. Relax and comfortable my stay, thanks. I'll Give 🖐️Five Star service for them💖 Big room with balcony, easy for me stay 2 week can wash my clothes 👍👍

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Arrival to singapore mandated 2 week quarantine
desc: The room was very clean and mostly carpet free which was ideal given my dust allergies. The balcony provided some much-needed fresh air and a nice view w of Singapore's iconic combination of greenery and building developments. the bed and pillows were extremely comfy and all of the staff were excellent!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Good Service and Support
desc: Thank you Wendy and her team for their support and service during our stay. Our special meal request has been granted. They make us feel comfortable and try their best to cater to all our requests. The balcony and no carpet is a blessing for me who has sinus and allergy.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: The quarantine hotel of choice!
desc: While I'm not here out of choice, I think I'm really fortunate to be holed up for my 2 weeks at VHK! the room is basic but clean, large, uncarpeted (!!). However, quarantine is a different kettle of fish where you really need a support system and care. I am totally blown away by the little touches (cards, chocolates, tea bags, vitamins, fruit) sent by the front desk. In particular, Ravin, Jei, and Wendy have been amazing! I won't be asking for a late check-out when my 14 days are up, but for sure, if I have to be under forced isolation, I know what I'll choose! Team Village Hotel Katon, you rock!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Friendly staff and excellent stay
desc: I was placed under Stay Home Notice in this hotel from 26th July - 09th Aug and was staying in room #1124. Room was big and the view was fantastic . Check in was conducted by Wendy and she thoroughly went thru the details of the Do's and Dont's . During my stay , I had several request and all was attended to. Check out was done by Wenz ( I hope i get the name correctly ) and she was very professional and even offered her assistance by getting me a taxi. Only feedback was with the food as I find that there is a repetition on the menu. one of the dish was sent to me twice on the same day. The food is prepared by an outside caterers so the staff cannot be blamed for this. I have informed the front desk on the matter.Overall, I enjoyed my 14 days in this hotel. Keep up your good

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great!
desc: I stayed in Village Hotel Katong for my SHN. It was a great experience! Staff is very friendly and professional, rooms are clean and very large, balcony is a cherry on the cake! Thank you so much for making my stay very comfortable!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: SHN
desc: The hotel and rooms are old (but spacious!), the customer service is great. Wendy and team were very accommodating to our needs as we had a toddler with us. The floors aren’t carpeted, which was what we wanted due to allergies. However, when we arrived at the room, I could feel the floor was not clean. The mat I used to clean the floor was all grey and dirty after giving it a wipe. The skin of my bed was peeling but all that they could do was give us a broom - which was rather handy as we wanted to clean the room often. We requested for extra pillows to secure my son when he sleeps, and the hotel kindly provided them. Wendy was so nice to get a soft toy for my son which he adores until now. The customer service is what made the stay more enjoyable so thank you to the

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great accommodation for SHN
desc: We had never stayed at a hotel in Singapore that comes with such a good size balcony. Though it's an old property, it allows us to enjoy the natural air instead of being cooped up in an enclosed aircon room especially when it's SHN and we are not able to get out. We were so fortunate being assigned a very large room that comes with a bath tub as well as standing shower. I so agree with all the reviews that their staff have been so kind and helpful. It's so nice to receive their call every few days to check that we're doing ok. Thanks to Aida who even gave me a very pleasant surprise by leaving some tidbits and a card for us.. awwww! I like that the hotel is environmentally friendly where they don't provide mineral water bottle. Instead we can drink direct from the tap or if u

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent stay; room & hotel team service were perfect!
desc: We were on Quarantine, sadly we couldn’t use all the hotel facilities and we were stuck in our room. However, Thanks to the hotel team our stay was made easy and just excellent. The service from the hotel team was warm and beyond our expectations, full of kindness, leaving us kind notes to motivate us throughout the SHN; checking on us from time to time, etc. The large room with balcony was also perfect for our stay, enabling us to get fresh air, with a fantastic large bath and a very long desk where we could both work ‘as usual’. The rooms was modern, bright, spot clean and sufficiently large with a sofa-lounge corner, just making our SHN time feel more like a nice couple staycation! Just a perfect hotel and an excellent service! I strongly recommend for both SHN & staycation

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Pleasant SHN stay
desc: I have a pleasant stay in Village Hotel Katong for my SHN. The room is clean and wifi is good and also the balcony which is very important..There are free coffee and biscuits in the room. Staff calling to check on our well being, and I would like to thank Melvin and Wendy for the chips and card. they are very kind. Thank you so much.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: SHN with care
desc: Very caring team, always available on the phone, cared for gluten free really well even in the free snacks. It is not luxury but the balcony and the care is really nice. And rooms are big. I moved some of the furniture on the balcony to have a meal setting.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Thank You Very much to Wendy and The Front Office Team
desc: Thank you to Wendy, Front Office of Village Hotel Katong. Always cheering me up with her kind gestures of food and drinks . It is the little things like this which make my day , a happy one. Village Hotel Katong Front Office are the Best. Highly recommended hotel and definitely will be coming back.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Five star service at SHN stay
desc: I could not have asked for a better place to serve my SHN quarantine. While the furniture is in need of a refresh - the very clean room, balcony, ample storage space, non-carpeted floor plus the warm hospitality and efficiency shown by Ravin and the team at Village Katong have more than made up for it. On Day 12 and have received encouraging notes and calls from the staff, including Priscilla from the Sales Dept, every few days. Requests are responded to promptly and items are delivered speedily. The team have really made my stay so much more bearable.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Staff and Room with Balcony during Quarantine
desc: Aida who checked me in was extremely kind and empathetic that it was not easy to serve quarantine when I’ve not seen my husband and children for sometime already and won’t be able to see them for another ten days. On day 7 of my quarantine, I was given a handwritten note as well as some chocolates, biscuits and coconut water to cheer me up as Aida and the team felt I must be missing my family a lot which was true.. The hotel staff was always very responsive whenever I called to get anything be it linens or cleaning supplies.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great hospitality and spacious room with balcony
desc: I served my quarantine order here. The staff at Village Hotel Katong went above and beyond in their hospitality. Spacious room with a large bathroom. Great to have a balcony and close to the beach. The staff were attentive to my needs and took on board feedback I gave regarding the food. Would definitely return again.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Pleasant stay and well taken care during SHN
desc: Good day, just want to share our experience, my daughter & mine, staying at Village Hotel, Katong. Both of us are SPR returning from Malaysia via second link on 2nd October 2021. We reached Singapore Customs and after all formalities, were send by a taxi to Village Hotel Katong for 10 days quarantine. A hotel staff greeted us as soon as we got out of the taxi at the hotel lobby. His name was Mr. Ravin and he was very friendly and very helpful. He gave clear information of the 10 day quarantine SOP in the hotel and the checking in was swift and smooth. He even arranged lunch for us to be send to our room even though it was past hotel lunch serving hour, which happens to be 12:30pm to 1pm. We arrived at 2:30pm. He arranged a family room for us as we told him we would like to share

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Super hotel for quarantine
desc: The team here have gone out of their way to make my 'reluctant stay' as best as it could be. Nothing has been too much trouble. I was so pleased to have a large room, a balcony, lots of fresh air, a large bed and nice bathroom. I think having the balcony, opening the door and seeing sunshine helped. Above all the staff were fabulous and showed genuine care for me.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: SHN 10 days turned Staycation of the year
desc: Excellent hospitality with spacious room & balcony is a plus. Shout out to Ravin & Aida, front desk who went extra mile and beyond! We stayed in Club Room and were given fruit platters+chocolate 3 times during our stay! Don't feel like quarantine anymore. The staff were attentive to our needs & well-being - call a few times to check on us, probably to keep us sane as quarantine can be daunting hehe. Glad we were assigned to this hotel for SHN. Superb experience.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Fantastic service! Great team!
desc: Totally dreading the quarantine hotel experience but the team at Village Katong have done everything in their power to make my stay memorable! Anything I ask for is never too much trouble! The room is spacious, comfortable but it’s the staff and service that makes a difference! I’d definitely stay at the hotel again and recommend. Thanks team for going the extra mile in very difficult circumstances!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Stayed 10 nights
desc: Did my 10 day SHN here. Good sized spacious room, nice clean bedding and towels, fantastic shower ( wish I could take it home ) excellent location with lots of good local eateries. Special thank you to Ravin ( Guest Service Executive) for his professionalism and kind attitude - also the delicious fruit platters and chocolate that were a very nice surprise and helped to cheer me up during my stay. Thank you again

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice hotels located in the east
desc: Nicely located in the Katong area where there are many shops and eateries. The staff at the hotel are all very professional in their jobs. The rooms are all very neat and clean making my overall experience staying there a very pleasant one.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: My stay - Village Katong 2021
desc: Staying here for my quarantine. Absolutely delighted with the service and care that they provide. Rooms are spacious, neat, clean. I am happy to have a balcony in the room that provides me a wonderful view. Excellent and courteous team of guest service staff. Definitely recommend.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Most enjoyable hotel in Singapore
desc: This hotel has been an absolute joy. I was here for ten days and thoroughly enjoyed the large room with the double balcony doors. Room amenities are great with a huge television and an extremely comfortable bed. The hotel also boasts one of the best showers in any hotel in Singapore! On top of this, the hotel staff were friendly, thoughtful, and very accommodating. The food was also excellent. 100% would recommend for anyone looking for a quality stay in a lovely neighbourhood.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Family staycation
desc: Friendly staff, spacious room. Walking distance to shopping mall. Apart from the gym and pool, didn't find any other facility or services available. Didn't get the breakfast as the kitchen is not halal certified.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Perfect for business trips and staycations
desc: We loved the spacious and clean rooms. The beds were extremely comfortable so it became a sleepcation. If we needed anything, there's the ntuc and mall below the hotel where we could buy supplies easily. The staff was helpful. There's great food nearby as it is in the heart of the Katong area foodie heaven. Great experience overall.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Friendly staff, fast check in, clean rooms, nice ambience
desc: Friendly staff, fast check in, clean room, nice ambience, accessible location. Overall a nice and cozy feeling and great place to stay in. Will recommend this place to others next time and will come back for more

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Awesome service!
desc: Did a last minute booking for a staycation and decided to try out Village Hotel and it has been our best experience till date. Room was spacious with a balcony, very comfortable room. Amazing staff from front desk to housekeeping. Stated a request that we are having an advance birthday celebration for my son and front desk staff, Aida, did her absolute best to make sure that my son and us fully enjoyed his stay there. From the great service, goodie bag, chocolates, we already thought it was awesome. But on our 2nd night, Aida sent 2 slices of cake with a handwritten card by the front desk staff to our room. She was absolutely lovely and a gem to the hotel. It was definitely a great experience and we will definitely be back.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Quiet and peaceful
desc: Quiet and peaceful hotel. But with great food amenities around the area. Great service and amazing staff. Friendly and helpful. Hotel rooms are not that bad. Just that cleanliness of the room can be improved.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Staycation
desc: Nice place for staying and good maintenance.Recommend place.kindfull service and really enjoyed the staycation.very clean and unified.I got great experience with this staycation..enjoyed and Jon memorable

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Christmas Staycaytion
desc: A pleasant Christmas staycaytion for my family of three! Check-in and out were processed smoothly and the staff were friendly. The room we stayed was spacious with a king sized bed. Met our basic needs of a wonderful staycaytion.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Wedding Annivesary Staycation
desc: Having stayed at Village Katong Hotel many times, my wife and I have always enjoyed ourselves for their excellent service, clean room and great food. For our 19th wedding anniversary, we decided to celebrate and have a 4 days 3 nights staycation there during end Dec, just after Christmas. Booked through their Fareast Insiders and manged to get members rate, which is much cheaper than other booking platforms. Surprised to get a call from a lady staff, Madeleine, few days before our checkin date, who update us on certain requests which I have emailed them for my upcoming stay. Checkin process was smooth and fast. Lobby area was beautifully decorated for Dec festive period and they have a corner where there are balloons sculpting and face painting activities for kids and

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice space in room but services and quality has a lot of room for improvements.
desc: Spacious room but poor aircon. Corridor and lobby aircon was cooler than what you get in the stuffy room. Hotel hot water boiler was stuck, asked for replacement and had poor attitude from frontdesk. Housekeeping replaced the stuck boiler with a unusable one (couldn't power on). Asked for another boiler and had to go through another round of poor attitude from operator. Took 3 boilers in order to have a cup of warm drink which was more than 2 hours wait of time in total. Space is decent and layout of room is comfortable. the supermarket downstairs was a bonus.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing customer service
desc: Village hotel Katong provided wonderful customer service! They were friendly and delivered on our requests promptly. They were also extremely accommodating with respect to the numerous unforeseen changes with our flight, and allowed us to modify our reservation without penalty. I recommend this hotel wholeheartedly.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great staff, great location
desc: It was a very pleasant stay, since not only the hotel is great but also there are many things to do in the upbeat neighborhood of Katong. Make sure to ask for tips. The staff takes time to answer all questions (hotel-related or not).

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: One of the best vakues in SG
desc: almost nothing to complain means great experience. Once Tomson line will open in 2024 the connection to city is improved which is the only limitation now. Great rooms with balcony. Pool area is great. Subermarket in Hotel and connected to restaurants and Bar's.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing and exceptional customer service and wonderful hotel!
desc: Amazing customer service even before check in! Ervina, Sales Manager provided exceptional, personalized and amazing customer service even before check in. Ervina always responded promptly, graciously and was incredibly helpful and accommodating. At one point we had to make last minute update to reservations and Ervina responded during her own vacation time, so unexpected and awesome customer service! So very grateful for this. Thank you so much Ervina and Village Hotel Katong for your wonderful assistance during a very stressful time. My son and his friend checked in for one week quarantine stay in early January. Food was delicious and well presented. Room was very comfortable and having access to a large balcony was wonderful and made a challenging time less difficult. We

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Wonderful stay with wonderful staff
desc: Suren & Jeya were warm and inviting upon check in, they made us feel at home right away. In the room when we arrived there was a personalised written note with sweets and candies prepared for us from a very sweet staff, Aida. All of the staff made sure our stay was a comfortable one. Thank you so much! Will definitely return!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Our Pleasant Stay
desc: I liked the hotel's close proximity location to food outlets and bars. I also appreciate the staff for granting our request to change the 2 single beds into 1 king size bed. Not considering the on-going construction around the area, the hotel is a good choice.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Wedding Ceremony & Stay
desc: We had a wedding event followed by stay. The event went off well and we did extend our stay, thanks to the Katong Staff for all the help & support. Ambiance was really nice & breakfast provided was good. Special thanks to Mr. Ilyas, Four & Team for the extended support.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Affordable, big rooms near Old Airport Road Market
desc: We chose this hotel because its rooms are really large, cheap and have a balcony in case we had to quarantine upon arrival in Singapore. Super friendly staff (Hey Aida!) gave us an upgrade and were generally super helpful. Rooms are a bit old-fashioned but very comfortable. Other pros: halfway between airport and downtown. Supermarket and cafes downstairs. Close to Old Airport Road Market, the best food-court in the city!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: New Year’s Eve Staycation
desc: Booked a room for New Year’s Eve - the Peranakan Club Double with Club Lounge. Unfortunately, the Club Lounge was not operating and we were not able to utilise the Lounge as per what we expected. We had also requested late checkout in our booking, which was initially declined by the front desk staff. The room was spacious and had a balcony overlooking the carpark. However, there were minor hiccups that we found in the room. According to the front desk, the hotel was on max occupancy, therefore, the central heater will take a while to have hot water available for our room. The electric kettle was also not working. The hotel staff got to solving our problems swiftly and attended to our request of having extra bath necessities too. We were also pleasantly surprised that

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Pleasant Staycation!
desc: Smooth check in process and friendly staffs! Rooms are spacious with balcony. Pool are amazing with 1.8m deep. Convenient walking distance to Parkway Parade Shopping Centre. There were no room service for now but it was no issue as getting foods are easily access across the streets.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Our anniversary staycation
desc: Friendly and fast check-in. Had a wonderful cooling (rainy day) staycation to celebrate our anniversary. Thank you Ida and Melvin for the sweet thoughtful yummy cake that was brought to our room. A suggestion to probably put a signage on how to direct guest that comes in via Katong V. We had some difficulties finding the entrance to the hotel lobby.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice service
desc: I will definitely book for another staycation here at village hotel katong. A very nice place to chill and relax. Hopefully there will be more selections of breakfast when we return. And hopefully by then the club lounge will be open

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Commendation on hotel service
desc: Very good service!! Throughout my 4 nights of staying, the staffs have been very friendly and accommodative to my needs. Information given by them are also very clear. Hotel is very spacious and clean, very comfortable to be staying in. Very worth the cost :) Special shout out to -Suren- Thank you so much for your excellent service. Knowing what you are doing, answering to our questions and going the EXTRA MILE to assist despite us asking for any help such as immediately asking for help to carry our luggages up after a long flight without us asking. Last of all, always keeping a smile in any situations :) It was a pleasure knowing you and keep up the good work! Thank you!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Overall OK
desc: Bedroom is spacious and clean. However, the room needs some refurbishment bed frame leather peeling. Balcony area is old. Front desk check-in and check-out experience satisfactory. Rate for SHN is reasonably priced.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Perfect place for a breather
desc: Absolutely love the room and the service of this hotel. Spacious room, great clean facilities, and super friendly and helpful staff. While serving SHN in this hotel, I called the front desk to ask if they had any regular dairy creamer instead of the non-dairy ones, they immediately bought a new packet full of dairy creams and sent it to my room. I even made sure it was perfectly fine if they didn't have the regular ones, but they even went out of their way to send me a full package of creamer along with a super sweet card.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: A hotel or air bnb?
desc: Upon arrival, we were not told there would be no room cleaning service throughout the whole of our 3d2n stay in order to minimise contacts between their chambermaids and guests. This was made known to us only after rounds of finding out with the hotel operators why our room was not cleaned on even though we turned on the cleaning button before we went out for the day. There was neither prior information, nor any courtesy to inform guests about their cleaning service protocol. I had to make calls to their operators for clarification, feeling unattended to. We went out at 7.30am, returned to the room at 1.30pm. Called their operator at 1.30pm, and was told they would check . We waited for 1 hour but still no news no sight. It was until my 2nd call then we found out and felt so

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Relaxed and Comfortable
desc: We booked this hotel based on our experience of another Far East Hospitality hotel, the Quincy and we were so well looked after yet again. Terence the hotel manager met us on arrival and was so charming and keen to ensure we had everything we needed and to give us a few recommendations for our first night. We had a club room which was spacious,extremely clean and well appointed. Pool area was clean well maintained and we were really looked after especially by Low( who knows all the best hawker stalls ) and Lisa. Again all staff smile and say hello when they see you and the hotels a really comfortable place to be. Eating,shopping,culture,Sea and Park are all walking distance from the hotel, we couldn’t believe our luck with the choice of restaurants and bars. East Coast Park is a

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: SHN staying experience
desc: This is the best room I can find that offered me the best rate (S$100 total, including tax and service charges). The room is clean and super large. Good service from the hotel. The room has a balcony also. My room has 1 queen bed and it is super comfortable. Really rcm this place to stay!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Pleasant stay
desc: Rooms are spacious with a balcony, bed was comfy and housekeeping staff is very obliging. Also, the counter staff are courteous with a ready smile! Would definitely recommend to friends and family/relations

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Super Clean and Wonderful Hospitality
desc: We stayed for 11 days and had absolutely no regrets! The room was very clean and bathroom was in good condition. Showers were poweful and good heating as required. The rooms were maintained well by housekeeping and we were extremely amazed at the view from our balcony. The front desk team were polite, always greeting stayers and accommodating. The hotel staff assisting at the entrance was very helpful with our baggages and you could feel the sincerity and warmth. 10/10 for customer service and a highly recommended hotel for families and anyone who missed such hospitality from travels. Perfect for staycations too! Thank you and the team for making our stay as comfortable ad possible.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Ultimate Guest Experience
desc: We were blown away for our Stay Experience at Village Hotel. The staff were very excellent host, making us feel at home. Hazel and her team prepared something meaningful for the both of us for V Day and it was a total surprise!! The stay experience has been one of the few that I still remember and would recommend folks to the hotel.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Village Hotel Katong
desc: The staff was polite and friendly. Rooms were clean and comfortable. location is good as there is a supermarket and eateries within the hotel compound. Value for money. Surely will recommend this hotel to family and friends.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: SHN
desc: Very clean and nice hotel. I'm strongly recommended to stay in village hotel katong. Their reception staff is very helpful whenever I need help and also deliver my food panda to my room in no time at all.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great experiance despite demanding COVID restrictions
desc: The Katong Village Hotel team really made a difference to our stay during the Singapore Airshow. Great support to go through all the restrictions and regulations caused by COVID. Great hospitality. Thanks a lot!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Relaxing Stay with Family!
desc: My family and I decided to stay in this hotel for a short staycation over the weekend, and it was an amazing stay! The hotel has a shopping mall attached, and also had Parkway Parade just a walking distance away, so we did not have to go far when we needed to purchase any item. Upon arrival, Ayub was quick to greet us at the driveway and assisted us with our bags. He was really polite and warm throughout our conversations with him throughout our stay. Hazel greeted us at the front desk during check-in. We had a lot of rooms and requested to be on the same floor. She managed to arrange for us to be staying beside each other! She was patient throughout the whole check-in experience and also explained the safe measures to us in a detailed manner. The Peranakan Club room was big

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Village Hotel Katong
desc: I didn’t experience any issues with the staff or issues in cleanliness of the room plus the staff are very accommodating and friendly plus the room service are good. However, there is one time that we request for room cleaning by pressing the light switch but unluckily when we came back, the room was not cleaned, so we called the staff and they quickly send the cleaner to our room. Village Hotel is the best <3

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Peranakan Club Room- Fantastic
desc: clean, big room, great service. i like the size of the bath tub. Friendly staff. Each room is sealed and guests can be assured of the cleanliness of the room. there is a balcony . we receive a surprise birthday cake & note.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice place
desc: Good for quarantine. The room was clean and I enjoyed the tv selections, including Hong Kong cinema and Me tv. The location is a little far from most of the action, but there’s plenty of food and malls to explore for a few days.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Perfect wedding event at Village Hotel Katong
desc: We celebrated our wedding at Village Hotel Katong. The event was perfect in every way thanks to the work and help of Ilyas and his team. We had to change the venue with little over 1 month from the date of the wedding due to issues with the previous venue, and still the team at Village Katong managed to do a great job, leading us through every single detail of the event, cost, terms, etc, in a very professional manner. The wedding was perfect, great service, food and everyone was able to enjoy it. I highly recommend this venue and team for any couple looking for a wedding venue.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Spacious Room with Balcony
desc: one of the few hotels in Singapore that has a spacious room and came with a balcony. The room was clean and well lighted. Hotel location is fairly convenient with a supermarket just right below the hotel. I enjoyed my stays here at the hotel

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Best Hotel Service
desc: We had the best staycation with good service from all staffs here... Easy assess to the town... lots of shops and restaurants nearby... Would be happy to be coming back here again... Would definitely recommend this hotel to friends..., family and relatives... We love the bathtub size indefinitely... Our kids love them and enjoyed their stay most...! Love the size and the looks of the room...!!! Thank you for making our stay a wonderful... Special thanks to staff... Halim and colleagues... ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ Just a little setback..., probably the wifi needs to be improved... I got disconnected most of the time while doing my work on the laptop.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: BEST service in everything.
desc: We did our niece wedding there at the ballroom and have the bridal suite as complimentary and we booked a family room. Both rooms are huge & spotlessly clean. Within walking distance to supermarket & restaurant and just minutes away from our home. Every staff member with whom we came in contact was attentive and kind especially Mr Ilyas & Mr Guha. The service rendered to us was remarkable. There is not a single hiccups and make our event and stay truly enjoyable. We will definitely be back for a staycation anytime soon.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Stay at Village Hotel Katong
desc: Staffs were very friendly. Rooms were clean and spacious. Swimming pool was fun! Definitely an excellent experience! Location was great as the beaches were nearby and quite a lot of food options around the area making it very accessible.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Lovely surprise from staff
desc: I would like to say Thank u to d Guest Relation Executive name SI EN for personally send A BDAY CAKE WITH BDAY CARD to our room 601 on 06th feb 2022 around 9pm+ on behalf of village hotel katong.we were surprise when we heard room bell. We appreciate it so much.SI EN deserve a staff award for her gd gesture.keep up d gd work SI EN. D hotel also gave me free upgrade to their CLUB room on 6th floor which we like it so much cz d room ve sofa.😊d free room upgrade was from staff name HAZEL(if i m not wrong).thank u to HAZEL too.was surprised when my husband check in she said happy birthday to him. Kudos to staffs at village katong.i will surely stay there again.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Pleasant Stay
desc: Nice hotel overall and staff are generally friendly as well. I'm a light sleeper and wake up very easy with noise hence have requested for a quiet room when I booked my stay. Mentioned it to the staff on arrival as well and I think they tried their best to allocate a room for me. Have to thank the staff for upgrading my room. Just so happen my room face the next door apartment's swimming pool's wall and kids tend to scream when they play around. Was given a upgraded room on level 6 in the mid section but sadly not as quiet as I hoped it would be. Strangely people staying above me starts making consistent banging noises on the floor at weird timing 12:30am and 1:30am. The good part about the room is the bed, its really comfortable and I slept really well during the day. Other

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great location but worn out building
desc: The heading says it all. Plenty of great restaurants and bars in the area, and a short walk to the beach, but the building needs serious work. This property is not up to the operators usual standards.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent Stay at a Homely Neighbourhood!
desc: Great rooms (big and spacious unlike the downtown hotels), excellent prices (very, very good price! This was my 2nd time of a long stay here. The first was when I relocated to Singapore and stayed one month! This trip was a one week long stay) and 'warm' neighbourhood (it's Katong and Joo Chiat, for goodness sake! And, it is quite near to the city!)!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: great location out of the city centre, and excellent staff
desc: The staff here are unfailingly cheerful and kind. We were ill during our stay and they even sent up some fruit and a Get Well card. This is why we will stay here again! Location good with enough restaurants, East Coast park only 20 minutes away for a stroll behind the beach. Good shopping malls nearby. I12 and Parkway Parade.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Quiet Getaway
desc: Nice hotel to just chill and relax, surrounded by great eateries and bars. The staff was welcoming and made special effort to celebrate special days. Great location to walk around and soak in the local atmosphere.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great stayca
desc: Planned a staycation for my partners birthday celebration. To describe the place as beautiful would be an understatement. Great hospitality, and friendly staff give you the feel of an VIP treatment. Rooms very much spacious and beautiful. Definitely a place to check out. Will plan future staycation there ☺

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great friendly service!
desc: Check-in was fast and Madeline was efficient though there were a number of things to do. As requested, we were given a room on high floor with seaview 1204. This means a lot to us. When we returned from a walk by the beach, we were pleasantly surprised to see a birthday 'cake' and card. Thanks to Assistant Manager Zydney Joyce! I appreciate the thoughtfulness and warmth! You made our stay special. Many thanks! Warmly, Vivien Ler.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Wonderful stay
desc: We stayed for 19 days for my daughter tennis tournament. Staff was very helpful in anything we need. Many thumbs up for the team at village hotel Katong... especially the front office team.. will definitely come back

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Family staycay
desc: Check in was smooth and quick, got upgraded to a club room. Room was huge and comfortable, my family enjoyed their stay too. Was extremely thankful for the thoughtful gifts/snacks from the guest service Aida. Thank you for making the stay a comfortable one.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great hotel with very friendly staff!
desc: Had a lovely time at this hotel where we stayed for a whole month while waiting to fly to HK. My husband had to work in the room which he found very comfortable including the office chair and balcony. The rooms are large, bright and spotlessly clean with a large comfortable kingsized bed but by far the highlight of our stay was the staff who were incredibly friendly, attentive and super helpful. I spent a lot of time at the gym and pool area and Low, Wong and Liza were exceptional at making me feel so welcome and comfortable from day one. Nothing was ever too much. Low spent so much time telling us about all the good eateries and sites, Wong made sure I was as comfortable as I could be providing towels and water without me asking and Liza even bought me a gift on my last day

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Overall pleasant experience
desc: Visited in April for a staycation. Hotel was very clean, good amenities and staff were very friendly. Location is good and convenient. Overall very pleasant experience, would recommend. Hope to be back soon too.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great hospitality!
desc: I was there to attend Heal Your Life workshop at the Village Hotel in mid of April. The room is neat and clean. All the staffs there are nice and helpful, especially Alex Liang. He supports us with his positive attitude throughout the workshop and his effort made us enjoy the stay and the training so much. Thank you for making us a pleasant trip!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: "Heal your Life workshop" from 16/4/22 to 1/5/22
desc: I was staying in this hotel for my workshop for 2 weeks. The hotel is clean & tidy. Service is good. All staffs were so friendly and nice. Alex Liang and Four Wong were the staffs that were attached to our group Both of them were so nice, friendly, superb, wonderful people. They go all the way out to help us in every way we needed. I will recommend this hotel who is looking for a cosy and home feeling . The location is very good too with so much delicious food around the area it ranges from Indian, local, Thai, Western, Italian pasta and so many others. You are really spoilt for choices, you name it you got them. Beautiful cafes too. Love Khim

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Good hotel
desc: The hotel was good. The suite especially. Having a bathtub in the bedroom itself seemed very fancy. My friends and I enjoyed taking photos inside the room. The staff were nice as well. I’d recommend it.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Most wonderful stay at Village Hotel Katong
desc: Stayed here at Katong Village Hotel for 3 nights with my Family. Staff of the hotel were very professional with atiquette hardly found in many hotels I have stayed in. Friendly and personal attention was rendered to my family and also noticed the warm and friendly feeling toward other guests as well. I would definitely come back soon to Village Hotel Katong soon as I really feel at home with the awesome treatment rendered to us during our stay. Thank you Village Katong Hotel for letting us have a memorable stay with you. The De Rozario Family

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Anthony
desc: Excellent location with restaurants, pubs and shops right round the corner. Good to know that many of the old time staffs are still around that makes the hotel a home away from home for the family. Special thanks to the manager, Jason, for making our trip memorable.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Hotel needs refurbishing but staff were great
desc: Hospitality was good. Staff were able to accomodate to my needs. But the room needs refurbishing although it was really spacious. For muslim travellers, you can pray in congregation . The wallpaper was falling apart from the wall and some were moldy. Other than that, it is good for family. Close to malls and eateries.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice hotel
