desc: Simple hotel. Would appreciate if counter staff were friendlier. Was questioned when ask for second parking ticket. Didn’t know we cannot leave the carpark multiple times. Counter staff seems eager to check us out even though we were given late check out.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: A very pleasant stay
desc: We came back to our room and were very pleasantly surprised to see a fruit platter, healthy snacks with a nicely hand-written card left by the staff simply wishing that we will enjoy the fruits in the comfort of our room. We stayed 5 nights in this lovely charming location. I highly commend the staff for for their professionalism and personal staff. A truly VILLAGE experience. We'll be back.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Katong Staycation
desc: Good hotel location with many good local food to explore. Sea view was nice Place is quiet and shower was refreshing. Worth the money and hopefully the lounge can reopen again - missed the Singapore Sling

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Home away from home
desc: I had a 2 weeks stay-in training program in this hotel. The room is neat and clean. The person taking care of 9th floor cleaning is a Chinese guy(did not get his name) who is always friendly and he does the room clean and tidy at any time. The manager in charge of our training group Alex Leong was simply wonderful! He and his team (Four and Annie) catered to our every big and small needs during the two weeks. And always do it with a smile. Thumbs up to them. They made us feel at home away from home. Thank you, Alex!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Below average
desc: We stayed in this hotel for quite some time, waiting for our apartment to be ready. Size of the room is about the only positive. Balconies are useless and dirty. Room is large, but the carpets as shown in the pictures are nowhere to be found. That makes if you have someone staying in the room above you, you will hear every single sound. Especially the moving of chairs or dropping objects can really make you sit up straight in your bed. Glass bathroom has a door which doesn’t really close, so there’s little privacy when using the restroom. Tried breakfast on day one but it was so poor we decided to arrange it ourselves. Pool area is covered with bird droppings and doesn’t really seem to get cleaned properly. The bill we received when checking out was incorrect and they couldn’t

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Location for an enjoyable stay
desc: Excellent location for all types of travelers. Good amenities, convenience, food and shopping. Those who drive, shall have free parking which is truly one of the best USPs. Just have to bear the efficient but robot-like unfriendly front office. May be an ideal test site for automated check-in and check-out, with no human presence.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: World Class Hospitality
desc: We hosted our wedding event in May and would like compliment Esther, Ilyas and Four for the excellent service rendered. The hotel was very accommodating to our requests and follow ups during the build up to our big day and ensured a smooth event flow. Four was superb in attending to our guests and needs during the entire day. The hotel ops was great too during our stay in Village Katong. It was a pleasure and excellent decision to host our event here and we will be back soon for another stay!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Quiet room
desc: Fast check in. Breakfast spread is good. Restaurant staff are full of energy and attentive to customer needs despite the busy weekend. Super fast check out. Hotel has lots of shopping and eateries around from morning to midnight. 5 min walking distance to bus stop- with express buses to suntec, bugis, little India. 10 to 15 min walk to the east coast beach via under ground pass

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Super location with large rooms and a balcony.
desc: I stayed here with my husband when we were in Singapore for a social visit. The room was large by Singapore standard. Adequate cupboard space, they even had an iron and ironing board! Having a balcony was a special advantage to get some fresh air.The view from our room was great.The AC worked nicely and the mattress was very comfortable. The location is very convenient and one can access Marine parade as well as Katong area from the hotel. Plenty of lovely eating joints around, two big shopping malls and lots of nice shops. There were bus stops on either side of the hotel serving almost entire Singapore, an MRT station is also coming up soon. The staff was friendly and helpful. They allowed an early check in which was a big help as our flight landed early. Wi fi worked nicely

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Pleasant Stay
desc: Received such a warm welcome note in the room. The room, environment and surroundings is so condusive for resting and reflecting. The recreation areas are family friendly. Dinning in the tastefully decorated restaurant filled our stomach and refreshed our energy.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Comfortable, well appointed Hotel in upcoming Katong
desc: Great service, comfortable refurbished rooms, nice pool, in a good sized hotel in the Katong district. With a supermarket underneath and lots of restaurants/bars just behind, a shopping centre and Hawker market across the road, a closer option to the airport vs downtown.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice stay
desc: Nice big rooms and hotel is surrounded by food. Tries to be green but can be greener with the toiletries. Checkin was smooth. Room was clean. King bed was big enough for 3. Bathroom was big too. Pool n gym available.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: A very pleasant stay in vibrant surroundings
desc: This was a very good base from which to enjoy what Katong has to offer. Friendly staff and a good gym too! We opted for the room only option as there were just too many good places to eat nearby! The NTUC downstairs was really handy too

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Wonderful Friendly and Helpful service staff
desc: Wonderful Friendly and Helpful service staff. Breakfast spread can be improved with the limited selection available. Rooms are cleanand a baby cot was arranged for my baby upon request b4 arrival. Thank u

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: A good hotel
desc: Rooms 5 Service 5 Cleanliness 5 Location 5 Staff 5 Breakfaat 3 Overall 5 My family was happy we chose this hotel for our stayca. Will surely come back. Hope they look at the breakfast though. Lots of good restaurants in the area so youll have lots of choices. My hand claps goes out to the staff. They are always 'there' to assist.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice hotel, v comfortable stay
desc: Stayed here while our house was under renovation. Nice large rooms, very friendly staff esp housekeeping staff Li Min, who always had a cheerful demeanor and cleaned our rooms very well ! She is extremely diligent in her work and made our stay extra comfortable. Great hotel overall

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Pleasant stay!
desc: Enjoyed our stay here. Loved that everything was so convenient (especially the ntuc downstairs located within the same building). Food choices were aplenty and all within a stone throw’s distance. We loved the Katong neighborhood for it’s heritage and countless number of cafes / pubs to check out. Was welcomed by Hazel who was very attentive and made us feel at home. We stayed only for a night but had such a good “break”. We were also given an extended check out so we could fully maximize our time to get lunch before checking out. The shower had pretty strong water pressure and we loved the bathtub!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Hotel with spaces and views
desc: The room is big and clean. It is well maintained. It is also linked with a shopping mall. Bus stop is nearby. The only thing that I could say is there is no MRT nearby the hotel. I believe soon there will be.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Wonderful stay
desc: Stayed there to celebrate my birthday.. We were wonderfully surprised by the staffs who went the extra mile to decorate our room with small lovely birthday decorations. Room was big and clean. Staffs were very attentive. Love the location and convenient to explore the nearby attractions and restaurant. Thank you

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Business & Pleasure
desc: The Hotel is in an excellent location in the thriving hub of Katong. Numerous diverse international restaurants, bars and small malls are within easy walking distance making eating out a simple pleasure. The hotel is lacking food on room service and an in house restaurant making its location a necessity. Rooms were clean, roomy and well maintained and we were well looked after throughout our 3 week stay by Li May who looked after all needs with a kind demeanour and a smiling face. We would happily recommend this hotel to anyone.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Pleasantly surprised
desc: Very good location. Surrounded by eateries, and supermarket downstairs. Counter staff and cleaning were responsive and helpful. Connecting rooms for our family of 4 was very convenient. Our original booking for Changi was cancelled as it was being used for Covid. We were offered a transfer to Katong, which turned out well. Discovered a hidden gem.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Convenient hotel
desc: this is our first time to check in in singapore, when we arrived, it made me amazed because it was close to a street food which I loved it and I was also comfortable when checking in, the room was clean, everything was complete in the room, it was easy if you wanted to find a taxi, even the bus was easy for those of you who like to explore, Next time , I will make sure to check in again here , Thank you for your hospitality

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great stay
desc: Great service, great staff and overall great time spent at the hotel, the service provided made me and my family feel welcomed. The staff were all friendly and professional, always tried to help us with every small and meaningful task.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Staycation
desc: Family staycation. Stayed there for 2 nights and the stay was pleasant.. The location was suitable with good eateries and activities nearby.. Would recommend for those who wants relaxing stay with family..

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Lovely hotel to stay
desc: Good location, there are plenty of supermarket, shops, malls and restaurants around. Very convenient. It is only 15 mins to the CBD and 25 mins to the Harbour Front (Sentosa and USS). If there is an MRT station next door, it will be event better. I heard that the MRT station will be accomplished in 2025. The only comments for the room is the renovation is a little old.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: my experience in the hotel
desc: staying in the hotel was good however the food variety was limited even though there were multiple different people from all sorts of backgrounds, and the food service also felt pretty limited example:(lack of plate and silverware on the table before hand), also wasn't any room service to help me carry my luggage when checking in and out of the hotel.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Not returning
desc: Rewriting this to add more to the shockingly bad service. Checked in and was shocked by the decrepit balcony doors, that you can’t latch the door in any way from inside and the weird location of the toilet paper holder. Two of our rooms cards couldn’t work at all, the fridge in the room was not working too. Last night there was a cockroach in the room we had to handle. Second day, I went out very early and came back before lunch and the room was not cleaned. I went out again and came in the evening, it still wasn’t cleaned and I called them only for them to inform me that they told me at check in they only clean every two nights. Both me and my sister heard nothing about this at check in, nor was it indicated in any of our booking correspondence. The booking details indicated

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Good hotel to stay in
desc: Best hotel for short staycation. Staffs were friendly in answering any question that were ask. Always willing to lent a helping hand when they saw me and my wife needs helps with our wedding gown and our luggage

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Wedding held at KVH on 19/6/22
desc: Hi everyone! I don’t usually write review on anything but this hotel that we choose to hold our wedding on 19/6/22 was really an unforgettable one! From the first time we went to the place, we were really pleased with the new renovation and vibes! Ballroom well designed with an open air area just outside, very suitable for outdoor Solemnisation with nice view! The bridal suite have a bath tub just beside the bed! Unfortunately we did not have the chance to use it. If you’re planning for a wedding venue, do check it out. Special thanks to Ilyas, Christine, Sherlyn and Four for all the great help! Although some hiccups happened during the discussions (quite standard everywhere) but it’s delightfully resolved that’s worth a praise. Definitely a 5/5 stars for their effort and

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent Service
desc: Highly recommended. Their service is top notch, from check-in, cleanliness, breakfast, right up to check-out, all was smooth. The location of the hotel was quite, therefore a good nights sleep is guaranteed.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Very stay with twin room level 8
desc: Location is good as it is opposite a local market/beach/shopping mall within and a bigger mall opposite. Rooms area clean and facilities well maintained. There are constructions nearby due to the mass rapid transport works but overall stay experience is not affected.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Good but could be better
desc: The bad: Annoying AC noise during night. Bathroom is tight. Staff could not help with some problems. Room has unpleasant odor near the hatch of the piping maintenance hatch. Family package vouchers are useless (restaurant didn't accept them). Car parking ticket is only once per day. Think again before returning to the hotel in the middle of the day. The good: Located near many facilities.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Village Hotel Katong
desc: It was good, pleasant and enjoyable short stay. Enjoy the room that was clean, neat and tidy. Complimentary ticket for those driving is a plus - can be obtained at front desk. Reserved earlier for Village Hotel Changi but, was relocated to Katong. Overall met our humble and simple expectation.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Dissatisfied/ Lizard in Room /Ceased Club Benefit
desc: I booked 3days stay at the Peranakan Club Room from 13th June to 15th June 2022 to celebrate our daughter 6th Bday. This post gonna be slightly lengthy but trust me you may want to read it to the end for the full "experience" Upon check in, i was informed that the hotel have ceased operation of the club lounge (mind you we were not informed when we place the booking and also when the hotel contacted us about our check in). When we arrived at the room, it was nice, design was nice and spacious. However, floor was dusty..really dusty.. our feet was black after moving around the room within the first 10 mins. Seems like the room was never mop for a while. So since we lost the benefit to access the club lounge, what starts to piss us off was when we open the fridge, its was

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice holiday
desc: It’s been an enjoyable family trip. I was surprised with the birthday cake and card in my room. My son enjoyed the stay and he had fun at the swimming pool. We hope to be back soon and try out more of the food at the area.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Satisfied birthday staycation.
desc: A surprise knock on my room around 8pm frm d staff with bday cake n a bday card.thank u FO team village hotel katong for d surprise.d hotel staffs never dissappoint me n i love d hotel peranakan look.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Everything is good except...
desc: If plan to drive and stay at this hotel, got to plan before exit the hotel cos it only allows to redeem 1 carpark coupon per day. 2nd time exit within the same day will be chargeable accordingly. Beside that the staffs are friendly and helpful.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Holiday staycation
desc: Family staycation during holiday , value for money for this hotel as it come with complimentary breakfast , free ice cream , $60 voucher and late check out . Will definitely come back since it have family room which is suitable for a family of 4 .

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Good for short stays
desc: Village Hotel Katong is a clean hotel at a reasonable price to stay for few days. It's not too far from the airport or other popular city attractions. But one has to depend on taxis for local travel or connecting to the nearby MRT stations. Breakfast offering is good with different culinary options. Overall a good and clean hotel at a reasonable price.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Cleanliness of the room
desc: The flooring at room 624 was sticky throughout the whole room and therefore i and my wife had to wear slipper when walking. very inconvenient. wanted to feedback when checking out but the checking in queue was long. Pls look into room 624 flooring. thanks.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Very clean and spacious room.
desc: Fast check in and check out. The room is very spacious and clean. Very comfortable bed. Enjoyed the excellent the breakfast provided. Enjoyed my stay. The rooms furniture might be a little dated, power points does not comes with USB ports to allow u to plug in ur cables to charge your devices. Water at the shower room takes some time (approx 3min) to get warm.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Charming katong experience!
desc: Great escape from the busy city to charming Katong. Eating at the Blue Elephant across the road was almost like being in Bangkok! I wish i had more time to walk around Katong more to discover its secret charms!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Holiday
desc: Katong is a more traditional area of Singapore. There is a lot of building work in the area. Taxi was approx $12 to the harbour. Staff helpful and friendly. Shops and bars/food areas close by. Hotel Bar and restaurant was closed during our visit. The pool area is clean with towels available

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: ずっと好きで利用していたが今回は残念な結果に。
desc: 3年ぶりのシンガポール旅行。大好きなこのホテルに最終日泊まりましたが結果は残念なものでした。カトン地区にあり、部屋もプラナカンを想像させる素敵なインテリアがお気に入りでしたが、今回は部屋に入ってベッドに座った瞬間、なんだか湿っているように感じました。あまり気にず…と思ったのですが湿気を含んでいるようでバスタオルを敷いて寝ました。朝起きると床がびしょびしょでした。部屋の鏡も結露して水滴が…部屋から洗面所まで床が全部濡れてました。 フロントの方に言ったところ、すぐに係の人が来てくれましたがエアコンを調節するようにだけ言われました。除湿をかければ乾きますが、それでは部屋が寒すぎて、消すと室内が結露するような最悪な状況でした。今までなんかいも泊ったことがありますが、こんなことは初めてでした。コロナ禍であまりお部屋が埋まっておらず、その為でしょうか。でもこの時の旅行でほかのホテルにも泊まりましたがこのようなことはありませんでした。とても不快な2日間で残念でした。 I love this hotel and have stayed there many times. However, this time my stay was terrible as I was plagued by condensation every day. In the mornings the floors were wet as if it had rained and the beds were uncomfortable. I was very disappointed.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Hotel in pleasant area
desc: We liked the fact that the hotel is near to the East coast park beach and that there are many eateries around in the area. There is also a small NTUC for grocery shopping in the connected shopping mall plus some good restaurants.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Fabulous month-long stay
desc: My family and I (2 adults & 2 teenagers) stayed in the Family Room for a month. The room was spacious, had all the amenities, a large balcony overlooking the East Coast beach and was kept spotless by our favorite housekeeping staff, Jane and her colleagues. The staff were very friendly and accommodating, thumbs up to the 2 gentlemen at Concierge, always helping us with our food delivery orders. The hotel is situated between Katong & Marine Parade area which is such a great spot for FOOD, shopping, gyms; definitely an area where you can just enjoy walking and exploring. With the great value, staff and excellent locale, we’ll definitely be back!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Gray location and price
desc: If you want to be in the heart of the local food and charming shops this is great. The rooms are clean and nice. The price is good and there is plenty around.Check in and out we’re easy. There is a supermarket just downstairs and plenty of food to choose from.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: business trip
desc: very convenient location, lots of eating place around, old Singapore housing, beach nearby, can rent bicycle to ride on east coast and also go to visit down town, will be even better with MRT coming soon

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: A Comfortable Stay
desc: I love the courteous and helpful staff, the beautiful and comfortable room and the strategic location. I will definitely come back to stay again and will recommend Village Hotel to my friends and family.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: A really nice place to stay, but not best for travelling to the city centre.
desc: A great place to stay however transport links are not particularly great to access the city centre. They had friendly staff and a great pool, and a good location for local amenities but less convenient for getting to the centre as it generally involves a 30 minute bus ride. There will soon be a metro right outside, and this will put it in a perfect location. The breakfast was nice, and the rooms were spacious with a nice view over the city skyline!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great stay
desc: 4D/3N stay. Deluxe room is basically as advertized, although seemed slightly smaller in person.  King bed is very comfortable.  A/C works great.  Great rain shower with hot water and good pressure.  There is a mini fridge in the room.  Convenient to many eating options.  No complaints! Pleasantly surprised at breakfast options (especially considering price of room), after reading negative reviews of lack of options, etc. There are bread and pastry, dim sum, cereal, and juice options. Both Eastern and Western foods offered, although there are more Eastern options. Layout is very well organized. There is also an egg station. Breakfast area is very relaxing and not crowded, at least from 7am to 8:30am. Staff were attentive and cleared plates from table. Really enjoyed the

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent Service by Staff at Village Hotel Katong
desc: Our 1 month stay (1 Bedroom service apartment ) was amazing, cleanliness is very well maintained by staff Limin, who also has a great attitude and service with a smile :) Bathroom has a bathtub and best toilet bowl I've seen (wish I could bring it home). Hotel breakfast quality needs to improve though the food service staffs were great. Location is great with lots of popular and famous Singaporean and International food around the area.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Good!
desc: Overall, the room was good. It was good that the staff listened to the requirements well. Thank you for letting me have a good time in Singapore. I will use it again if I have another chance. Thank you.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Village Hotel Katong
desc: The check in was swift and prompt, the place was clean, room was nice and spacious, clean toilets The set back is there is no smoking room in the hotel, as it is a smoke free hotel, for smokers, need to go out of the hotel to smoke and there was no in room dining which was quite sad, you can order food and collect it from reception

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice staff, very clean, some difficulty with equipments.
desc: All staff were so nice and the room was cleaned up perfectly. Had some difficulty with air conditioning, refrigerator, and shower head. Air conditioner couldn’t control the temperature to proper range, refrigerator could not keep beverages cool, and shower head “dances” for loose grip of the shower head holder.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Fabulous!
desc: Beautiful spacious room with calming decor, 5 star hotel beddings n service, good relaxing luxurious lobby, clean++, so many dining options nearby, supermarket in adjoinijg mall that opens till 11pm! N beach just 800m away

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: A very pleasant stay
desc: I stayed in the hotel for about 2 weeks in July 2022. The room (deluxe king) was very spacious and clean and had a great shower bathroom. There were no loud noises; the hotel was very quiet allowing for a good rest. All staff members were very nice and did their upmost to make the stay very pleasant. The location of the hotel is amazing. I love the Katong district. It is very vibrant and full of coffee places and little shops. The hotel is located on top of a little mall with a supermarket, coffee shops, restaurants and spas. I did not take my breakfast at the hotel so I can't comment on that and I had too much fun exploring that I did not get to use the swimming pool or gym! I will gladly return to this hotel.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: One great day experienced at Village Hotel Katong!!
desc: So clean, good service, great food and amenities. Kuddos! We want to come back and stay much longer to enjoy what else the hotel can offer . Also the room are so big to be filled in by 2 persons. Its like we were royalty.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellence service at village hotel Katong
desc: Our stay was absolutely awesome! Kudos especially to the staff especially Madeline and the team at front desk who made our anniversary stay so awesome! We will be coming back to stay when we get back from our cambodia trip before my husband leaves to go back to the US.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: A few days in the city
desc: A great hotel in a great location with easy access to shops, restaurants and shopping malls. Great location for spending time on East Coast on getting on a bus into the city. Very handy having a supermarket underneath the hotel. The staff were very friendly and helpful

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Hotel double charged for stay. Amazing breakfast
desc: I was double charged for my stay upon arrival. Village hotels transferred my booking from another village hotel, then charged for both upon arrival. Front desk staff were unwilling to investigate or escalate issue. Had to contact credit card company and Expedia before I was refunded, one week after stay. Breakfast buffet was amazing. All the service and cleaning staff were great.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Very nice location
desc: Very good hotel to stay, all staff are very friendly, frequent buses available from this hotel to Harbour front (where you can get access to santhosa Island. Food center available near by (84 marine parade central market and food court). East coast beach in very near by, can have a great walking and jogging.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Company Dinner Event
desc: Village Hotel Katong is conveniently located with ample parking for guests... Our organization held a dinner event at the Saffron Ballroom in August. It was a company dinner and dance party and the ballroom had to be decorated before the event. Our organising committee was pleased that the decor team could be on site to do so a few hours before the start of the event. The ambience was ideal and the service provided by the crew was efficient. The audio facilities and equipment were sufficient and food served was of good quality. Perhaps the quantity of food could be more generous. Guests were generally pleased with the taste and presentation of the dishes and wanted more helpings.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Enjoyed my stay...
desc: During my stay, I has the pleasure of being attended by some of the most caring, attentative, and positive staff members. Each and every member encounter was a delite but I was fortunate to interact with Ralish, Lora and Melvin (the taller of the two who is 19 years old) I found myself looking for their faces when leaving or returning to the hotel, so we could share some laughs. Their hospitality was unmatched. The entire staff's hospitality was refreshing and top tier. Thank you all for making my stay that much more pleasant and enjoyable. But Ralish, Lora and Melvin (especially) went above and beyond to make my stay pleasant. Hope they will never forget me because I will never forget them. I will definitely visit again.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Good but not different
desc: The staff is pleasant and helpful. We stayed for 6 nights and it was an enjoyable stay. Airport shuttle service is not available during our stay. Complementary vouchers for restaurants and food outlets are good gestures from the hotel.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Very good
desc: The hotel is beautiful and very clean and the staff is very welcoming. I enjoyed my stay in your hotel. I am very favorable to recommend this hotel to my acquaintances and to anyone who wishes to go to singaoup

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: HAPPY STAY
desc: Clean, Comfy room. Easy check in. Friendly staff. Will come back again to stay. Convenient with many eateries around and ntuc just in the same building. Grab is easy to get. Bus stop just in front of main door.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: The GOLD standard
desc: One of the best experiences I've had for a group setting type conference. EVERYONE in the hotel was welcoming and generous in their service. Amenities, ambience and food were excellent. Thank you Village Hotel for memorable and wonderful stay. From team VS.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: I have enjoyed your hotel
desc: I have never been at Singapore before this is my first trips and I got an oppertunity to stayed such hotel like village hotel katong. In all overcase it's very excellent. During my stayed in your hotel i never got any problem.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Wonderful hospitality beyond expectations
desc: Stay for 4 days and 3 nights as part of an office planning retreat. The place was fantastic in terms of its service. The staff were highly attentive and warm in their welcome. Food served during the stay as part of the days' meetings was very good and the "wok hei" aroma and taste for the noodle dishes made them all the more yummy. Tucked away from the usual town distractions, the place afforded us an excellent and fruitful retreat. Breakfast service was also good. Seriously consider this place for a place if you need a work retreat.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Staycay
desc: Was good. Nice and clean room. Toilet should have bidets.... And i request for seaview room but only got buildings view... Price can be abit reasonable.... Should have more TV channels too.. Would stay again here..

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: My Points
desc: Village Hotel Katong was very good in location and availability. With respectful and kindly staff. But if it has shuttle for transportation and tour will be better. Also increase variety of breakfast.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice location, large rooms, but spartan finishings.
desc: The hotel is located in the heart of vibrant Katong, which offers lots of F&B and shopping options. Arrival is somewhat underwhelming, being that the hotel lobby is reachable only by walking through a shopping mall on the ground floor of the building. The hotel foyer and reception lobby give a feeling of modern luxury. Unfortunately this doesn't carry through to the rooms, certainly not the one on the 'Club Floor' that we were allocated. Cold tile floor throughout a very spacious room. And the furnishings, finishings, and ameneties are very basic.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Relaxing stay in the old historical district
desc: This hotel is located in a historical district where a mixture of chinese, western, and malay cultures exists. This area was the melting pot of those 3 cultures in the early days of Singapore. This location is perfect for you who like to explore on foot. Food-wise, there are literally hundreds of cafes, restaurants, coffee shops, pubs, & other food shops in the area! The hotel itself is calm, connected to a small shopping centre with basic needs like supermarket, hair salon, cafe, & massage shops. Rooms are spacious and clean, with basic amenities that are enough for those who only stay in the room for a few hours in between exploring the area. Room are soundproofed so you will hardly hear someone walking outside your room. Hot and cold water shower with a rain shower head on

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Worst stay ever in my life
desc: checked in around midnight, gave us a room with someone sleeping inside, we almost got heart attack, and there’s also people sleeping in the lobby. Hotel is also not clean, very damp that you can even smell it.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice getaway
desc: Great place to get a change of scenery, especially for locals if you don't live around the Katong area. Conveniently located around many bars, restaurants, supermarkets, shops. Just to note that there isn't any room service or in-house restaurant at the moment, but there is a tie up with a restaurant in the same building to deliver food to your room, albeit not 24 hours.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: GREAT STAY at Perenakan club room and would like to specially commend the service staff khairul for his excellent service!
desc: Had an excellent and enjoyable stay at the Perenakan club room and would like to commend Khairul as he was very friendly and took an extra mile and was patient in accommodating to my request and was very helpful in checking in and specially selected this beautiful room with a very nice bathrub inside the room... it was an enjoyable experience and would definately come back again!! Thanks Khairul for your excellent service.. :) 😀 5 stars to u and your hotel!!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Best Support team for a Wedding
desc: Me and my wife recently had our wedding dinner at Village Hotel Katong, and we had one of the best support from the hotel team that any couple could have. Mr Four Wong Despite the many hiccups we had during planning and actual wedding day, Mr Four Wong was always there to help, from coordination of events between emcee, pa system, cameraman & videographer. To mending my aunt's broken shoes, there was nothing that could faze Mr Four and he help a great deal in ensuring our wedding going through smoothly. Mrs Christine Gao Her help was crucial in coordinating between the different parties in the hotel, Ops, Room Bookings, Room Service. Assisted and advised us on seat planning despite the numerous changes we had through the whole wedding planning period.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Wedding - compliments to staffs
desc: We would like to express our greatest appreciation to 3 staffs who have gone through an extra mile to make our wedding smooth on the 30th Sep 2022. (1) Mr Four Wong: Before the AD, Mr Four shared with us the common dinner flow and took the time to vet through the timeline/responsibilies for every role listed in our evening schedule. On the AD, Mr Four not only borrowed a suit to one of our emcees on last minute notice, but also helped one of our guests to fix her broken heels within 5 minutes, somehow. Overall, Mr Four is a very helpful and experienced banquet operation staff who have successfully coordinated multiple roles inside the banquet hall (emcees, IT, photographer, videographer, couples, waiters...). We were grateful for his support throughout the event planning and

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Not 5 star, but comfortable
desc: Staff are friendly, courteous and mostly obliging. I had trouble getting an outside phone line to make a free international call when I discovered that my credit card had been compromised elsewhere, but perhaps I had been unable to explain my need sufficiently.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Room service not available
desc: The room service and house keeping was terrible. No one answers the call form house keeping or reception. Breakfast was fine but very limited options. Checkout process is very hectic it took us 45 minutes for getting everything cleared.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great experience
desc: Friendly check-in staff. Location close to Parkway Parade and many eateries across the street. Grocery shopping right downstairs. Decent breakfast as well. Great place to stay to explore the east side of Singapore!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Overnight stay
desc: I just spent 2 days and a night in Singapore, visiting friends and rediscovering the city 15 years after my last visit. I've been welcomed by Lora and Thomas, and they were very helpful, making my stay as comfortable as I expected. The room was great, clean and spacious. The hotel is very well located. Shops, bars and restaurants around. The facilities, especially the gym, were very convenient, and open 24/7 with your key card . In a few words, I just recommend there!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Exceptional
desc: The ballroom was well set up prior to the actual event. Four and Sharvin were friendly and rendered their services with their team throughout the event. it was really an enjoyable experience and definitely a pleasure to be able to hold an at Village Hotel Katong.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Evening Event!
desc: Hosted a great event at Village Hotel Katong. Really appreciate Four and Sharvin for their warm assistance and being so hospitable in helping us for set up and logistic. Had a fun and fulfilling event. Thank you VHK.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Indeed A Pleasant Stay For My Child's Birthday
desc: For the very 1st time, i decided to have a staycation with my family to celebrate my youngest child's 4th Birthday in Village Hotel Katong. Upon arrival, We were greeted Mr Ben (Bell Man) once we alighted from the cab and he assisted us swiftly with our baby pram even though it's manageable. Check in process was smooth and we wasn't held up much long as we was the only guest checked in at the point of time which was great! Well, with our young children around and active, it was indeed advantage to us. Haha.. I would say this hotel is in a very convenient location and it has a supermarket (NTUC) just right below to get what you need. As parents with young children, it was easier to grab yummy foodies nearby @ Katong Shopping centre which is just a short distance away. So it

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Subpar experience
desc: Long waiting time for checkin. Lack of luggage assistance despite having 3 young kids in tow. Dirty pillows and spoilt minibar. No room service. Kid-friendly amenities like face/ hand painting and activity books. Room was spacious. Beds and pillows were comfy. Good rainshower. Pleasant breakfast buffet experience. Swimming pool was okay - caution up to 1.8 m depth.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Good to stay when you are in Singapore.
desc: It is not too far from Changi Airport also not too far to go to downtown. Price is reasonable but no plastic bottle in the room is a little bit upset for me. Even though the tap water is WHO recommend to drink I think the visitors would like to get the water bottles.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: AmaZing little gem, must stay!
desc: We have had the most fabulous stay at the village hotel, khishan was incredibly friendly and hospitable at the front desk. We immediately knew we had made the right choice to stay at this hotel. Singapore typically has smaller rooms, not this hotel! Spacious and clean rooms, nice lobby area and lovely staff. Thank you khishan and team for looking after us so well!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Solemnization lunch package
desc: Christine is super helpful and accommodating banquet manager who always on her phone and checking in to understand our needs and do her best to cater our needs, our event was a super smooth one and the operAtion team was also super experienced! Best stay ever!!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Solo Staycation Sep 2022
desc: Stayed for 2 days 1 night in Peranakan Club Room! Huge room with balcony. Lovely part about the room is the bathtub. Suitable for solo or couples as its an open concept. However they also have rainshower with door if want privacy. Giving 4 stars because breakfast was really meh. No egg station and no hot chocolate. Lack of staffs as well. Wish the breakfast was more of peranakan based. Otherwise, decent stay. Friendly staffs. Wifi was strong!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent stay
desc: My wife and I stayed for three very comfortable days. Situated where it is, the hotel is ideally placed from which to explore Singapore and all its attractions. We will be back and recommend it for anyone else looking for excellent and ultra-convenient hotel accommodation in Singapore.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: very good
desc: i like room very much next time i will go to again with family and my friends I hope that your hotel will provide such impressive service again and have a very good promotion. I will recommend my friends to stay here again.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Village Katong Hotel is the best place to stay in Singapore
desc: It was a good hotel with large rooms, clean, and located in the strategic place of Singapore, we were easily to find the tourism and food court over there. additionally we ca take just few minutes to arrive in Marina Bay Sands, The iconic place of Singapore

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Very spacious hotel room
desc: Great hotel with friendly and helpful staff. Large room, comfortable bed, large shower with all amenities. Tea and coffee facility in room. Very quiet, spacious room. Pool is only open from 8am to 8pm which was unfortunate for us as we missed out. Shopping centre within complex with supermarket open till late. Lots of restaurants etc around

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great spot
desc: A great hotel in just about the perfect spot. Right outside the hotel lobby is a nice little spa, grocery store and restaurants. As you exit the street is lined with shops, restaurants desserts and coffee shops.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Pleasant relaxing stay at Village Hotel Katong
desc: I booked our stay direct with Far East Hospitality for my stay at Village Hotel Katong from 08 Sept-20th Sept 2022 because our home was undergoing some renovations. I experienced the BEST customer service support first from Wenddie Teo & the Reservations Team and then at the check-in Front Office (Nora & another staff on 08/09) whete they served me a cup of water because I was coughing so much. And then when I got to my room, my TV was not working & the floor technician team resolved it immediately. The Hotel Duty Mgr Mr Yap also went out of his way together with Wenddie Teo again, to assist me with my last minute request for extension of my stay & I was so so grateful for that. The twin bedroom is so spacious that an extra bed can fit nicely in it & still spacious.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent Overnight Stay
desc: Just one night but would definitely stay again. Clean,well appointed room. Area is super handy for shops and restaurants. Added bonus that lift takes to supermarket and great coffee shop if you need something quickly.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing stay at a lovely hotel
desc: My wife and I have just had an amazing experience at this hotel, such a lovely clean and fresh place to stay. This was a 2 night stop over on our way to see family in UK. A great location and not far from the city or airport. Firstly I can honestly say, the staff and concierge were absolutely top class, very friendly and extremely helpful. Our luggage was lost at the airport, but if it wasn’t for the persistence of Douglas then we may not have located them. Eventually found and picked up. These guys we’re amazing as well as Terrance, the hotel manger who was very concerned for us. Thank you all for this. The hotel breakfast was part of the deal and to be honest, I did not expect much, but was very impressed with the wide selection available. We tried to book here for our

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: very good value for money
desc: Hotel ist located above a shopping mall. Bus stops are not far away. You can ride a bike in the east coast park. The breakfast was good. We had a beautiful view from our room on the 9th floor. I would book the room again.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent!
desc: Excellent service and staff in the hotel. Especially Khishan at the front desk was very supportive, attentive and friendly. Also Ben at the concierge was so helpful during my stay. They made my business trip easier and better. I had very present time at the hotel. Thanks a lot.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice Hotel
desc: I like how I can able to adjust the room temperature. I also like how they have an ironing board and iron. Room was big. My balcony view is the pool. However, there was no bidet in toilets. Would be better if they have.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great place not far from the airport and really friendly staff
desc: We had a great stay, the staff were all really friendly and helpful and our room on the 12th floor was great and very clean. Nice location near the East Coast Park with cafes. We had breakfast at the bakery cafe just in the shopping centre attached to the hotel, and went out locally for dinner. Would definitely stay again!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Singapore stop
desc: On our way to Kuching for Dragon Boat competition, stayed at this hotel & couldn’t be more pleased. Great staff, clean, excellent location & easy to get to tourist areas. Would definitely stay here again.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent service
desc: We arrived on a super early flight way before check jn but the receptionist was so very kind as she could see how tired my 4 year old was and quickly made sure we had a room right away. So good to be able to freshen up and rest before heading out to meet family. As they are constructing the MRT it is rather messy to get to Parkway Parade and the shops across the road but not impossible. Hotel is located near many eateries along Marine Parade on one side and Katong on the other. Just downstairs is Katong V shopping centre where there are also decent options including a Yugoslavian bakery. Supermarket is small but has all the necessities, including beautiful floral arrangements. If you need to be in the area this is quite a good choice though on the pricier side.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Simply wonderful
desc: Me & my wife stayed for one nite in this property. The check in was smooth & pleasant. The room was spacious & very clean. The bathtub location in the room was unique. The hotel location was very prominent & convenient. Many low-rise shop houses. It has those nostalgic environment.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Best service I’ve ever come across
desc: Wish could give 6 stars best service ever experienced. Stayed on a couples staycation and every little detail from how the staff greet to the standard of the room to the room service and helpfulness upon requests was just top notch! Keep it up!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: A good hotel
desc: This my third stay there. The hotel is clean and the service is very good. The staff are always smiling from the front to the housekeeping. I'm recommending this hotel to all my colleagues needing to travel to Singapore. Well done village kayong.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent, spacious, clean comfortable stay.
desc: My family enjoyed our stay in Suite room. Spacious, fully equipped kitchen, clean and dedicated friendly hardworking house keeper Li Min. Thumbs up for her excellent service that made our stay memorable. We will surely return again to stay in same suite room and serviced by Li Min.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great value in an interesting neighborhood
desc: We used the hotel for a short overnight stop in Singapore and found the location excellent for this purpose. It was a short taxi ride (about 15 minutes) from the airport. The area offers plenty of eating options and the Parkway Shopping Mall just over the road. Absolutely hassle-free check-in and check-out. Melvin S, on reception, was fantastic - he was so friendly and efficient and could assist with all sorts of request and queries. Rooms were clean and tidy. Beds comfortable. The hotel provided great value for money based on the rate we paid (which was a great deal in comparison to other options available over the period we stayed). Definitely a great option for a transit stopover.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: A lovely hotel in Singapore
desc: We stayed here for 2 nights after travelling from Paris. We were very fortunate to be given a room early due to a cancellation allowing us to catch up on sleep. Very comfortable room and a lovely pool. The staff at reception were extremely helpful. Our only complaint was that there was such limited choice at breakfast. The only cereals were things like cocao pops. We were surprised to see that there was no muesli. the choices were very limited if you didn't want Asian foods for breakfast

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Hotel, awesome staff
desc: Had a late check in after midnight and check out by midday. My only regret was that I wish it was a longer stay. The staff were amazing, really went out of their way in accommodating any questions we had.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Hospitality
desc: The hotel has a great hospitality experience that everyone can see during the stay. However there should be hotel shuttle bus from hotel to airport and vise versa which can maximize their hospitality service to the higher standard.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: A comfortable hotel in an interesting area 14 mins from airport
desc: We thoroughly enjoyed our stay. We chose the hotel as it is in easy reach of the airport. We were impressed by the clean and stylish lobby and the welcome we were given as we arrived. . We found all the staff extremely welcoming and helpful. Both members of staff in reception were very kind and helped us with information about the area. The room was exceptionally clean, comfortable and quiet. The bed and pillows were very comfortable. The concierge arranged for a taxi to arrive in the morning in plenty of time for our flight. We will recommend to friends and hope to stay again.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent start to celebrate our 50th Anniversary
desc: We had a wonderful night at the village hotel katong. After being checked in by Lara we were greeted by Thomas. Since we were celebrating our 50th anniversary we were upgraded to a beautiful spacious suite. Thomas was also generous to invite us for drinks and appetizers. Thanks to everyone we had an excellent stay. Looking forward to our stay in December on our way back home to Canada.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great venue for business meetings
desc: I enjoyed my stay at the Village Hotel Katong during our 3-day business meeting. All the staff are so friendly and helpful. Special thanks to Kelly, Guha, Kelvin, Alex and Four who gave special attention to our team! The rooms are exceptional! Very clean and well designed, spacious and with balcony. Breakfast was okay - choices are quite limited but good enough to keep me going for the day. Location is excellent with so many food places around, supermarket and bakery within the building, and near to shopping malls. Very accessible to buses that can take you to the nearest MRT station or city area. The lunch and tea break snacks were all good! Everyone loved the salmon sandwiches and spinach quiche! The meeting room is decent size for our team of 30 pax. Highly recommended!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Recommend short stay only
desc: Pros Close to Changi airport,buses and old airport road food centre ,good bed Cons Cable Tv programs about 15 years old and repeated 4 times a day ,no Netflix , room decor dated ,mould on ceilings and walls,had to call maintenance twice not 4 star

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great hotel just outside of the main tourist and business district
desc: Great place with top facilities. To stay in a residential area of Singapore with may local shops, restaurants and bars. A great place to experience a bit of the daily life of Singaporeans. The hotel boasts, next to being a great place to stay, a supermarket, hairdresser and bakery amongst other shops in the same building. Personnel is professional and friendly.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great hotel
desc: When I choose this hotel I was panicking it was to far out, how wrong was I. All you need to do it catch the number 10 bus which is right outside the hotel & it takes about 10-15 mins depending on how many stops the bus makes & you can get off outside the Fullerton hotel in the marina bay it’s as easy as that & then catch it on the opposite side of the road to get back so it’s in a perfect location. Katong has loads of bars & eating places right outside the hotel which is great. We were room only so we had breakfast in the shopping centre right under the hotel in a place called bread & hearth it was amazing & reasonable priced. The pool was really nice & we did use it a few times to chill. We had a club room which was great very comfortable & clean

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: I like it here! Great service! ! The location is very good, there is a supermarket downstairs and there are many deli
desc: I like it here! Great service! ! The location is very good, there is a supermarket downstairs and there are many delicacies nearby, the key point is that the room is clean and big enough, and... People who like balconies, this is the best choice! Every room in this hotel has a balcony! Booked a deluxe king room and was very lucky to be upgraded to a Baba club room that day! I'm so happy 🥰 Big room, beautiful and bathing. Thank you very much for the kind and beautiful Miss Jamie at the front desk. I will come again next time! Have a great day!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: We left shortly after check-in
desc: Very surprised that this hotel has such good reviews. I have never checked out of a hotel pretty much immediately after arriving but we left this one and stayed elsewhere. Luckily we were able to find something else on the same day. Upon arriving, the room was damp, moldy, and had stains on the bedding and hair on the bed. Not acceptable for SG Clean or for a 4 Star. For reference, we stayed at another 3 star in Singapore prior to this and had a wonderful experience (very clean, well-run etc.). I would not recommend the Village Hotel Katong at all.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: My room was washed once
desc: My room was washed once during my stay from Monday to Friday, thank you anyway because everything else was perfect, I hope that soon the same mistake will not be made. In summary, apart from the room problem, I can say that the service provided was perfect.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent staff and good location for food
desc: I stayed at the Village Hotel Katong twice in the same month with a 2 weeks gap in between. All the Front Office staff were friendly and very helpful, in particular the 2 staff named Melvin C and Melvin S. My requests were dealt speedily and always with a smile. What impressed me most was when I returned the 2nd time, all the staff remembered me including my name. Melvin even remembered the previous room number as it was the same as my vehicle number. Complimentary parking coupons were provided when requested. The room was very comfortable and a good size. Housekeeping was great at the 1st stay but the 2nd stay (on another floor) was not as good (mugs were not cleaned and toiletries not replaced) - different staff cleaned the room. Location not close to MRT but when the new MRT

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Very good place to stay
desc: Wow, this hotel is a nice to stay... Been there twice for my staycation. Very cozy room, clean and their service is excellent. Will recommend for those who wanna stay for a short or long period.. Great value and affordable.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Not worth the price
desc: I (35F) stayed at the Parnakan club room for 4 nights. It was definitely not worth the price, especially compared to the previous hotels I visited in Singapore. Pros: - The staff was really nice and helpful, I got early check-in (12am) and late check-out (2pm) for free - The bathtub was wonderful Cons: - The room smelled moldy, and the air was very damp all the time even though the air condition was on - The air condition vents were filthy - There were many breakfast options but the food was not very tasty - I didn’t get access to the club lounge even though I had booked a club room - Location is not great: the nearby malls are very small and a long way to MRT. Busses work well though.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Personal Experience
desc: Amazing experience , quality service from the staff and excellent cleanliness. The location was top notch as it is nearby to many shops , malls , bars and so many varieties of restaurants. I highly recommend a stay here as you are guaranteed to enjoy a vacation or even a staycation.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Experiencing Village Hotel Katong
desc: Staying at Village hotel was superb with beautiful location. Room is large spacious with balcony on every room. Swimming pool and Gym are quiet and calm. Breakfast is superb with variety of foods. Staffs at the frontdesk are very helpful with smiley faces.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: -na-
desc: Check-in was smooth and the staff was polite. The room was spacious and clean. Loved the rain shower. Balcony had a nice view, overlooking Joo Chiat area. The hotel is close to East Coast Park and a lot of good food. Spoilt for choices.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Very pleasant stay
desc: The stay at the hotel was very pleasant. The service provided was very good and the personnel very welcoming. I'll totally recommend it for others. There is a bus station located at both hotel entrances, it facilitates going in the city.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Poor Service
desc: Stayed at hotel for 9 days - booked two rooms. Pros: Concierge was extremely helpful. Room large; bed comfy. Room and Bathroom clean. Cons: Extremely poor room service - heavy reliance on app. Housekeeping also not reliable - did not attend when light was switched on. Reception attitude lethargic. Never responded to request for one of two rooms booked to be changed to a twin room. Location is far from everything. Due to iffy service, will not be staying here again.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Family Staycation
desc: It was a family staycation as we had a wedding nearby the hotel on the same evening. We had 4 rooms in total as we came with a big family. We had a great time during our stay. Kids were also occupied with activity books given by the hotel. We were attended by Melvin & Queenie! They were very helpful and professional! Thank you!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Can be better
desc: A good hotel with opportunities for improvement. Hotel in good location. Rooms need maintenance. Cleaning needs improvement. The closing down of the nonya restaurant is disappointing. The wine outlet right in front of the hotel makes the hotel almost invisible. Not good.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Uncomfortable aircon
desc: Freezing cold air from the aircon, even after turning the fan to low and the temperature to high. Very uncomfortable to sit at the desk and do work. When turning the aircon off it soon became very humid and uncomfortable

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Pleasant stay
desc: Had a staycation here as part of my birthday celebration. Khishan, who handled my check-in, upgraded us to a suite room when he knew we were celebrating my 60th birthday. The room was spacious with a mini kitchenette and even had a washing machine. It will be goid for families & suitable for longer stays. Bedding was comfortable too.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Will be returning!!
desc: Would definitely recommend! Staff welcoming and helpful from the very first conversation. Large room with comfortable bed. Situated on top of a shopping mall with supermarket and other eateries, hawkers style eating 5 mins walk. Beach with beautiful gardens 10 min walk. You have all that you need within walking distance. Will definitely return.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Repeat Stay
desc: Room was big and spacious. Enjoyed the comfy and quiet room. Always our choice to have a short break from work. Got a free upgrade to club room and the bathtub was good. Enjoying every stay when we were there. Thanks.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Hotel Friendly staff
desc: This is a very clean hotel and the staff is kind. Also quiet area and accessible to mall and other daily needs, Near the Airport and lots of restaurant around.I would love to stay in this Hotel again.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: 5 Star experience
desc: Amazing experience, very friendly & professional service, we even got upgrades as we celebrated my son's 19th birthday. The breakfast was delicious, and location is ideal as we are close to the beach, also the airport and even downtown. Great food in the vicinity and historical charm

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Awesome hospitality at village hotel Katong!
desc: We had our wedding dinner at village hotel Katong. The wedding coordinator Christine and her team has been super accomodating to us as we had to postpone our wedding date once due to covid in October. On the actual day of the wedding, the floor manager and his team of staffs was very attentive to our needs as well as the guests. There were also sufficient number of servers to attend to every table. We also had a very pleasant 2 night stay at the hotel which is part of our package. The location of the hotel is very convenient as it is close to shopping centres and good food hunts. We will definitely recommend village hotel Katong to any couple who is planning their wedding day banquet:) thanks again to all the staffs of village hotel Katong!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Very good experience
desc: I chose Katong V for the Dec 26 2022 wedding lunch reception of my younger daughter. My older daughter found this place during pre covid as she had a good feel about it and we held on to it through the 2 covid years. And she is so right as the event which finally happened in 2022 turned out beautifully. My family and friends had the most amazing time and were truly impressed with katong V. We would like to thank the staff who helped made the event successful and enjoyable. Christine Gao who is the assistant catering manager helping us with this event has been very helpful, understanding, patient, thorough, efficient, friendly and always accessible and ready to help make our planning journey easy, enjoyable and stressfree for us. We are very grateful to have her guiding and

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Wonderful accommodation & helpful staff
desc: I've booked multiple rooms for my wedding stay here in Village Hotel Katong. Prior to the actual check in day, Fad was helpful in giving us a room tour of the room types that we booked for. As we have many family members staying at Village Hotel Katong, we've made multiple request (such as connecting rooms and neighbouring units) with the acknowledgement of subject to availability. We're thankful for the team here in Village Hotel Katong especially Krish, Fad, Queenie & Melvin Chia for accommodating our request to the best of their abilities. This has made our wedding weekend a swift one. In addition, I'm extending my gratefulness to the housekeeping team Lily for cleaning our rooms thoroughly. Thank you team once again for making our stay here a memorable one.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great care by staff
desc: Check in was wonderful with Melvin being very caring and meticulously settling the room arrangements. 1114 was huge with lots of room. When there was a slight issue Ezzuan speedily resolved it with a room swap to 1020. although smaller the view was beautiful. All the duty managers eg Kailesh and especially Vignes took great care of us when there was an issue with the Agoda booking and they managed to resolve matters in a way that made us feel at home. Vignes spent literally hours clarifying with the agent and later helping process payment. I was especially warmed by his efforts and Melvin who diligently helped with all our logistic needs and was always on hand to provide any help necessary. He was always friendly and genuinely makes you feel welcomed. Thank you for a

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Short but sweet stay
desc: Had to book a last minute accommodation since our place had a power outage. Chanced upon VHK which provided good value for money considering it was last minute booking. Enjoyed our short stay here and would definitely come back.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Family staycation
desc: Review for our stay - room 929 and some of our extended family (cant remember their hotel rooms) . We celebrated our cousin's henna night room 504 . Thanks to all the staff in the hotel for accomodating to our needs especially staff name Fad , Queenie and Melvin Chia . They are friendly from the time we entered the hotel till our last stay . Check in was swift as staff tried their best to cater our request . Concierge was great for letting our lugage stored in the hotel while waiting for room to be ready .

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent
desc: Was feeling down when I entered the hotel. I was greeted by the fragrance of the hotel. Welcomed by the smiling faces of hotel staff:) I was served well and had a free upgrade of the room. When I saw the room, I started dancing around as I was so happy. Even though it was a short stay, I enjoyed myself fully.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent staff
desc: Very friendly staff at the reception and the restaurant. We were given vouchers for restaurants in de neighbourhood, a very nice touch, And the staff allowed us to use the shower after check-out on the day of departure.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent well priced hotel in interesting part of the city
desc: What a great find. We have been to Singapore several times and seen all the major sights. This was an overnight stay between flights and was ideal. Near to Airport and in a really interesting location. Near a huge mall, and walk to East Coast park, and at the rear of the hotel more traditional restaurants and shops. If you want somewhere different in Singapore which is well priced, comfortable, clean and excellent service than this is for you.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Not what I expected
desc: Long wait for check-in. Not being provided an estimated time cause staff didn’t want to be blamed. Recovery was bad. Bedroom floor was not as clean as I expected from the reviews I read. Place was nice though, and convenient since the mall was connected to it. Overall felt the price was not worth it and there are cheaper hotels with better service and cleanliness

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Given the wrong room key that actually worked! I walked into someone else room bc the hotel had double booked us.
desc: Incredibly shocking experience. We checked in, got the room key, asked them to take our bags up, and went to grab dinner. When we returned to our room and used the given card key to open the door, there was a man lying on the bed with our luggage not to be seen anywhere. Turns out the hotel double booked us and gave both us and the man the same room with key cards that worked. I have never had such a shocking hotel experience and don’t want to imagine if it was the other way around. I did not feel safe. The manager was kind though and offered us a cab and complimentary stay for our experience, but that was one of the worst shocks I’ve ever had while staying at a nice hotel. Everything else was great but this was a pretty bad mistake on their part. Also the floors in the room

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Wonderful service
desc: Staff are happy and friendly, ambience was great and relaxing. Stayed for one night to celebrate my partners birthday and they left us wishing that we could stay longer. They wrote him a happy birthday card and offered a slice of cake which was unfortunately not vegan as it contained egg and dairy. We were blown by the hospitality, when we accidentally broke our handheld mirror and needed help cleaning up the shards, the reception went to our aide and cleaned it up himself as the cleaning team had already left for the day.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: A Great Stay
desc: I thoroughly enjoyed my stay, it's place a great but most of all the staffs there that makes the difference,friendly and helpful. I'll definitely be staying there the next I'm in Singapore and for sure I'll be telling family and friends in Indonesia

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Staycation at Village Hotel Katong
desc: Thanks to Michael for the warm welcome to the hotel. Everything was good. Room is nice. Bed is comfortable. Breakfast was good! The swimming pool will be perfect if they cater to the needs for little children.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great East Coast Escapade
desc: Village Katong is a unique hotel set in the East. It not only reflects but celebrates the heritage and nuances of the history and uniqueness of eastern Singapore. A lovely and delightful experience for all.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Fitting size friendly hotel in Katong
desc: Cosy hotel near beach (10 min by walk). Friendly staff, big rooms, pool, Pernakan club lounge with nice food and cocktails in the evening. Shopping center and a lot of different kind of restaurants nearby. Easy acces to airport and citycentre. Surely will come back!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Holiday trip - Singapore onto New York
desc: Excellent service with all staff . Even the simple greetings gestures from all staff .Nothing to much to help out /or attend to any of our request . Location was in a very lively area after going out to explore the surrounding area. - access to the city centre very quick and affordable. Generally a very great experience for our whole family group (6 persons )

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: A gem of a hotel on the east coast of Singapore
desc: We had the pleasure of staying in this hotel for a month. The pros 1) staff are all very polite and helpful; Limin, Kalish, Queenie.from reception, concierge, housekeeping and F & B 2) the pool is an oasis of calm and tranquility 3) big room with east facing balcony, comfortable bed with first class linen 4) wifi is good as hotel wifi goes 5) quiet environment ; very prized in Sg. 6) convenient location with bus stops on the doorstep to Orchard Road and Changi airport. 7) limitless choice of eateries nearby and within the building. A superb supermarket in the basement 8) walking distance to the superb East Coast seaside. Cons Our initial allocated room was an issue due to condensation. We wrote to the general manager personally but never got a reply. However Mr Kalish saved

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Good Stopover Hotel
desc: We decided to break our journey close to the airport for one night. Hotel was comfortable and clean,we chose a club room to be able to use the Peranakan lounge,it was pleasant. Close to lots of eating and bars,coffee shops etc. Will be most attractive to travel into the city when the MRT is completed. Website showed a complimentary shuttle to the airport,this was not available,but we were offered a complimentary taxi ride,it was a much appreciated gesture,thank you. Staff friendly and helpful. Very interesting area to discover.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Hotel with Amazing Staff
desc: Great hotel. The room was clean and super comfy. Staff was very helpful and friendly. Breakfast had amazing choices, kept us going for a good while. Location good,bars/restaurants all within walking distance. Definitely recommend. Shoutout to Melvin and Manager Kalish!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Perfect Stay
desc: Very big hotel rooms, nice roomy shower with rainhead in a spacious bathroom, very comfy beds and nice view from the balcony. Service was immaculate, the room was cleaned up every day. All personell was very nice.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent service
desc: We had a 1 night staycation in this hotel,. Service was excellent, room was big and clean and staff were very professional. Only inconvenience was the entrance to the hotel, other than that all was good.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: More memories made
desc: Loved this hotel. This is our 4th visit to Singapore, but have always stayed centrally. Never again after visiting Katong. Here are where the locals live, wonderful. The hotel staff are amazing, really helpful. Yes the hotel is a little tired but it is superb, very clean and so close to bus and train routes. We booked the lounge, Ben the host was so professional and always ensuring that you had everything that was required. A wonderful gentleman and a credit to the company, they must be so proud of him. Thank you

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Wonderful experience
desc: wonderful experience staying in this hotel, there is a supermarket at the basement which makes the trip easier. every room has a balcony and is quite big. as a foreigner i feel welcome there. the location is very convenient.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Staying in Village hotel Katong
desc: the staff was welcoming, nice and amazing. at the minute that I arrived to the entrance, a staff member helped me with my luggage. the room was pretty nice, clean, and the smell was good all over the hotel. at the same street of the hotel there were a lot of pubs, supermarkets, Starbucks, seven-elven, and so on. After the check-out the staff helped with cab ordering, which was great. I hope I will manage to visit in Singapore again, and if I do, I probably will stay at the Village hotel Katong.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Late check in & poor service at club lounge. Did not even get to experience club lounge and the staff was so unpleasant.
desc: We did not get our room till 6.20pm. And I was not able to get to the club lounge till 7.40pm as we were tired from all the waiting. And when we went to the club lounge, the staff refused to get us drinks although we mentioned that we were able to drink finish by 8pm. Very rude and poor service. I wasted my money to get to the club lounge access :(

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Awesome and will come back
desc: The Staff Mr Khishan spoke so softly and excellently. I felt a warm welcome. Such a polite person and speaks well. Appreciate and am very happy. Will recommend my friends about this hotel.
