Another person was so nice too. Mr Melvin , when u call for some ice cubes, without delay he brought to me and spoke well . Polite too. Thank you for the hospitality. 🙏

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice
desc: Good location and very relaxing experience. Balcony door a bit tough to open but overall excellent experience. Excellent for couples, families and friends. Rooms are clean and cosy. Anyone would enjoy the stay.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Business conference room rental service is awesome
desc: We rent a conference room for 8 ppl. The setting including the facility, coffee, tea and lunch buffet are just so nice. Especially the service from Sharuin is very supportive and kind. Highly recommended for conference room rental !

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Very Good
desc: The room and service are just very good, just a bit difficult to reach out MRT station. very satisfied with the breakfast food, so many choices, but will be good if each room is available for 2 pax, instead of 1 pax.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Good Hotel
desc: We love this hotel. Quiet, clean and very friendly and professional staff at the front desk. Beds and pillows are most comfortable and the AC works beautifully giving us a cool environment when we come back from a day of walking in the Singapore heat. Finally, thanks to the good cleaning staff, especially to Punitha, our bed linen and the bathroom are freshen and clean everyday. Punitha is very thorough in her cleaning and very friendly and obliging. Hwee T.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Clean, Convenient
desc: I felt comfortable to stay at Village Hotel. Room is quite spacious and clean. Hotel location is easy to commute to department and convenient stores. However, I expect more variety of food in breakfast restaurant.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Fantastic option for Singapore stay
desc: We picked this hotel because it was close to the airport and the East Coast Park and Beach. It is located close to shops and a wonderful hawkers market. There was a lot of construction nearby for the new metro station which will make it even more accessible. The hotel is really well presented, exceptionally clean and modern. All of the staff were wonderful but the reception staff and porters really go above and beyond, The rooms are modern, spacious, impeccably clean and quiet. The showers were wonderful (rain head) and even more appreciated after 3 weeks of enduring the pathetic excuses for showers in the UK. We will definitely pick this as a very affordable and well located hotel for any stay overs through Singapore. I cannot recommend it highly enough.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Complimentary Drinks & Canopies
desc: When you realise the second week of your trip they do complimentary drinks and canopies everything evening for 2-hrs 👍 great hotel, lovely staff and fantastic location. Ben on Level 4 is a real gentleman.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great hotel to stay around Joo Chiat district
desc: i stayed here for 5 nights for a conference. everything was great. the room is very nice, clean, and sleep well. bathroom is also big enough and also can drink tap water in this hotel. Around the hotel has a fairprice supermarket which is very convenient for shopping. Across the hotel has a lots of bar, food, ice-cream place for you and also starbucks.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great location, fantastic service, spacious room!
desc: Had a fantastic staycay on 7th Jan! What i loved: 1) Location - lots of good food within walking distance and fairprice finest right at the doorstep 2) Staff - Vignes, who assisted us with the check-in, was friendly, humorous and very helpful. Young lady at the club lounge was very attentive and friendly too! 3) Peranakan Club Room - spacious, clean, huge bathtub Would definitely return and recommend!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Stay to visit our first Grandchild
desc: We stayed for a week between 20th and 27th December and our room was near the lift so was noisy, and also the patio doors could not be opened and when "fixed" we had a gap around the door where the trim was removed this meant that we had noise from outside and a draft, when we advised the manager (Vignas), we advised that we were returning the following week 3rd Jan, he agreed that the room was not acceptable and returned with a bottle of champagne which my wife and I both thought was a nice touch, but when we returned the 3rd Jan he had also upgraded our room to the 6th floor which meant we had access to the Peranenkan lounge which also meant we could have breakfast in comfort and also access to the cocktail lounge in the evening. We thought that he went above and beyond to

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great stay, wonderful customer care
desc: We had an amazing stay at Village Katong - family room (with 2 queen beds). Absolutely clean and comfy, will definitely be back. I wanna give a special shout-out to the wonderful staff members, especially Kishan - he is a true gem, he made my family’s stay a wonderful one. Thank you for the amazing and kind customer care.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Nic stay
desc: During our brief two-night stay at the hotel, we had an overall satisfactory experience. The reception staff welcomed us warmly and facilitated a hassle-free check-in process. Our spacious and clean room was pleasant, although we encountered an issue with excessive moisture. The hotel's location was decent, albeit not the most convenient for accessing Singapore's main attractions. However, it was conveniently situated near public transportation options. One point of contention for us was the requirement for a deposit, despite having already paid all fees in advance. Overall, our stay was satisfactory, with some room for improvement.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Awesome hotel & staff
desc: We stayed here two days before our 24-day Asia cruise and one day after our Asia cruise. We arrived early morning on both stays. We thought we'd just bring our luggages and leave them there until check-in time. Well, they had our room already ready for us and let us check-in without charging us one day early. Such accommodating staff! If we wanted, we could have used the gym and swimming pool at no charge. The hotel building has many other amenities such as a grocery store, bakeries/coffee shops and massage/spa. We took advantage of the foot and body massage. It was wonderful! The location is very convenient. There are nearby bus stops and bakeries. There's a food court with variety of good foods across the street where we ate our dinners. Bottom line up front ... we enjoyed

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Beautiful room & excellent service
desc: Sadly we only stayed one night. Our room was excellent with every facility you need, with our being pretentious. Reception staff were welcoming & polite & very helpful. Front of House manager was beyond excellent. While we waited for our airport transfer we were invited to a private lounge to enjoy complimentary food & drinks, then provided with access to the gym & pool where we could swim and relax before freshening up with a shower, towels provided. we have almost exclusive! How wonderful to swim in the pool with barely anyone around with people enjoying the evening 6 floors down on the street! Heaven! Thank you!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Incredible five star hotel in a budget. GreT transportation bgrocery store. Mall gym. Staff. Huge room. Comfortable bed
desc: Almost the most five star hotel I’ve ever been in ( without a five star rating and not expensive price). What a great room. Mgr. upgraded me to lounge access for free when he saw how travel weary I was. Here’s to you. Huge room. Clean. Good gym. Bathroom. Service. Great trendy neighborhood. High end grocery store and mall next door. Ease of even bus transportation. $128 on Hotwire.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: good hotel and service
desc: the hotel is situated near eating places and big supermarket in the same building.bus stop walking distance but no MRT station .Easy to travel by bus.Rooms are big and clean .Bathroom clean and a good shower.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Could have stayed longer!
desc: Excellent 2 night stay. close to shops and cafes. Will be even better when new station is opened. Staff were amazing Plenty of vouchers. Check in and out was seamless. Easy to get a taxi or catch a bus.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Just outstanding
desc: The best staff in the businesses, the personal attention is absolutely awesome. The location is very convenient. The room was spacious, clean and well appointed. The Club Lounge was really good too. We will certainly return.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Club Lounge floor
desc: This was a lovely Hotel they went above and beyond to accommodate us. Location was okay you were close to bus access and Highway access. We stayed in a club room and had the lounge access for breakfast and evening refreshments. The staff in the club lounge were exceptional!!!. Ben was always attentive and a great source for local information. Excellent conversationalist. All the staff, Chandra,Jamie and Ben, at the lounge ensured your stay was good We had a small issue with our room and the assistant manager Vigneswaran Avalee, remedied the situation immediately. The outside upstairs pool was nice. The only drawback was the steam room and related facilities were confusing. They were co-ed (meaning shared lockers, shared change room and washroom!). This was not comfortable

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Family reunion in our childhood home.
desc: The choice of hotel was deliberately selected for the location... this met all our hopes. (we used to live a short distance from here in the 1960's!!) It was great to explore the area and easy to get to Changi Village to visit Pulau Ubin and enjoy the boardwalk there.... Look out for the completion of the MRT stations as this will then be a perfect place to explore Singapore!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Spot in Katong
desc: I've been a fan of Katong and specifically this hotel. However, the Far East Booking staff have been a major disappointment. I received an email from Aiman about 10 days before my trips that the "cheapest rate for your date of stay are in the SG 300 to SGS 400 dollar range". When I told her that third party sites were selling rooms much cheaper, I was asked to send a screenshot. After I sent a screenshot from Agoda, I never heard from Aiman again. A few days later, I heard from Christina Glory A/P Pakinathan - Senior Reservation Sales Executive. She mentioned she said that the Management Team would "get in-touch soon" but also I would never hear from anyone again. I decided to post this as there are "best rate guarantee" cards all over the hotel plus asking to "Share your

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Good Hotel for Business Travellers
desc: The hotel is clean, bright, quaint and have wonderful facilities. Great location to be at the center of Food Paradise. Far from the nearest train station. But public transport gets you everywhere. Lots of amenities to get last minute shopping before heading home.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice stay in Katong Singapore
desc: We have enjoyed our stay in the hotel. Location of the hotel is perfect, very convenient for everything. Lobby area, rooms are cozy and beautifully decorated. Breakfast is rich with Singapore, Chinese and I Indian specialties. Highly recommended!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice room and good breakfast.
desc: Room was nice. And the breakfast buffet was good. Hotel is a ways out from city center. Taxi ride to city-center cost me S$17. All Sing hotels are expensive these days. And this hotel was the best priced for a decent hotel, i could find.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: An Amazing Stay, With Super Hospitality
desc: I spent two weeks in Singapore on a business trip and stayed at Village Hotel Katong. Not only were the rooms super spacious and accommodating, with a great shower too, the gym facility was a great bonus. But most of all, I'd like to shout out the incredible staff at the hotel. From Khairul at the front desk, who always greeted me with a huge smile and helped me with a number of small things during my stay, to Ben at the Lounge restaurant who provided fantastic service at all times (and has a fantastic music taste, too!!). I really enjoyed my time spent there — the staff felt like a family. The hotel felt like a home away from home. Would 100% stay again.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Had a great time at Hotel Village Katong
desc: Wonderful stay at this hotel Large clean room with balconies Friendly management and staff and great location for food as East Coast Road where there are many cafes and restaurants and Marine Parade (where there are hawker stalls and Parkway Parade is)

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Thank you for good service.
desc: Strategic location with bus stop right in front. Walking distance to number of restaurants. Comfy room for business trip, with 🛁. Hotel breakfast normal. Good room cleaning from LiMin. Worth the price

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Company Retreat
desc: Our retreat last Saturday was a success and we have received positive feedback from our members regarding the place, food and hospitality. Hence, I am writing to express my thanks and appreciation for the service we received at Village Hotel Katong, Saffron Ballroom. Although Idham took over our portfolio less than 2 months to the event, he knew what was going on. Nearing the event, he never failed to answer my questions promptly and fulfilled our special requests to the best of his abilities. Idham also consistently checked on us before and during the actual event, which is very reassuring as it was my first time organizing a retreat. I would also like to express gratitude to Mr Four Wong for being so professional, reliable and proactive on the event day. He was very

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Stay!
desc: The stay was perfect from start to end. I would like to particularly mention Queenie who assisted me at Check in, she was friendly, smart and made me feel very welcome. Mevin S is another gem to the team. He was patient, able to emphatise and communicated very clearly which was very helpful and nice. Kudos for having a great team at the Front Desk which enhances the guest experience from the get go. We had an enjoyable and memorable stay despite just being there for the night. We will definitely recommend and stay again if the opportunity arises. Big thanks again to Queenie and Mevin! Cheers!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Family friendly
desc: Great family friendly with friendly staff. 4 of us stayed in room with two twin beds, great attention to detail, clean room with fridge, balcony locked so no risk to children. Swimming pool clean and well maintained. Lots of different restaurants and bakeries and supermarket very close by

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Pristine Service and Accommodating Venue
desc: My organisation had a retreat meeting at Village Hotel Katong and it was an experience to remember. Idham assisted us from the booking up till the end of the session and showed professionalism throughout the entire time. The food served was delicious and everyone enjoyed it. The location is also convenient for cars and public access. Thanks Idham and team for making this a very memorable experience! We will definitely come back for more events.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Recommend to Stay
desc: I held my wedding at Village Hotel Katong in April and I have only the best words to describe the exceptional service & comfort I have received from the staff during my stay. From the planning phase to queries & assistance, the team in Village Hotel Katong has by far provided me with a remarkable experience.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Good location
desc: Good location for a meal in the evening but need to take a bus to closest MRT station to get into the city. Breakfast was awful and made us sick. Cold food with little European offerings. Don’t use the shampoo in rooms!!! Destroyed my long hair.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Hotel
desc: From start to finish the hotel staff were friendly, polite and helpful. The breakfast buffet was excellent. The variety of choice amazing. From full English to Continental to chicken curry, rice and noodles, porridge, fruit etc. The hotel is clean. The room spacious. Comfortable bed and the shower was to die for. Handy having a supermarket, cafes and shops directly under the hotel. The staff allowed us to store our cases on checking out and use the gym and pool for the day. We couldn't fault it.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Pretty Poor......won't be staying there again!
desc: Parking.....could not get a receipt from the machine, so had to contact the parking company for one....not a good start. The hotel reception experience was great. The room was fine, except for being woken up by workmen outside at 5am and the Biffa lorry at 6am! The restaurant.....where do I start. Booked a table, nobody manning the front of house, so waited around for 10 minutes. Finally, got bored and went and found a member of staff myself, in order for me to sit down at a table. Menu was pretty poor, unless you wanted a burger! I had to pay for my meal before I got it, even though I was a hotel guest? I was told it was because people were eating and then doing a 'runner'......probably because they couldn't get a staff member so they could pay for their meal!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great stay
desc: First time staying at Village Hotel Katong and would recommend this hotel to anyone. Great location with easy access to transport, eateries and entertainment. Polite and helpful staff with great amenities

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great stay
desc: We had a very pleasant stay at the hotel. The staff couldn’t do enough for us. Kenneth was very helpful, guiding us to touristy places, telling us how to get places and where to eat. The rooms were spotless, the AC and showers worked well.there were nice fluffy towels and comfy bed. The location was very good with lots of restaurants nearby. It was also very handy for buses into the city centre.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Beautiful Hotel and so welcoming.
desc: Beautiful hotel and so welcoming. We booked an executive room so had use of the club lounge. The rooms are huge and exceptional clean. Nice roof top pool, again for us what made our stay were the staff so helpful and friendly. Would highly recommend a stay here if in Singapore.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Perfect place to stay for a family of 4
desc: The family room we booked was spacious. We loved the balcony view our room had. The beds were very comfortable and clean. The bathroom amenities are complete and you can request for extra kids, should you need any. The breakfast buffet is awesome. Although a slight variety would be nice especially for long staying guests. The hotel location is perfect for those planning to go around as the bus stops are close. There are lots to do around the area and is also relatively close to the airport. Overall we loved our stay!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Can’t wait to go again
desc: We had a two nights layover and chose this place because of the pool and the balcony. It proved to be a great choice and we would not hesitate to return to this area and specifically in this hotel. From the moment we checked in Lara really looked after us, and made our visit special. Location – very good indeed. Taxis are freely available and there are lots of buses to all areas of the island. It would benefit from an MRT station nearer to it, but I think they are in the process of building work. Other than that, the lower Eastside area it is located in is very much up-and-coming. Lots of fantastic bars and restaurants are right on your doorstep along with several supermarkets. Rooms – big and comfortable. Ours had a shower and a bath which was great along with a very

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Very professional and responsive
desc: Incredibly friendly and helpful team - thank you. One suggestion: It is possible to walk the beach front - accessed via a nearby under-pass. Luckily we'd researched this as the hotel staff weren't aware of the underpass. Thank you for a great experience and for your kindness and support to us.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Holiday of a lifetime
desc: Hotel was well presented with great staff. Punitha was our awesome houskeeping person. She was 5 star!! Pool was great. Central to most things with a lively atmosphere and many shops and cafes and restaurants available.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great stay
desc: I had the pleasure of staying at Village Hotel Katong during my recent business trip. The room was spacious, clean, and well-equipped for my needs, and the staff was incredibly professional and attentive.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: nice lobby and disgusting and not cozy room
desc: at first glance a nice hotel, after opening the room a disappointment, floor without carpet, noisy air conditioner, slamming door that won't close quietly, neighbors woke me up late at night and early in the morning

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Lovely hotel, great location!
desc: We stayed at Village Hotel Katong in April/May 2023. The hotel was beautifully clean, well-presented and relaxing. The location of the hotel is just outside of the major tourist areas, so I found it to be relaxed, and safe and we could wander around like locals. There were ample staff available at the hotel for assistance at any time. The rooms were comfortable and cleaned daily, and the staff were very polite and respectful of us at all times. The hotel is above a small shopping complex comprising a supermarket where you can purchase a wide variety of everyday household groceries at reasonable prices. There are cafes, hairdressers and bakeries within the complex also, and it is open until around 11pm. The hotel is between two major roads - Marine Parade Road (where you

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Many nearby restaurants
desc: Stay at this hotel with my family. The hotel is close to restaurants. There is a grocery store on the same building along with a few shops. Right outside the hotel there are numerous restaurants to eat at.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Perfect place to be
desc: Perfect location to be. In the nice Peranakan environment, footwalk to East cost park, near Changi airport, supermarket in the basement, pool, gym, quiet, best ever showers, nice view, all you need to make your stay very enjoyable.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Experience
desc: Jamie at front desk was so helpful and friendly during our check in. She was able to get us an upgrade. I am really enjoying my stay here and the room especially. Would definitely return here again! Thank you Jamie and team

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Very good relaxing stay
desc: Me along with my daughter were in Singapore for 5 nights. I had taken the Discovery package, so was upgraded to the family room. Room was spacious with a very good balcony. The overall service is very good. Location is also very good. As a vegetarian, breakfast options are limited. So if you are a vegetarian I would suggest to check in to their other branches in Singapore. Their website has the details which I saw later. Overall good experience.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: A wonderful hotel
desc: The Village Hotel Katong was an absolute delight. After a long haul flight which arrived in Singapore early in the morning, the hotel allowed us to check into our room well ahead of normal check in time. The room was comfortable, clean and quiet. The staff were very friendly and helpful. We enjoyed a delicious meal in the restaurant. Would definitely recommend this hotel.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Highly recommended
desc: Excellent service. Staff always attentive & willing to please. Definately return. Great location.. Accessible to everything you need. Food transport shops . I chose this hotel instead of the one next door as this has a more boutique style.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: 20” drive to airport
desc: Good area with plenty of eateries near the hotel and short travelling time to airport and city centres. Also close to various attractions for travelling tourists. Buses are also available to travel to the city.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Village Hotel Katong - Family trip
desc: This was a family trip, for a relatives wedding. I travelled by car with my uncle, 2 aunts and my mum who were all above the age of 70. Kishan and Melvin Selbam at reception, made our very long journey worth while. While in Johor, we had a tough time at the collection office for auto pass card. Both Kishan and Melvin welcomed us with their warm and humble hospitality. It was great as we just wanted to get into our rooms and shower! Thank you very much for the great experience. Just sad that I didn't have the time to explore Singapore due to our hiccups in Johor. Will try to visit at again soon. Thank you.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice for a few days in Singapore and very quiet rooms. The shower was big and modern. Nice swimmingpool
desc: Very quiet and big room with a modern shower. The shower was very modern and big to. The pool and the gym are also very good. Good breakfast. We used the “grab” app and that’s very easy and fast. We enjoyed our stay!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Stay in Singapore
desc: Overall stay was fantastic. Staff at the hotel were friendly and helpful. Greatful that Khairul assisted to change my room, Melvin and Kishan assisted to check me in also to upload my Auto pass card. Vigneswaran and Jamie assisted on my check out.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: must stay at Singapore
desc: stayed for 1 night and should have stayed longer ! thank you khairul at front office for the seamless service. He anticipated our needs in advance that made our stay comfortable. supermarket is just down right below at the same building which made it very convenient. if u like running, east coast park is just 5 min away.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent Hotel
desc: We did not have any hiccups at all for the check in and checkout. The team here is really accommodating, friendly and very nice to talk to. Everyone made the trip really good and fun. They have big rooms, which was suitable for our family.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: What a gem of a hotel, 5 star rating for outstanding ambience and friendly staff
desc: I've stayed in many Singapore hotels over the years, this one is a gem and exceptional. Such a relaxing atmosphere enhanced by genuinely friendly and courteous staff. I decided to pamper myself staying in their Club room and what a great decision it was too. The room was so spacious and had that home from home feeling plus a wonderful walk in rain shower, just the job after walking in the Singapore humidity. After a day exploring, so nice to chill out in the Club lounge. again such a wonderful experience. Perfect in every way and so relaxing. Huge compliments and thanks to Terence and all his wonderful staff for making my stay so perfect. All deserve a 5 star hotel rating. Will not hesitate to rebook again next time I visit Singapore.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great value and location
desc: I was a little worried about the location of the hotel, how wrong was I. The room size was generous for Singapore +big walk in shower. I booked B&B which was a good choice as a few minutes walk to several shopping malls with food courts at bargain prices. The reception crew Mary, Long,Jamie and Kenneth who gave us great advice on getting around on the buses 2 dollars £1-40 for a 30 min trip to Chinatown and the BAY GARDENS. Bus stop outside the hotel.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent stay
desc: Hospitality, cleanliness, facilities and hotel location are great! The receptionists are excellent. We stayed in joining rooms facing the swimming pool. There's a mall nearby just 5 minutes walking distance.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Leny was so welcoming, perfect location.
desc: Leny checked us in when we arrived and she was so friendly and welcoming. We were pleasantly surprised to hear that we had a free room upgrade! It was my husbands birthday during our stay and not only did they decorate the room, they also delivered him a birthday cake! The hotel is in a great location and has everything you will need. I will definately look to stay here again in future. Thank you to The staff for making our stay so comfortable.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Fabulous
desc: Great for a stop over. Pool great Rooms lovely Comfy beds, pillows, great shower Close to restaurants, markets, shopping Kenneth was fabulous at reception. Thankyou Would highly recommend for the atmosphere , convenience and service provided

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great value!
desc: Wanted to stay in Katong to be close to the airport, and we have stayed at the Roxy Hotel next door for many years, but since the pandemic we thought we'd try different hotels. This hotel has been refurbished and renovated since its Paramount Hotel days, and has still retained its small open-air carpark right in front. It is a relatively small hotel, only 12 storeys tall, but definitely one of the better places in Katong to stay. We were pleasantly surprised by the lobby, it was quiet and service at reception was attentive and prompt. Our double room was a good size, with a small balcony that overlooked the hotel pool, a privileged view when compared to many hotel rooms in the city! The bathroom was a good size and well kitted out with toiletries, cleanliness was good, and the

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Awesome
desc: We had our wedding nearby and selected this hotel as a choice of stay. The staff were friendly and approachable which makes our stay a pleasant one. All hats on Fadullah and team for being efficient and helpful throughout our stay. Thank you!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: more than just a hotel
desc: Always enjoy my stays at the Village, handy to many interesting places. The staff have always been easy to deal with when any needs arise. Rooms comfortable and quiet. Happy to recommend this hotel to others.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Feels like home away from home
desc: The staff very friendly and helpful, willing to go Xtra mile. Walking distance from the beach and all amenities. There is a lovely ice cream parlor inside the hotel complex and convenient grocery shopping.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Will never return.
desc: Where do I begin. This was one of the most unpleasant hotel stays I have ever had and I will never return. The room was dingy, dated and miserable. There were stains all over the toilet bowl and furniture that have clearly not been thoroughly cleaned or replaced in years. The chair looked out of place in the room and didn’t serve any real purpose next to the bed, and our bathroom flooded within a few minutes of us turning on the tap. The female staff on duty that night seemed harried and impatient when we gave our feedback and reluctantly gave us a new room. Was really let down by her poor attitude. This hotel is in need of a thorough revamp, and soon.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: exclent service in great location
desc: i spent 3 then 7 days in the hotel my all it exceeded my expectation except for the staff were very wonderful from the front desk to the porters restaurant the location of hotel near everything airport restaurants

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Very good hotel in a great location
desc: Very good hotel in a great location Room,breakfast,staff all excellent Great value for money when staying in Singapore Staff went outout of their way with early check in due to our arrival time. Would recommend

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Fantastic room service
desc: I needed a smaller pillow The room attendant on floor 5 was very helpful to assist (Yinli ?) The club room on level 6 was very convenient to have meetings even provided refreshment for me and my guest

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Katong review
desc: My husband and I arrived from Melbourne early morning and the staff allocated a room immediately - with a walk in shower as requested. The reception staff were polite and helpful. The rooms were very clean. Will come back again

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Good location, Clean facility
desc: Good location, Clean facility. Staff was courteous and helpful. Katong village is an iconic district in Singapore and Katong village is at the best location. Everything is close by and easily accessible.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: 3 days in Singapore
desc: Wow. What can I say... Amazing service from reception, breakfast, maids and Ben in level 6 lounge. The management were excellent and very helpful. Food very nice. Good location. Easy to commute via Bus and MRT. Thanks for the great stay. Many thanks Mr PATEL

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Village Hotel Katong
desc: We stayed at the Village Hotel Katong for 10 nights and it was great. The staff were excellent and very helpful. A special mention to Punitha, her housekeeping team were exceptional and really made our stay enjoyable.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Much room for improvement
desc: Filthy showerheads poor water quality, paint peel offs, rusty and jammed balcony doors . A good hotel, but seems like it hasnt been looked after . Hope to have a better experience on my next visit……..

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Attentive staffs & Clean+Well maintained
desc: The staffs are very attentive and the room are well maintaining! Although the breakfast variety is not very wide, but it is good enough of the choices of breakfast for us to have a good start for a day!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Balcony room
desc: Good staff and reception. Sliding door to the balcony could do with being replaced. Nice area with local restaurants and bars etc. Only 15 mins to the center of Singapore by taxi and 15 mins to the airport (changi)

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great experience in Perankan lounge
desc: Had our breakfast in Perankan Lounge during our staycation at Village Katong. A very cosy place for breakfast n cocktail. Great chillout place after exploring Katong area. Friendly Chandran n Ben who we met in the Perankan lounge sharing their experiences.Felt so relaxing whole chilling in the lounge.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great hotel
desc: This is a great hotel with generous sized rooms, friendly and helpful staff and a convenient location close to the airport. The location is great with plenty of restaurants/Cafes within walking distance!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Katong Village Delight
desc: Researching our trip I decided on Village Hotel Katong because it gave us a better vantage to see Peranakan lifestyle. The area around the hotel is older but well maintained and you get to see original hawker markets, Peranakan, Indian and Chinese culture and shops while also having access to modern shopping centres, all within walking distances. Public transport is readily available to take you to the attraction sites. We used taxis as we felt this was easier to navigate as some attractions would require bus and train to get to and the cost for taxis was only slightly more expensive. There are many hotels to choose from, we chose this one for it's heritage aspect, for the good pricing and for it's location. Daily housekeeping, great hotel restaurant, well appointed gym and

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Highly recommended
desc: A great experience. Everyone was very friendly. We loved the stay. Punitha was our house keeping person and she did a great job. 5 stars to her specially. Writing this review on behalf of Senthiappan and Gopinathan who stayed at room 829 from 15th July to 21st July

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Feels like coming home!
desc: My mom and I have stayed at Village Katong several times and have loved it! We travel from the US to visit our family here in Singapore, especially now that my grandma is ill. Village Katong has had a huge part in how comfortable we have been despite stressful circumstances. The staff are always friendly, kind, and welcoming. Ben, who always welcomed us to the lounge with his warm and loving energy, has had a particularly big role in helping us feel like we are coming home each visit. He always went out of the way for us, and we truly appreciate every effort he has made to take care of us. Thank you Ben, and all the staff at Village Katong Hotel, who has offered us a sanctuary during a difficult time. It has made all the difference.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Very pleasant
desc: Great location in a nice area, very friendly staff and spacious comfortable room. Interesting placement of the bathtub which makes the place different and memorable. I will definitely come back for future visits.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Very good - food only improvement required but that was still fine
desc: Overall very good - Rooms were amazing and service generally very good. Location ideal. Breakfast could have been better but was definitely still ok. We didn’t make the most of the club lounge due to trying to fit in as much as possible into our Singapore stay but it felt like that could be better too.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great experience in Katong Village Peranakan hotel room stay
desc: The check-in process was extremely efficient and the staff were all very friendly. The room was well clean and nice. It had the biggest tv screen that we had ever seen. We felt so welcome especially from Ben and Chandran fm the Peranakan lounge. They were so friendly and nice they made us feel so comfortable like our 2nd home. Their service was excellent and we will definately comes back again.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Must visit village hotel katong :)
desc: My stay at village hotel katong was very good. Rooms were very spacious and clean, breakfast have mixed menu with lots of variety. Hotel staff is very polite and welcome you with a smile, specially Ben and Chandran in lounge area.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Awesome service
desc: Went to the Peranakan Lounge where Ben was there to help with all our request with the best service and he was so courteous! 10/10! He made our night! The place was so cozy and the food and drinks were so delish!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Village hotel katong
desc: The hotel was excellent, it was clean, comfortable and tidy all staff where polite and friendly and where helpful with any requests, the shopping mall is 20 minutes walk away and the hotel has a pool and does breakfast a great place to stay 😊😊😊

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Truly enjoyed my recent stay all thanks to Ezzuan!
desc: I called the hotel prior to check-in to enquire about the decor package as I'm celebrating a friend's birthday. To my surprise, when checking in I was told that my room was upgraded to a suite. Ezzuan even wrote a handwritten birthday card for my friend with some freebies! Thank you for making it special and memorable!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Stay
desc: We had a great stay at the Village Hotel Katong. Our room was very spacious and clean. All staff were very helpful and accommodating. Very handy to many cafes and restaurants including a small supermarket right next door. Bus stop was right outside this Hotel which was very convenient.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent hotel to stay
desc: When I was booking a hotel for my staying in Singapore I was a little bit hesitant to choose Village Hotel Katong as the photos don’t look attractive and the hotel doesn’t look presentable. Thanks to the high positive feed back, I chose the hotel and they did not fail me. It IS a very good hotel which is specious, fully equipped, look nice inside out, clean, quiet, good location and with a balcony. The cleaning staff is polite, helpful, working hard, and always wearing a genuine smile. I highly recommend this hotel.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Four go on holiday
desc: It was a lovely hotel clean tidy, the balcony door hard to open but no problem. Staff helpful . We didnt relizely until the last day that if you want to change the sheet on your bed you had to put a card on the bed. Again this was our fault.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great hotel in a good location
desc: What a wonderful hotel! Close enough to the city but closer to the airport if your just on an overnight stay! Awesome staff who are so willing to help and spacious clean rooms. The hotel offers you free drinks and canapés on level 6 from 6 til 8. We were served by Ben and he was amazing! He definitely kept our drinks full and encouraged us to eat the canapés which were amazing. Was a truly enjoyable experience. Can’t recommend enough

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Friendly hotel in a convenient location in Katong
desc: We enjoyed our two night stay at Village Hotel Katong. Very conveniently located near the East Coast park , we liked walking there in the evening. We took advantage of some nice eateries in Katong. The room was comfortable and all staff were very friendly. Easy access to the airport.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great stay
desc: My friend and I had such an easy and amazing stay and the hotel village. I would 100% recommend this place to my friends and family if they ever visit Singapore. Thank you to the staff who attended us and the ones who took care of the cleaning of the room.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Good and comfortable hotel
desc: Rooms are big, clean and comfortable. Staff are helpful. Though there is no MRT at the moment, transportation is still very convenient with the available bus routes. Lots of food and shopping options.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Kindness
desc: We arrived early in the morning after a long flight and eventhough we just expected to leave the bagagge and go to the city, the staff kindly let us to make the check-in so we could rest in the room. We will go again.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Super service, thank you 😊
desc: A shout out to front desk staff especially Leny Thomas, and also a young,man named Ezza… (cannot remember full name) for the understanding and kindness shown. Always accommodating and obliging. Thank you to all front desk staff and concierge. Have stayed here three times and it’s always a good experience. Beds are very comfortable and breakfast is a big thumb’s - up Location is central and very convenient. 👌👌👌

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Pleasant stay
desc: Stayed 2 nights at the hotel with my family. Would like to compliment the staff Leny for being so helpful and thoughtful. I requested for a connecting room and Leny was kind enough to look through the system even though it was fully booked that day. Thank you so much for your sincere help! Overall the staffs are all so welcoming and kind!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: great for family trip
desc: location is good and close to bus stop and easy to schedule pick up by taxi/ Singapore “Uber”. there is a supermarket downstairs which is convienient to get local food. close to several local famous restaurant ( walking distance). breakfast is good and staff is nice. in general, this is a family friendly hotel and we enjoyed staying there with family.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent service and supportive by all the staff.
desc: House keeping service is excellent. Good support and care taken by front office staffs and all supporting staffs as well. Had a great and enjoyable experience staying in your hotel. Enjoyed the breakfast nice dishes and tasty

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Heart of the local
desc: right smack in the middle of the nonya district enclave, there is plenty of eccentric visuals to explore and the food, mmm, it is right on the money. the staff are courteous, helpful and are downright knowledgable about the area. excellent guides.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Comfy!
desc: Great place to stay. The staffs were excellent and very helpful. The bed was so firm, the shower room was large and clean. The only problem we had was hard to open the balcony door. But it got fixed. We’ll definitely stay here again. Many restaurants and shops are within walking distance.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Business & pleasures
desc: Nice hotel in nice area between city and airport, supermarket underneath, restaurants and mall close by, nice chicken rice nearby, small bars close too, mixing it with the locals. Coast isn’t far away- nice place to go for a walk.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: My Wedding Episode.
desc: i booked this hotel thru recommendation thru a sister of mine, Siti Hajar. And I never regretting any moments of doing so. Cause from the first moment I arrive till it was departure moment, everyting was done in a professionally way and full of humble smiles. The staff was ever nice, humble and easy to communicate. Everyting was informed so clearly. My bridemaids, My bestmans, My hubby and also MY family, we would lyke to thanked all the staff involved.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Wonderful Service
desc: I went to Singapore with my family last April 2018 and we booked Village Hotel Katong for us to stay when we were in Singapore and it was a nice hotel. The foods and the room were so good. When we were in the Katong kitchen and already been eating our meal, I dropped my spoon, and the crew there, named Mary, gave me another new spoon and a tissue. She was very assertive, committed in her work, excellent, worked well with others, compassionate, caring and had good work ethic.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: I like it
desc: Like the hotel and the area. Painful there isn’t an MRT station in the area but you can easily take the bus into town. Plenty of food and drink choices nearby. Close enough to the beach for you to enjoy.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Good value stay. Could be improved.
desc: We knew this hotel was out of the city when we booked. We weren’t concerned as it was a VFM price point and we were booking in order to be close to friends who’d booked here ahead of us. This is a nice hotel with basic amenities, with some small improvements it would be more comfortable. The good: The room was clean and well appointed. All rooms have a balcony, which is nice we had a city view. Be warned though, it’s not scenic, your overlooking roads, streets and houses from every side. Check in was smooth and out request to be near our friends was also taken care of. Staff are friendly but not too in your face either. We felt they were helpful. The room is serviced daily, you have complimentary water daily, replenished tea and coffee and toiletries which are all of a

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great hotel close to East Coast Park
desc: Highly recommended this hotel. Staff is very friendly and helpful. It is just five minutes away from the beautiful East Coast Park. You can easily get food from hawker centers nearby or from restaurants nearby, you will be spoilt by choice!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Hotel
desc: We loved this hotel. Super clean, lovely room and they gave us a phone to use while we were there. Not very convenient location so must be street savy, but we found it easy to get around. Great local food. We actually loved the area surrounding the hotel more than central singapore.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: An excellent and comfortable stay.
desc: Village Hotel Katong is located in the relatively quiet location in downtown Singapore. As travelers from India, we were happy to have the Shenbaga Vinayakar temple at stone's throw ( the temple tower was visible from our room balcony) and a nice south Indian restaurant nearby. The hotel was a great place, nice and comfortable family room, superb breakfast spread ( included in the room price), impressive lobby, a balcony for every room ( ours faced the pool), extremely friendly and courteous staff etc. The hotel has a mall attached and it had an amazing Indian restaurant ( Delhi 6), which made our stay a lot easier. Parkway Parade mall is just around 300 metres away, which was again a great advantage. Overall, a great place to stay in Singapore. Would love to go again.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent
desc: Superb quality and service. Staff is very friendly. The location is a plus factor and the fair price mall grocery store down stairs!! Would definitely recommend to family and friends. Will also give feedback to our company as they chose a quality hotel for me!!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Visit
desc: Company duty travel visit. Short stay. Hence, can't comment more.Suggest, you offer some fruits for guess who stay at the hotel. May be at least for their first check-in day or any juice etc. Some more clothes hangers. Thank you.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Acceptable but service has to improve.
desc: Stayed here for 4 nights with my daughter. One of the reason why I booked this hotel was because of the supposed free airport shuttle. There was no information regarding their shuttle schedule and I tried emailing them to request for it through their website but they replied so late only for me to find out that their last shuttle departs at 10:20PM from Terminal 1 and our flight arrives at 11PM. Taxi from Changi airport to Hotel is about S$20. Since its way past midnight there was no one at the lobby except one tired looking female receptionist. She was unwelcoming, not smiling and when I somehow asked her a question while she was explaining the included perks that comes with the Club room, she told me off saying "let me finish first" to be honest that was very rude of her. Both

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Do not miss this excellent and high valuable hotel.
desc: Beautiful lobby warm place big and very clean elegantly furnished.The area is full of restaurants and the beach is very close including a park.all of this with very reasonable cost. Although I stayed one night only it was apparent that this is an excellent place to stay.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Katong- village- hotel
desc: The additional must be explain to visiters.Breakfast must be change daily,it's not suitable with Vietnam culture, the slogan is '' Live like a local'' but we don't kown the live style of singapore. how to live like a local?

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Happy with my stay
desc: Very nice location, near to my favorite restaurants. Room is very big (312 sq. ft) with a balcony view.Transportation to airport is free. Free mobile phone in room to call several countries is a big plus.Will recommend to all my friends.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Cozy hotel and conveniently located in the east.
desc: Across the hotel is a neighborhood mall Parkway parade where you'll find everything you need from food to all daily necessities. Bus stop is right across the street for about 400meters away along Marine Parade. The hotel has an access to the back of the building where it has another supermarket Fairprice where you'll also find ready to eat food that are economically priced. right in front of the same building is a bus stop going to the city, such as orchard road, vivo city etc. What's not so desirable for me was, the pool was a kiddie pool in itself and you can't do any laps. and worse is the breakfast as i find everything not well thought of and are just simply ready to eat supermarket stuff place in a chaffing dish.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Kool in Katong
desc: Adjoining a small mall, and a step back from the vibrant Katong neighbourhood, the Village Hotel provides a great base for a short taxi from Changi airport along Marine Parade. Functional and modern rooms offer good sound-proofing and efficient use of space with strong WiFi throughout. Professional service at all times and helpful 24hr desk-staff to offer advice of the local area.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: GOOD HOTEL
desc: The hotel was so nice, clean and i like the design of each corner of the hotel. With the affordable price and good location, near bus stop, convenience store and so many food around. Even got the mall in front of the Hotel.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: A pretty good hotel made perfect by the staff and the location.
desc: The hotel is a pretty good international standard hotel which is much cheaper than those in the Downtown area of Sg. The staff are all friendly, courteous and eager to help - especially Ana and Puja on the reception desk who sorted out check ins and boarding passes when my tablet refused to do it. But the best thing is the location. Step out onto East Coast Road and you are in the vibrant, beating heart of the real Singapore, not the glitzy, shallow tourist Downtown. 'Makan' shops and stalls abound to suit every taste from Katong Laksa to Pizza, from the best curry puffs to burgers.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice room and great food
desc: The hotel have a nice ambience. Their service was excellent and suitable for Muslim because the hotel serve halal buffet. The hotel location is nearby the Parkway Parade Shopping Mall which takes around 10 minutes to find others food or indoor shopping.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing Hotel
desc: This is an amazing hotel with a great location. I would definitely return if ever I came back to Singapore. Everything you need right on your door step with the mall being attached to the hotel..Lovely Find

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: ABOUT KATONG
desc: It's a quite nice place to stay. I came for a business purpose and from the welcome till the departure the staff is so good and very helpful. The entrance till the lift to the room, the area is so clean, calm quite (with soft music), and eye catching area. The rooms are well cleaned and bathrooms too.About the breakfast, was so excellent and I'm so happy with the varieties had. Swimming pool at night is so great. Not located as like marina bay. But still it's a good high to have a swim at night with enjoying the scene of night lights.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: My stay was wonderful.
desc: I am a final stage kidney failure patient. Has not been travelling for the last few years due to cost. I was very happy to get the offer on booking.com and decide to choose Village Katong. My choice was not wrong...i am extremely happy with my stay, especially the nice comfy room. The staff from housekeeping are trustworthy....I left my newly bought watch in the room when I check-out. A few hours later when I called to see if I have left it at the lobby or in the room...they said they will check and later called me back to say that it is with them and ask me to come n collect. I am blessed.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Village Hotel Katong
desc: It is a very nice hotel. Staff was very helpful in giving us direction for places to dine. Shuttle from airport to the hotel worked out fine. Desk helped us get a Grab taxi to get us to the marina bay port. She was very helpful

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Well-kept hotel in a heartland area of Singapore
desc: A 3.5 to 4 stars hotel in the east coast area of Singapore with splendid local food in walking distance. The hotel does feel more like a high-end motel, it is overall clean and modern with updated furnishings all around but the quality of the beddings is subpar at best. We were upgraded to a family room which is massive in size (especially for a Singapore hotel!) but for just the two of us, it could feel a little stale. As the subway is not in walking distance, you would need to know the bus system to get around or hop on a taxi which is usually inexpensive in Singapore except peak hours. Entrance to the hotel can be a little tricky to find for taxi drivers who are unfamiliar with the area. We chose this hotel primarily because we have a morning flight to catch, so it was a

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice & convenienceplace to stay
desc: The location is nice, got provide coach to office area.There is access to supermarket and other restaurant.Around the area, you also can explore local shop & foodHotel staff was friendly and helpful.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: extremely comfortable stay :-)
desc: Hotel room was spacious, and pretty with the peranakan decorations! Staff were friendly and provided excellent service; a staff, Leo was professional and polite when handling us and other guests during breakfast Overall a comfortable 2-nights stay and would definitely come back whenever possible!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice hotel in a good area... needs refurbishing soon.
desc: Our fifth stay at the Katong Village Hotel becuase it is in the area of SIngapore we prefer for the variety of restaurants, shopping malls and coast/beach/parks. Staff are genuinly friendly and helpful and the ambiance in the hotel is good. We feel the quality is slightly fallen highlighted by an over-vigorous rainforest shower, a refrigerator that does not adequately cool, a strange smell of cooking oil even though we were 6 floors above the dining room, These are small but ominous signs that the standards may be slipping... I hope not as we have always enjoyed our stays in Katong. Stayed this time for 12 nights but we were offered nothing extra as frequesnt long-term guests above those one-nighters there for a wedding or other celebrations. We will definitely stay again but

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent hotel.
desc: The club room was very good . It was great having a dedicated room for drinks and snacks 24 hours. The hotel decor was very smart and furnishings were suited to the rooms. The bathrooms were fantastic and the toiletries were great quality.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Basic hotel
desc: Stayed here for 2 nights in November and was a bit disappointed overall.Reception staff could be more efficient.Hotel is located some distance from centre of Singapore and a long way from nearest underground.Rooms are adequate but very basic.No hotel bar.Did not eat at hotel restaurant as it did not look that appealing.If in Singapore again I won’t be staying here.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Good staying experience
desc: Room is clean & comfortable. Staffs are friendly & location is good. Breakfast is pprovided. Walking distance to shopping mall. Reasonable room rate. Overall, good staying experience and will come back when next visit to Singapore.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing stay at the Village Hotel Katong
desc: Myself and my mum stayed for 3 nights. We had a lot of deliberation over the hotel, whether or not we should stay somewhere expensive but more central, or whether we should stay at the Village Hotel Katong and splash out on a club room for the same price as a basic room in the centre. We went for Katong and didn't regret it once! Getting the upgrade for club benefits was worth it as others have said. The room was beautiful and spacious. We arrived on a Saturday and they had a beautiful dinner buffet in the club lounge with local dishes which was delicious and a lovely surprise, as well as a happy hour with free cocktails! The pool and gym were lovely and very quiet. It was extremely easy to get to the centre of town by taking the bus just outside. The local area is vibrant and

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: location
desc: it is not near any MRT station and poor connection at Terminal 4 of airport. Otherwise it is okay... Walking distance from shopping place and various restaurant, which is accessible even in the raining season

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Very good
desc: Location very good. Accessible to supermarket, many eateries, shopping malls eg Parkway Parade, 112 Katong. Room is very clean. Bathroom is big. Bed very comfy. Temperature of the room is easily adjustable, which is a plus point because other hotels that I had been to, no matter how you adjust the room is still cold.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: The best hotel to stay
desc: Overall was an excellent experience! I would suggest to my members as well as families. Convenient for shopping, site viewing, easy transportation e.g. cabs, grabs, etc. For the next trip I plan to stay at the same hotel!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great hotel - reasonable price
desc: Someone told me this hotel was in an ify neighborhood but it really wasn’t! Instead it was fairly convenient, especially as taxis are cheap and it’s very reasonably priced for Singapore. The room was quite spacious and had a great bathroom and small balcony. The hotel is part of a mall, so you can get groceries in the basement and a latte and pastry or sandwich just a few steps through the back door of the hotel. We would stay here again!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Quite good
desc: The location of this hotel is far from the city, if you call taxi from the hotel to China town, it will cost around S$ 10 - 13. The room of the hotel is quite new and clean due to it just has been renovated. Anyway the overall is ok for staying in Singapore.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice hotel for staycation
desc: Clean and spacious room which surrounded by various eateries, which open mostly at nightSupermarket and cafes available in the same building as the hotel. Very convenient and yet provide the quietness to rest at night.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Birthday Celebration
desc: Went down to the Katong Kitchen restaurant with my family recently to celebrate my birthday over dinner. Must say the wide variety selection of food spread on the buffet is scrumptious 👍😋 The beef rendang was soo tender! Service wise by the name of Rajen was soo friendly and observant. Asked us how the food was and cleared our plates accordingly. 👌 He even went extra mile to let us know what was served during lunch. Would consider coming back 👍👍

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Value for money - Highly recomended
desc: Very happy with this Hotel, I will book again next time, highly recommended! Very clean, friendly staff, good value for money. Large rooms. Better use taxi for your transportation. Many choices for food also near the Hotel.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Hotel in good location
desc: Stayed at this hotel several times and have never been disappointed with the facilities and friendly service . Had a club room which was very nice and gave access to the relaxing club room facilities. We love the Katong area so to have excellent accommodation makes for a great stay

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Class hotel in authentic Singapore
desc: If you want to experience a more authentic Singapore, this is the place to stay. It’s in an area where wealthy locals live and has plenty of neighbourhood bars and authentic restaurants. The hotel itself is just delightful, with good sized rooms and bathrooms, wonderful breakfasts with Asian and international breakfasts. Don’t be put off by the fact it’s 10 mins from the centre, a taxi ride is only 10 dollars/£6 each way. Well worth it for the atmosphere.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Enjoyable experience in Singapore
desc: Lovely hotel with great helpful staff. We were only there for 2 days but would recommend a visit daytime or night time to the Marine Bay Gardens area and if possible head over to Sentosa Island for a unique experience.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Perfect choice in the East Coast.
desc: Very happy with this hotel.Location, staff, quality, cleanliness, services, it ticked all these boxes. Would definitely stay here again!Improvements needed: wi-fi and double bed reservation process.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: My "Village" experience
desc: Warm and friendly staff, spacious, clean and comfortable room with complete necessities; great gym equipment and hotel facilities (pool, function rooms) and great tasting food!We'll definitely return! Keep it up!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Comfortable Hotel for a Short Stay
desc: Over the weekend, we stayed for a night at Village Hotel Katong. Getting to the hotel is not very convenient as there are few bus services, and no MRT stations nearby. Within the area however, there are plenty of shophouses, with two malls (I12 & Parkway Parade) to keep you occupied. Service at the hotel is good, check-in was facilitated quickly and all guests had chocolates as a welcome gift. For an additional fee, you can upgrade to the Perenakan Club room which comes with lounge benefits. Would have been helpful if the Counter staff had informed us on the amount to top-up, as we only found out upon check-out that it was a nominal sum. Room is spacious, no complaints as everything in the room was in order. For a breather, you may step out to the balcony for an aerial view

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great place
desc: Loved it !great location in terms of food, malls and public transportation stops. staff members (Joelle) was very informative, friendly and helpful. My entire family felt very pleased and comfortable at this hotel.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Enjoyable stay
desc: Hotel rooms was spacious, staff was friendly & provided excellent service. Anne was professional and polite with the service we received. Definitely we will stay again when we come back. Hotel has a complimentary two-wat airport shuttle service.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice place to stay
desc: Hotel should prepare shuttle bus into the city but shuttle bus from/to the airport is one advantagesHotel should prepare a praying room for moslem guestBreakfast menu is standard but lunch menu is very good

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Very nice hotel with friendly and professional staff.
desc: Very good hotel. Great staff. Good workout facility. Very convenient location. Close to some great restaurants. Close to public transportation. Free shuttle service is also a plus! We have already re-booked for a second stay.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Layover
desc: We arrived early(8 am) and only wanted to store our luggage till check in time. The reception noted that the room was ready and said she would check us in immediately. Two thumbs up. Our flight was a 10pm flight and they told us we could leave our luggage with them and even suggested that we could use their shower facilities after check out. Wow, they got it right again. Two thumbs up again.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Value for Money
desc: I would say this hotel is value for your money. I stayed with my family during the holidays.What I liked: - Their airport shuttle to the hotel was very convenient.- Rooms were regularly cleaned. - There was a free mobile handset you can use that has 4G internet. Very handy when you need an extra set of communication device with your family.- The staff were nice and courteous.- We stayed during the holidays so there were some free candies and cookies in the hotel lobby.Some cons:- It's far from the key attractions but there's a bus stop right at the back which you can use to access different places. Buses operate until 12 midnight only though.- Laundry services are a bit expensive, though this is not surprising in Singapore.Overall, would recommend and will return if I

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Brief but Good Stay
desc: We stayed here for about 12 hours as we were needing a place to rest/shower prior to our red eye flight out of Singapore. Hotel is about 15 mins from Changi Airport with a free shuttle. Hotel motif is modern-European. It is attached to a small mall with some restaurants and shopping. Outside Hotel there is across the street some more bars/restaturants. Good location. Only issue is not close to the MRT-Metro so have to use Taxi. Review of Room: Clean/spacious/modern and comfortable. Bathroom large with nice shower. Expensive however but welcome to Singapore. Would likely choose a hotel at the Airport if I had to do it again.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Cozy place in Singapore
desc: A really great place to stay. In general this is a lovely hotel in a great area with restaurants, shopping opportunities and a beautiful neighborhood. The rooms are big, nicely furnished and really clean. The breakfast buffet is on point, changing dishes everyday with western food alongside with traditional food. Everything i tasted was just delicious and fresh. What was really outstanding was the staff. Everybody was so helpful and friendly all the time. The staff helped me a lot when my husband were at the hospital and i were alone with our kids at the hotel. I have no words how thankful i am for the help i got from all the staff. My special thank goes to Anne and Habibah! Thank you so so much! I really enjoyed my stay at this place and would come back every time.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Comfortable and great base to explore Joo Chiat
desc: The hotel is close to the airport. The lobby has beautiful pernakan ceramics. The reception staff is warm and hospitable. The room is comfortable with an airy balcony. The room comes with a phone with data service which is helpful if you are from out of town. The bed is very comfortable. The hotel is close to key sights and sounds of Joo Chiat and a mall with good selection of restaurants.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Best Local Hotel!
desc: Everything was good, frankly! Please stay at least once in your life! It is the best stay ever at a local area where you cannot ask for lesser... great hotel by Far East! Also, Club Room Cocktail Laksa is the best ever i have eaten!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Overrated hotel
desc: I am shocked by the positive reviews of this hotel. I selected it based on the reviews and I was deeply disappointed. Room was too small for the $395/night price tag; bathroom tiny and does not offer much privacy with only a glass door separating you from the beds outside. The bathroom layout was strange with the toilet paper holder on the counter and directly behind the toilet seat! No place to hang clothes in the bathroom. Location is outside the city. For a lower price and with only one day notice, we got a luxury hotel, 2 bdr apartment very close to city center. Village Katong definitely over-rated in Net reviews. Finally, the breakfast was a big disappointment despite the price tag of ~ $100 for a family with 3 young children; food looked stale and unappetizing. The

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: A great way to end 2018 and start 2019
desc: Originally booked the Peranakan Room for 2 nights but received an upgrade to the Executive Suite. Spacious bedroom, bathroom, dining area and TV area. Encountered 2 issues on the first night. Clogged toilet and a bath tub that keep draining water away. Highlighted the issue to them on the first night and it was resolved on the following day. Kudos to the team. Didn't really utilised the lounge as my 4 year old daughter is not allowed to enter. Only went in to replenish the drinks for my room. I would say the all-day refreshment and evening cocktails can be improved. I still prefer the one at Quincy Hotel. Quite a variety for the breakfast at Katong Kitchen. The selection isn't very extensive. However, it is sufficient. Eggs station, noodle station, bread and pastries, dim

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Fantastic Staycation!
desc: I had a great stay in Katong Hotel. I have read reviews and... some fantastic and others poorly rated. I decided to check it out myself. I had arrived anound 11 plus and was disappointed that the room was not available. It was raining heavily and I had nowhere to go with my kid. The reception staff Nass noticed that my Son was running around the lobby and gave me a snake and ladder game to entertain my Son. She even told me that she help out the maids to clean the room once there is a vacant room. I am glad that the board game actually kept my son busy. She even gave me key to the pool but there was no baby pool so I gave it a miss. I was given my room around 1pm. Room was spacious and clean and chambermaid is friendly. The shower was fantastic but when we use the toilet at

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice hotel
desc: I really liked this hotel. It’s very clean, affordable and staff were helpful and always helped us book cabs and services with a smile even when it was last minute. It’s also close to the airport which was a nice.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Thumbs up!
desc: Excellent service and efficient from staff. Clealiness was thumbs up. Hotel is near to mall where its easy to find food. Moreover, there's Fairprice finest jus one level down. Will definitely come again!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Lovely staycation outside of city area
desc: Stayed village hotel katong for just one day. The check in was smooth. Breakfast variety was good. Room was very spacious and we loved the bed so much. A handy phone was provide with 6-8 countries free oversea call . There are a lot of shooing malls and eateries near by. From chicken rice, laksa , peranakan cuisine to western bistro , everything is walking distance. There is not direct MRT yet , taxi will be easier to move around. I would love to stay here again and try the lounge since there are so many good review about it 😁

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Staycation
desc: Stayed here two nights over Christmas, booked at an amazingly cheap rate on Expedia. A week before my visit, received an email to inform me of my two hours late checkout benefit as a Gold member. Front desk allowed us to check in an hour early. Lots of options for food around the area, and there's a supermarket downstairs so it was easy to stock up on drinks. The room is comfortable and clean. All rooms have a balcony. The hotel makes a lot of sense for locals on staycation, but not so much for international travellers, as the area is not particularly interesting for foreigners unless you are a foodie and/or interested in Peranakan architecture. Public transport options aren't great. Maybe for repeat visitors sick of the usual tourist spots and just want to go local...

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: If price well, i do find worth it
desc: Finding entrance for the hotel (if drive) is quite a challenge as it is no sign board indication. It is more on guessing. Non shelter carpark is another minus should it rain, we have difficulties access to the car. No bidet in toilet surprise me as well as it is quite a standard nowadays standard. Breakfast food variety and quality is quite disappointing.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Perfect!
desc: There is a supermarket attached to it which is very convenient. Also a bus station (Roxy Square) just in front of the hotel so you are in about 25 minutes in the bay area. The staff was polite and rooms clean.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
