title: Good Hotel with Friendly and Helpful Staff
desc: We chose the Village Hotel because of its closeness to the airport and the fact that we like the Katong area. The hotel greatly exceeded our expectations. We will stay again on our next visit to Singapore.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Useful location
desc: We stayed at this unpretentious hotel for a few days before and after a cruise. They have a shuttle bus to and from the airport -very useful. It is in an interesting area with a village atmosphere -nice little bars and cafes across the street.. It is an easy taxi8 ride into the centre. On our return visit we upgraded our room . This came with a late check out, and a nice little lounge with breakfast ,and a light supper with drinks. We were able to stay in it until our late shuttle to the airport.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Recommended
desc: Clean bedroom and bathroom with friendly service for a competetive price. The shopping centre unter the hotel is very convenient as it has a supermarket. We would stay here again when we come back to Singapore.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Review of our usual haunt in Singapore
desc: Always stayed here when we are in town for business due to the cleanliness, excellent customer service and price. The club room would be our usual choice and it is usually comes with breakfast and evening cocktails at the lounge. We are always lucky to encounter Anne or Sasi manning the lounge. Besides the food being usually the same, these two personnel standout and make your stay a class better. Excellent job done manning the place. Thumbs up.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent
desc: It's very comfortable. Room is very big with balcony view. The bed and pillows are fresh n very clean and very comfortable. The atmosphere is very calm for couples to relax and enjoy the night. I will come again and recommend to my friends

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Clean and comfortable hotel on east coast
desc: Great place to stay. Friendly staff quickly and efficiently helped us arrange taxi transport to wherever we needed to go. Comfortable bed allowed for a very rested break. Close to walking and biking along a stretch of east coast.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Misses the mark unfortunately
desc: Rooms are fine, clean and spacious, staff need to lift knowledge and service standards, if you go the club upgrade, please note free mini bar means empty mini bar and you need to go to the club room to collect, no beer etc available prior to 6pm, coffee very average while food is ok, club room is meant to be 24 hours but went in early prior to a morning walk, coffee machine not working and toilets locked, wifi connectivity is hit and miss too

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Bday staycation
desc: We stayed at the peranakan club room from 1-2 Dec. Check in was smooth, although we have to wait quite a while due to the miscomm btw htl and agent, we were brought to the club lounge while waiting. We went in to our room after our dinner and found a bday cake even tho we did not mention it is for bday staycation. The front desk staff really put detail attention to the customer. Thanks to her for the bday cake. It's a small and warm gesture but makes the guest feels very welcome. Definitely a place worth to stay at.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice and quite hotel
desc: Being in this property for the first time. The hotel building it's a bit old, nevertheless the staff is very professional and helpful. Rooms are quite big and for the Singapore standards we can say that they are "huge" nicely appointed and looks fresh too. I recommend you to choose a room with the balcony on the main lobby area and high floors. Breakfast in not "massive" but they serve all you need for a decent one.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent service by Habibah!
desc: Checked in was served by Habibah, with her genuine and warm smile!Ability to meet our needs, had a good conversational makes us feel so welcome..She's a Great Ambassador for the hotel! Thumbs up!!Hotel room was nice and clean.. convenient place to stay!!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: A nice and quiet getaway190 Clemenceau Avenue, Singapore Shopping Centre for wife and myself
desc: A generally nice getaway with good value and club room though small has a good selection during the cocktail hours. Would be better if the pool was nicer and the club has more selection throughout the day.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Wonderful!
desc: Just left this amazing hotel after 5 nights of luxury! Stayed in a club room, well worth the extra money. The staff are so friendly and helpful. The room was great, very comfortable bed, lots of room, cleaned and well stocked daily. Breakfast was also good with lots of choice. The use of The Peranakan Lounge was a bonus with drinks and imaginative food served in the evening, staff there were particularly helpful.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Best hospitality
desc: I was blown away by the hospitality shown by the hotel and staff here. Planning a wedding from half way across the world is stressful but the hotel took care of majority of the details as it was included in our very affordable package so it was a breeze. We held an intimate solemnization at the balcony and dinner was in the ballroom on the same floor which saved us time, cost and was very convenient for us and our guests. The food was delicious and the selection was good with generous portions. We loved the decor as it was very classy and just what we wanted. On the day of the event, their staff treated us like royalty. They were also very professional from the start and took the trouble to discuss every detail with us. I felt I could trust them completely and I was right. Thank

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: In the heart of Katong
desc: Village Hotel Katong features guest rooms with Peranakan inspired touches such as the artwork on the walls and the tiles in the bathroom. I had a spacious room on the 6th floor with a nice bathroom. I booked a Club room paying the extra price for club privileges. This entitles you to use of the Peranakan Club for breakfast and evening cocktails and appetizers, as well as complimentary service for two pieces of laundry per day. The evening cocktail hour was adequate but rather sparse, I felt, compared to offerings at other hotel club lounges. Club room guests have the option of having breakfast at the restaurant on the 4th floor, definitely the better choice as the choices in the lounge tend to be very limited. The hotel is connected to a shopping center with a

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Fuss-free stay, but don't expect more
desc: Stayed for 1 night on a weekend in a superior room. Rooms are not sound-proof, and we got woken up a couple of times early in the morning with people moving along the corridor. Otherwise, room is rather basic with all necessities provided, but spacious. Great area for staycation as a local, given the many food places within walking distance from the hotel - would recommend (to locals or tourists alike) Sinpopo (cafe which serves modern local cuisine and delicious cakes), am pang yong tau foo, and ice cream from birds of paradise. However, the location would be rather inaccessible for tourists. Check-in and out were fuss-free, but they would insist on strict check-out timings, so something to take note of.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: 4 night stopover
desc: My husband and I stayed here for 3 nights enroute to New Zealand. Originally we booked a standard stay but on arrival upgraded to Club. The benefits to this were such great value for money. Access to club lounge, cocktail hour, breakfast and hot and soft beverages available 24/7 also 2 items of laundry a day. That along with lovely clean and comfortable room, friendly staff, pool and interesting local area oh and not forgetting the free 4g phone available while you're staying and early and late check out...finally it was my husbands birthday on the day we were due to check out and the restaurant supplied a small cake and we all sang happy birthday, 😍 I could go on and on. Really great stopover thank you.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Club Tub Room
desc: Not only is the hotel located in a nifty neighborhood surrounded by shopping and eating (328 Katong Laksa is a MUST TRY) but the staff is friendly, helpful, competent and attentive. Treat yourself, as I did, to the club level room with the giant soaking tub. It's fantastic.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Clean, convenient and comfy!
desc: Location was really convenient and there are also many cafes and restaurants around :) The room was really clean and bed was super comfy! My friends and I enjoyed the stay and will definitely return. Thank you!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Up and down
desc: Lovely hotel though a bit out of town. Was very upset by two rude reception staff who had a private joke at my expense in front of me. Other staff were helpful. A bit out of town and as I was on a bit of s budget, more information on buses would have been helpful.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Wonderful location
desc: Bathroom is not very private! Good sized room, easy to get around from hotel via bus, lots of great food and beer places on the street. No internet or furniture on the deck. Good office support-printed some files for us.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: COULD NOT HAVE BEEN BETTER.
desc: This was our 4th visit to this gem of a hotel wonderfully located in the Katong village. Everything was perfect beginning from the request for our preferred room , the wonderful welcome and the amazing level of personalized service extended to us right through our stay. We enjoy the Club Lounge and the service is so welcoming and genuinely warm. All the staff were exceptional. However we must make special mention of Anne who went out of her way to make our stay as memorable as possible. The care and attention she extended to my wife when she was ill was truly appreciated. We recommend this hotel with pleasure to anyone visiting Singapore for business or leisure.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Comfortable staycation
desc: We were told during check-in that a room with a double-bed was not available even though we requested for it during booking. Was given the option to top-up SGD 30 for a room with a double bed, or they would combine 2 single beds. We went for the latter and after going up to our room noticed that the mattress was for a double bed (seemingly placed on 2 twin beds)...so wondering if all along we had a double bed but hotel tried to collect additional from us. Otherwise our stay was quiet and comfortable, room was clean and well equipped. Location is a bit inaccessible, 10-15 min drive from the East Coast Food Village, walking distance from a stretch of shophouses selling mid-range cafe/restaurant food.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great room
desc: Room was bigger than expected. TV is large and has varities of channels. Bed was very comfortable and the rainfall shower is amazing. Only issue was when checking in. Apparently when i made the reservation on their website, i wasn't immediately billed eventhough i had more than sufficient amount in my card at that point of time. Upon checking in, i was told that it's not paid yet...it was definitely an inconvenience as no one informed me beforehand that i've yet to pay for the room. Regardless, the service and the room is amazing.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great location for low key and near airport.
desc: Stayed here bec I had to go the airport early and return late. I didnt want to get distracted by too much activity. This was perfect. A quiet stroll along east coast road resulted in a lot of food to try. Laid back picturesque view of katong. With bigger malls.on the other side. Numerous restaurants right outside of the hotel with a supermarket right below. A reviewer had mentioned that taxi drivers dont know where the place was which was true I had to use my Google maps to teach the driver. But grab drivers didnt have a problem may be due to their own driving nav app The pool change room was weird. It was one room and unisex in an odd way. It can be unnerving to open the door and the opposite sex comes out. Even though there were 2 separate change rooms it was still

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Bad location given the price range
desc: I chose to stay at this hotel after reading so many good reviews at booking. I assumed the location was very good as it’s close to a park according to the map. It turned out that I had to take bus (at least 30min) to anywhere to the city center, and the park is actually separated by highway, so I couldn’t take a casual walk there. Given the price range, I recommend stay elsewhere if you care about location.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Fantastic hotel all in all
desc: I was initially a little unenthused about this hotel, as I had just come from another hotel in the vicinity which was newer and more upmarket. Village Katong had a less modern feel in comparison, and the rooms were not as fancy or new, and little things like lower quality toiletries added to my disappointment. But the hotel grew on me in no time. I began to appreciate the size of my room (more spacious than many city hotels) and was grateful for its practical aspects (plenty of space to put my suitcases and bags on, a long table for me to work from and strategically placed plug points). I was happy with the quality of food from the in-house restaurant as well (for Muslim travellers, note that the establishment is halal-certified). Room service was also prompt and the food

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Satisfying Spacious room
desc: Clean, spacious room. Location near good food places. However there was no free breakfast. Pool area is acceptable. Receptionist allowed us for early check in. That was very kind of them. Umbrella is provided too.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Highly recommended!
desc: Being regular travellers we are hard to impress, however from the moment we entered the hotel we were pleasantly surprised by the overall experience! I’m suffer from claustrophobia so we hunt down relatively spacious accommodation with a balcony. The club room was perfect. Very spacious, clean and well appointed room. As part of the package we were invited to the bar for drinks and nibbles from 6-8pm plus two items of laundry. Our visit to Singapore was to celebrate our 30th wedding anniversary! Our bed was beautifully decorated when we entered the room which was a pleasant surprise! The staff from the concierge, front office to the bar were always extremely helpful. The location is about a $10-$15 ride away from all the hotspots I.e. Orchard Road, Serangoon Road, China

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice hotel
desc: We stayed there 3 nights, location was very convenience, bus stop was just outside the hotel, basically we could get to everywhere via bus or MRT, only airport shuttle start at 8am. Hotel staff were friendly and helpful.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great stay
desc: Spent 3d2n at the village hotel katong. Staff were helpful and friendly . There are many food choices and cafes within walking distance of the hotel. Great stay overall. We upgraded to the club room. Would recommend upgrading if given the chance.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent value for service and accomodation
desc: Village Katong Hotel is an excellent hotel for family. We like the good size family room, clean and tidy facility, the swimming pool, free airport transfer. If you can get breakfast as a bundled deal, it is well worth it. The selection of breakfast buffet is very good. A hidden gem of this hotel is you can to use a complimentary 4G mobile phone which let you call local numbers for free. The mobile phone is useful if you need to make local calls.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Pleasant Stay
desc: I had a pleasant experience while checking in as the staff were very friendly. the overall experience has been pleasant. Although it would be great to have some children facilities to accommodate them

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: A Very Comfortable Stay
desc: When we were originally looking for accommodation for five nights in Singapore, it was the choice of an AirBnB (which we eliminated quickly as it is illegal in Singapore), something in the city area priced at least around $300 a night or Village Hotel Katong at under $200. The downside of this hotel was the location, however there are buses right out the front that get you to anywhere. This was a small inconvenience for a substantial saving. In the end we upgraded to a Club Room which includes breakfast, evening drinks (small range of beer, wine and spirits) and canapes - that were lovely, and 24 hour access to the room for simple snacks, hot drinks and soft drinks. Breakfast can be taken on the 4th floor in the main breakfast area with a wider range, or in the Club Room on

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Overall
desc: Very helpful and friendly staff, nice rooms, very clean. Nice view from balcony. Overall very nice experience. The stafF helped me with a mistake I made in booking and saved me from having to spend money for another night.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Birthday in Singapore
desc: I had a 20 some hour layover in Singapore and since it was my birthday night decided to stay at Village Katong. STUNNING. not to mention the club level service is excellent. The reception guy even made a copy of my passport for me which I needed for my next Airbnb. The room, cleanliness and location was great. Would definitely stay again. Anne was so nice and helpful she assisted at breakfast. Thanks again!!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great place to stay in Singapore
desc: This hotel is in Katong, but a short distance to all the major attractions. The bus stop is right outside the door. There is a convenience store attached to the hotel, lots of little restaurants in the area and the staff is super friendly, knowledgeable and helpful. We really enjoyed our trip to Singapore.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Very good service
desc: I stayed here for one night in Singapore and took buffet dinner with the team. Overall I was satisfied with hotel service and food quality. There is a mini supermarket on the back side of the hotel, definitely convince for long stay. The rates was very good since we has cooperate price. Will come back for sure.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great stopover location
desc: Our family of four needed a room for an extended overnight stopover, and Village Hotel Katong was perfect for our needs. The online pricing was great, and the hotel exceeded our expectations. We booked a two-double family room. It was large enough to use without falling over each other. The beds and bedding were good, the bathroom and shower were good, and we appreciated the in-room ironing facilities. One of the kids used the swimming pool and reported that it was "not the largest, but clean with lots of towels and lounges". The best thing about the hotel is its location. If you like food, you're surrounded by some of the best in Singapore. Take a walk along East Coast Road and turn left into Joo Chiat Road; or walk up Haig Road; and you'll find all sorts of local delights.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Pleasant stay! Worth it!
desc: It was such a pleasure to stay at this hotel. Staff was professional and great in their own ways especially at the lobby. Food was delectable. The facilities in the hotel were great too! We definitely will come back again! Cheers!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Spacious, clean room. Good location.
desc: 2nd time staying at this hotel for my birthday. Stayed at the Club room this round. Room is spacious and clean. Club facilities is good. Breeze of checking in and out. Lots of good food located in this area. Glad to have the perks of late check out at 4pm which means we do not need to rush.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Perfect Place to Stay in Singapore
desc: We loved this hotel & enjoyed our stay here, Staff were very friendly, rooms were tidy & clean & tidy. Food was very delicious, Everything was very nearby. Close to the Airport. we definitely coming back again.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Good little hotel
desc: I found this to be a nice hotel in an excellent location. There were plenty of good places to eat and shop close by. It was very close to downtown and the airport. The accommodations were good and the hotel staff were extremely friendly.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: 3 Day Stay
desc: My husband and I stayed here for 3 days prior to taking a cruise. The rooms are very comfortable and large! We had a huge shower with great water pressure. We were able to take advantage of the free shuttle from the airport. We opted for Club Class and glad we did. We had breakfast in the 4th floor dining room each morning, but took advantage of the Club Room each evening for a few drinks and lite meals. The alcoholic beverages offered were limited and not top shelf, but fine. The wine was fine also. The Club Room host, Louis, is fabulous. He offered suggestions for places to see and places for lunch - he shared his local knowledge. The room attendants were friendly and thorough. The bellman and front desk help were extremely helpful. We opted for the Hop On/Off bus to see

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent hospitality. Strategic Location
desc: Thank you Village Hotel Katong for upgrading us to Club Room. Very good service. Nice room. Free shuttle to airport. Good location. Thank you for the wonderful honeymoon experience you gave us. All the best!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent experience
desc: We stayed at this hotel for 3 days enroute to Australia. The location was ideal for us. Situated just outside the city with easy accessible transport into the city. From this hotel you could easily walk to the East Coast Beach in around 15 minutes. Which we did on 2 of the days. Plenty of shops and restaurants also. Spoilt for choice really. We took a taxi from the airport it was just easier for us after a long flight, around 20SD I think. Checkin was quick and informative. We opted for a clubroom which was so worth it. Very spacious, clean and a lovely walk in shower. We used the club lounge for breakfast which was fine for us. We liked that we could get fresh fruit, bottled water and coffee at anytime. I would highly recommend upgrading to a club room. Staff were wonderful

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: A culture of caring
desc: Encountered one of the best reservations staff who took time to understand our special needs and offered helpful suggestions for our consideration to make our stay convenient and pleasant. She coordinated with hotel staff on our needs. Upon check-in, staff were attentive and helpful to wheelchair user and elderly patrons, and make sure that we were comfortable and well attended to.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: One of the best rooms we've ever stayed at
desc: Stayed for 1 night on our anniversary. We booked the Peranakan Club room. The exterior of the hotel doesn't really look as nice but once you get to the room, it was just so lovely. Room was spacious. We had friends over to celebrate hubs belated b'day as well. Balcony was small, over looking the carpark from the next building. We requested them to do something to the room since it was our anniversary. A little disappointed cause all we got was a box of chocolates, which were delicious by the way. Bathtub fits the both of us comfortably!! Bed was huge. Toilet didn't have a Bidet though. They should fix em up. I mean its Singapore guys! People need bidets at home. Anyways, room comes with a club lounge where we get access to evening cocktails. Also has free flow of complimentary

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Clean hotel with nice staff
desc: Friendly staff. It was a surprise that the hotel was halal and no alcohol drinks sold in the restaurant. It would have been nice if a part of the swimming pool was low enough for children to stand in the pool. Bus stop not very far and easy to access city.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Friendly and helpfull
desc: Stayed 2 nights at the end of Jan and found the staff excellent. Let us book in early and looked after cases when leaving . Room was very clean and spacious and breakfast was a great selection of hot and cold and the pastries were suberb . Hotel well located with supermarket downstairs and lots of shops and restaurants nearby . I would recommend this hotel and would not hesitate to stay here if ever in Singapore again . Perfect stay !

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Value hotel
desc: Stay many times at this hotel. Quality and Value hotel. Got brthday treat for free upgrade to club room. Room big and clean., pillow and bed comfort. Around hotel and many restaurant and food stall. sure will back again.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Family
desc: Good family accomodation. Two double beds in decent sized accomodation. Gorgeous shower. Air conditioning very cold and we were unable to alter. Thermostat not working? Loads of good restaurants nearby and shopping mall. No MRT nearby at present but is being built and when completed would be very convenient.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent hotel staff and stay
desc: My friends and I enjoy our stay . We were served by the staff , Habibah and she made our stay fuss-free. We had booked a room for our newly wed couple the next day but find it a hassle to check in because we were rushing for the reception. But she helped us with the check-in and even decided to surprise us with the room decoration . Will definitely recommend our friends and family .

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Hotel, not central but easy to get to major attractions
desc: This was a great hotel for our 3 night stay. The reception staff were lovely, especially Melvin who was great and went out of his way to assist us when we had issues with Night Zoo tickets. The reception area and dining area are lovely, spaces, clean and nicely decorated. The pool and gymnasium, though small are adequate and well maintained. The room was cosy, with excellent hand held and drencher showers. There was an umbrella for those tropical downpours, and a hot iron and ironing board. White dressing gowns and slippers were provided, the latter we did not use as they were in plastic wrapping. We are zero wasters. There were lots of extras such as toothbrushes, soaps, shampoo, conditioner, shower caps, but we did not use any of these as they were all wrapped in plastic.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great service by the staff
desc: Pro: - Almost all the staff are super helpfull - Louis at reception care enough to ask where we were planning to go and give directions & advice on how to get there; he also provide us with connecting room. - Adele & Treasure were very helpfull; when we were at sentosa i call and ask for help because i left my mobile (and subsequently the evoucher). They ask the housekeeping to retrieve my mobilephone from my room and send the e-voucher to hubby's phone. - Sankaran from housekeeping was exceptionally kind to our messy boisterous group (adults, 2 boys, and 2 seniors) and always happy to help with odd requests. - The corner room that we got were very spacious. Con: - Location of the hotel; nowhere near mrt, the nearest mall are actually just across the road, but you need to do a

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Apart from location, this was a great place to stay
desc: This hotel is clean, spacious, updated and has a pool! The bedding and pillows are great and the fitness center is a nice bonus. Staff are not overly friendly but met our needs and the free airport shuttle was terrific. The shuttle does not normally go to the terminal we needed, but the driver was kind enough to take us directly there so we did not need to do a transfer at the airport. The only real drawback to this hotel is that while not too far from the airport, it requires a taxi or grab(Asia’s Uber) to the main attractions. It was 10-15$ each way but we still felt it was economical given the price difference for lodging in the heart of the city. The attached mall and local shops and restaurants were also great for breakfast and snacks.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Staycation
desc: A good staycation for family.Staff are attentive.Good food & clean.Location is near to town.Nearby to shopping mall & food centre.As a regular guest,I always come back for yearly staycation.Nothing to complain.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Village Hotel Katong - Singapore
desc: The hotel is very nice, cozy and bright. Rooms are comfortable, clean, spacious, have a supermarket downstairs, nice restaurants, and has easy access to public transportation - buses. They even offer a local phone to use during our stay in Singapore - that really was awesome and great !! The hotel staff are very friendly, kind and accommodating, most especially - Brandon Wenjie, Asst Front Office Manager and Anne Rose Quiambao. They were always very helpful and took the time to talk to us. This is my husband's 1st time in Asia, so its really great to have a very good experience with this trip. Wonderful stay in Singapore. Overall - we would highly recommend this hotel.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Family room for a transit night--excellent experience
desc: Our family of 4, 2 adults and 2 preteens needed a place to spend a night in Singapore before catching a flight the next morning. Village Hotel Katong turned out to be a great fit. It was 12 to 18 minutes from the airport depending on the time of day. The taxi fare there during rush hour was S$24, but early the next morning our ride to the airport was about S$12. Check in was smooth, friendly, helpful. The lobby was beautiful, and the elevators, hallway carpets, room, and bathroom all clean. Our family room had 2 very comfortable queen beds, a small fridge, an electric tea kettle, ironing board, free use of a cell phone during stay, and a small balcony. Though small by US standards, the room had plenty of storage cleverly worked into the design, and would be good for a longer

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Good value
desc: Hotel good location with plenty of restaurants about .Super friendly staff always smiling and helpful. Will be returning to this hotel whoever I am in Singapore .Food decent and a nice pool with good amenities.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Hotel at a reasonable price.
desc: I was very happy with my recent stay with family. The hotel definitely exceeded my expectations. I usually stay at Crowne Plaza at the airport, so I wasn’t expecting it to be as good. I will definitely be back!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Lovely hotel
desc: Stayed here in our return trip from Australia. We only had 23 hours in Singapore so chose to stay here nearer to airport. Was very surprised at the big and pleasant decor of the rooms and the hotel generally. Helpful and efficient staff sorted us a taxi into the main city area and we used the complimentary shuttle bus to return to the airport. I had also requested a late check out a few days to arrival and this was all sorted when we arrived. It was also the small things I noticed, toothbrushes and tooth paste along with the usual shower and body lotions in the bathroom and complimentary bottled water in the room. Made for a super short stay for us. Would definitely recommend.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Lovely local retreat, minus the city hotel premium
desc: The hotel is a delightful place to stay. As it’s located in the East Coast, it has a local feel and less of the hustle of the city, but is within easy reach by bus (about 20 minutes), and comes without the premium cost for a stay at a city hotel. The hotel itself has a lovely outdoor pool, a steam room and a gym, and is attached to the Village Katong Mall, offering a very handy supermarket at your doorstep. East Coast Road has a range of cafes, coffee shops and restaurants serving a variety of local and international cuisine. The Peranakan (club) Lounge is a relaxing retreat for a modest fee. The staff in the lounge, including Annie and Wendy are friendly, caring and engaging. Highly recommended!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: One stop hotel closer to airport.
desc: Nice and clean rooms. Picture is a view from my 12th floor room. Staff are very curtious and indeed helpful.real value for money. The hotel is connected convenience of public bus transport and many eating out places.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Easy access to airport
desc: We needed sleep and we got it. Room was quiet, comfortable and in a great location. This was just a layover so we did not need access to the city. The shuttle service to and from the hotel helped as well.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great value and location
desc: From the moment we arrived at the hotel the service and hospitality of the staff was outstanding. We upgraded our room to a club room for $80 per day because it was a great value. Included was a king sized bed on the Club floor with a 24-hour lounge to get bottled water, drinks, tea, coffee, yogurt, and snacks. Breakfast was offered in the Club lounge or the restaurant and evening cocktails from 8-10 included an abundance of hot food, cheese, and each evening a local dish. The hosts in the lounge, Wendy, Louis and Anne were charming and attentive. They made our stay particularly pleasant. Each day we used the outside pool after our long day of sightseeing. It was a nice way to relax before the evening cocktail hours from 6-8. We would highly recommend the Village Hotel Katong

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: The gem outside Orchard Rd
desc: Great location, plenty to see and away from the craziness of Orchard Road. A lot of food in the local area that caters to everyone’s taste buds. Value for money for family rooms (sleeps 4). Local supermarket on the basement.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Awesome Place to Stay
desc: Being from the United States I am very particular where I stay. It must be clean and have good size rooms. Many of the hotel rooms I have stayed in, while visiting Asia are very small. Village Hotel offers exceptional rooms and service. This in my opinion is a 5 star hotel. The room was incredible. Very very spacious and the shower is awesome. Great water pressure with plenty of hot water. The staff is very friendly and accommodating. I would in particular like to point out Anne Q., who greeted us every morning for breakfast and was super sweet and kind. She provided excellent service and helped my wife and I with suggestions on where to go in Singapore. This is my second stay at Village Hotel and I won’t stay at any other place. The last time visiting Singapore my wife and I

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Stay at Village Hotel Katong, Singapore.
desc: Very nice Hotel and the room was spacious, clean and decent size bathroom. Free wifi in the hotel with a really good download speed. And the best part of the room was the free Handy Phone which is located in the room. It’s a Android Hand Phone which can be used to make Free Local Calls and also International Calls free of cost to countries like India, UK, USA and other countries. The Hotel is in a awesome location with lots of restaurants, shops and pubs around. One of my fav is Mels Place which is just a 10 min walk from the Hotel. The Katong Mall is next door which also has a nice Cinema called GV Cinema. Overall I had a fantastic stay with very friendly staff. Highly Recommended Hotel.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice clean hotel.
desc: Our family stayed overnight in a double room. It was a short stopover and we had a late check out. It was a clean hotel, close to many shops and restaurants. Staff were helpful, we didn't need much attention. We used the gym and breakfast buffet, both were adequate. There was nothing particularly outstanding about the hotel (positive or negative) and we would stay there again for a stopover.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: “Wonderful staff, peaceful comfortable rooms, really great hotel”
desc: The staff are simply wonderful. Excellent service, friendly and helpful. Quiet and comfortable hotel, great choice of interesting restaurants nearby, quite an interesting neighborhood. Usually I am limited to low-budget accommodation, but for stopovers on long trips I splash out for peace and comfort so that I am not exhausted on arrival at my final destination. For these stays, I need ease of transport from the airport, peace and quiet, comfort, and a hassle-free stay. This hotel ticked all of those boxes perfectly. Everything ran smoothly, the staff could not have been lovelier, the hotel is very nice and comfortable, room was very comfortable and quiet. And really lovely hot shower! It is quite a distance from the centre and the attractions of Orchard Road etc, but public

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: 36 hour stopover
desc: A ideally placed, good quality hotel situated between the airport and main attractions with a free airport shuttle bus. Big, clean, quiet family room and hotel has many restaurants and shops on it’s doorstop. Perfect for a short stopover in Singapore.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Gem of a hotel
desc: Stayed at The Village Hotel for 3 nights on a return journey from New Zealand. Arrived late at night but luckily we were just in time to catch the free shuttle bus. Check in was speedy and we were delighted with our club level room. So spacious and everything you could need is provided in the bathroom. The Peranakan Lounge for level 6 guests is a lovely little haven. The 2 hours in the evening with drinks and canapés is a nice touch. The food is really tasty and beautifully presented. We were looked after by Louis who is a friendly young man. Very knowledgeable of where to go and how to get there. We only met Anne and Brandon briefly but they were very polite and helpful too. Would definitely stay here again.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great hospitality
desc: I’m local and I came here for a short 2 day staycation and I must say the hospitality is great! The rooms are large, clean and provided are basic necessities like towels, toothbrushes etc. they even have a guide on what to do in SG which is current and updated. Location is great. A bit of a hassle to get there but surrounding it are bars, cafes, NTUC and even a mall with a cinema in it!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Wonderful Stay
desc: Everything at the hotel was wonderful. The Club upgrade was excellent value. We used the laundry each day, loved having breakfast and cocktails in the lounge, and the pool was wonderful after a day of sight seeing. The location was perfect for public transportation.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Perfect Family Hotel
desc: This was our second stay here as a young family of 5 and it didn’t disappoint again. The staff are delightful and exceptionally helpful. We arrived at 8am after a long flight and were fortunate enough to be able to get into our room earlier than the usual check-in time which was big help. The rooms are a good size and well maintained. The location is good with restaurants nearby if you don’t fancy the great in-house restaurant. We told the reception staff we were going to Sentosa Island for a visit the next day and later that evening we had drinks and snacks dropped off in our room for our day out which was a nice touch! We highly recommend this hotel and if you are going to stay, ask for Brandon who will look after your needs and make sure your stay is comfortable!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: 6-12 Jan 2019
desc: Good location, friendly staffs, convenience store, close to variety of Café and Restaurant.Less variety of food & drink offering in the club and Katong Kitchen on the forth four.To/From my business office is easy and convenience.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Lovely lobby
desc: This hotel has a lovely lobby, with great staff and an amazing fragrance as you walk in. Rooms are clean and comfortable but could do with a renovation on balconies and outside. Overall, a nice stay for one night. Convenient to most places in Singapore by taxi.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: First class
desc: From check in to check out the whole experience was first class,the deluxe room was spacious,amenities where what you would expect of a good hotel, the staff went the whole mile to make sure we where looked after.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing Hotel
desc: My husband and I had a wonderful stay. This is a very very clean hotel that is quiet and offers exceptionally large rooms. There is lots to do within walking distance and it is also a very safe area to walk at night. Lots of shopping nearby or places to eat. Conveintly located near the airport. The staff is friendly. I would like to point out Anne who greeted us every morning at breakfast on the 6th floor. She was so friendly and sweet. Like a breath of fresh air. She made our stay even more enjoyable. We will definitely stay here again.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Tv turned on by itself while we were asleep
desc: I’m sorry to say this but the room that we stayed in (Room 1117) is possibly haunted. Otherwise I think it’s an excellent hotel. Pros -Clean -Good service, not rude -Breakfast was good -Housekeeping gave us extra amenities upon request -Quiet room -HUGE room compared to our previous hotel (definitely a plus) Cons -Possibly haunted What happened: On the first night after putting our baby to sleep,we went to bed and we turned off all the lights and the tv. We both fell asleep soon afterwards. I was awoken suddenly. The first thing I noticed was that the tv was on. I thought my partner had turn it on because there was no other explanation. I let it be and tried to sleep. My partner soon woke up too and he turned the tv off. The remote was on the bedside table so there was no

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent hotel with great service and location
desc: We enjoyed our stay there. Service was excellent, room was perfect as we expected, location close to many eateries, breakfast had plenty of choices. Overall, an excellent 4 star hotel. I would definitely consider staying here again.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Best hotel ever in SG
desc: Highly recommended hotel in SG. The best accommodation we ever had very clean, spacious, affordable, very good location, the staff are friendly, the shuttle from airport to hotel -airport was a great bonus. We will surely recommend Village Hotel Katong to our friends.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: One of the best
desc: One my best hotel stays in over 2 decades of international travel. Staff, facilities, location, everything first-class. I highly recommend it. Close to cultural sites, as well as plenty of shopping opportunities. Easy to access from Changi Airport (about 20 minute drive), close to the ocean, and to dozens of fantastic restaurants.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: The Village Katong Singapore
desc: Absolutely loved this hotel. Staff were very warm and friendly. Our room was big and comfortable. Very close to shops, eateries and bars. Lovely shopping mall over the road. Visit Sentosa Island. Would love to visit again.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Peranakan influenced room with romantic bathtub
desc: We used this hotel for our layover. We arraived at the Hotel around 2am. The hotel provided us Prenakan inspired romantic CLUB room. We could sleep and take rest well after 20hours flight from NY. It’s very close to the Airport and something different from the boring Airport hotel. The hotel has free shattle bus to airport. We also enjoyed exploring neighborhoods and shopping malls in Katong.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Very ok...
desc: I stayed in this hotel from 15th feb to 20th feb. I had my agent book this hotel as i wanted the same room they have put up on the trip advisor. A bit of a disappointment as the room given to us was way small n bathroom even smaller. Thanks to Puja at the reception for changing us to a more appropriate room. She was kind to listen and address our concerns. Finally we got a room of decent size and a good size bathroom. It was still ok. Nothing gr8. Anyway hotel is ok. Its been years since its been renovated. Carpet is worn out in corridors and the acc is too cold. The breakfast was included in our stay. But it was not up2 the mark. They say its open till 10.30am but by 10.10 the staff would tell the people on each table, that they will b closing shortly. Secondly being a

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Housekeeping opened our door before check-out time
desc: Stayed in the Peranakan club room for 2 nights in February. Everything was good till check-out day. I booked through the official website so was entitled to a late 4PM check-out which was confirmed upon check-in. To my horror, housekeeping opened my door during check-out day while we were still in the room. Think it was around 1pm. They didn’t bother to knock nor ring the bell before they opened it. Note that our room came with an in-room bathtub. Luckily we weren’t taking a bath at that time. And when they left, the room door wasn’t even closed properly. Please double-check and confirm the check-out timings of the different rooms to your housekeeping team. Also, it’s simple courtesy to knock on the door before entering the room.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice stay
desc: Staff are helpful and informative but not so friendly. The room is clean and bright, bed is comfort and nice, and restroom is well prepared. Breakfast is variety with Asian and foreign style which they chang menu everyday.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great visit
desc: We were not sure what to , but what a pleasant surprise. The hotel and all it's facilities were great. The restaurant had a dinner buffet that was fantastic. We got to experience all different Singapore foods, and the prices were right. I higly recommend this hotel.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Oké for few days
desc: Oké for few days. Lot of building around hotel. Rooms Can do with An update. Good breakfast. Very Nice pool with good chairs. Price/quality rooms too much. Bathroom A little bit too small. Nice little shopping Mall at the back of hotel and plenty of restaurants.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent hotel at a fair price
desc: Much enjoyed a recent stay at the Village Hotel, Katong. Location ideal for visiting Suntec City, the Merlion, Raffles Hotel, &c, by bus. Breakfast and evening canapes were well presented at their Peranakan Lounge and staff were excellent in all things. Room was spacious, comfortable and clean. There are many small affordable restaurants and eateries offering a wide range of food to the rear of the hotel, and a large retail outlet within walking distance. We will be returning there soon!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Stay !
desc: The room was really bright and spacious by Singapore's standards. Loved the rain shower and the fact that there was a tap providing filtered water. Little accents around the room such as the tiles and coloured pillows really livened up the place. Will recommend!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: A very pleasant stay
desc: Enjoyed the 2 nights at this hotel during the 2nd n 3rd day of Chinese lunar new year. Had great sleep on comfy bed. Hotel is conveniently located near to many restaurants n shopping malls.Will strongly recommend n looking forward to next stay. Great job guys

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Value for money stay in the heart of heritage Katong
desc: Staff at concierge and lobby were friendly and helpful. Hotel stay was up to my expectations and it definitely is value for money. I've been staying at Katong Village whenever a need arises and will do so in the future.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Staycation
desc: The room is big, clean and spacious. The gym is small though. The hotel is near to many restaurants and malls within walking distance. There are restaurants/cafes, NTUC supermarket within the same premise if one is lazy to go out. The staff are friendly and helpful when asked for assistance, hence I highly recommended Village Hotel Katong.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Good value, not very central
desc: Stayed for four nights for our visit to Singapore. Nice large rooms with very comfortable large bed and lovely rainfall shower. Buffet Breakfast was fine as you would expect from a large hotel. Mixture of Western and Asian foods, although for some reason the omelettes were fairly tasteless. Hotel overall is clean and suited our needs but nothing outstanding. Taxi from airport was quick and easy (cost about S$25). Hotel provided a free shuttle which we used when we left which only took about 20mins. To get into the centre of the city we used the buses.There is a bus stop on the road outside the rear entrance to the hotel, through a small shopping mall. The number 10 and 14 buses run into the city centre. Fare is S$1.90. Bus doesn't take credit cards and no change is offered.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: The hotel is highly recommended
desc: Very friendly service !! Room/bathroom clean and comfortable. The location of the hotel was excellent. You can do a lot Direct bus station and a good shopping possibilities. There were also a good place to eat (restaurants)

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Hotel good value but lounge disappointing
desc: Arrived at around 2pm but room was only available after 430pm. Lounge food was lacking (food was not replenished regularly enough). Room was clean and the staff was warm and friendly though. Club lounge was lackluster compared to Changi sister hotel

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Everything worked well
desc: The hotel is very nice and offers good sized family rooms that are reasonably priced. We really liked the breakfast and it was great to have a pool too. There are lots of shops and restaurants nearby, and accessing the airport was easy from the hotel.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: A very satisfying experience
desc: Good location and easy to access to major attractions like Sentosa, Singapore Botanical garden, Clark Quay, etc.. I like the free airport pick up service. Good value and I would choose this hotel next time whe I visit Singapore.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Value for money!
desc: The staff are always accommodating and are always friendly. The rooms are consistently clean and the food is good with the right amount of drinks available. Breakfast has many varieties as well. Been here many times and will definitely recommend others!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: 2 visits, different experiences!
desc: Visited twice for two nights each at the beginning and end of a five day cruise from Singapore. The first visit, when we arrived from the UK after 20 hours travelling, was very positive. We arrived earlier than expected but our room was made available for us within about 15 minutes, which was better than we expected. The room on the 9th floor was spacious and the bed was comfortable. A small balcony overlooking the front of the hotel provided a sea view, albeit at a distance. We walked to the seafront on the first afternoon. It took about 30 minutes, but we were rewarded with a lovely cycling and walking pathway in amongst trees and shrubs - it was delightful and very peaceful. The shower in the hotel was large and spacious and the power from it was incredible, certainly

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Katong is a good place to stay
desc: We were made very welcome by the excellent staff the hotel was close to good shops and eating places with several buses routes stopping outside going straight to the centre of the city. The rooms were very quiet and comfy.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: New experience in Katong
desc: Three days with friends in Singapore. Bed allocation was not followed from booking. All sorted in end. Fun stay. Breakfast staff very pleasant and food was very well presented. Loved the swiming pool.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice hotel
desc: I visited the hotel on the 4th February. I was there for one night. Check-in was excruciatingly slow. Just one person at the desk. Maybe because it was the Chinese new years eve and they were short of staff. I had booked a twin bed room but they allotted me a double bed room by mistake. On reaching the room, I informed them of this discrepancy and to their credit, they immediately offered me an upgrade into a family room with twin beds. The rooms are spacious, nice and clean. Balcony is pretty decent with a very good view. A very unique and useful facility that they offer is a mobile phone inside the room from which we can make free international calls to select countries. The mobile phone can also be used to view attractions and maps and directions. The location of the hotel

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: as good as always
desc: first choice if transfer over night in Singapore, very convenient location, so close to yummy local food, cinema, shopping center, never feel boring during the whole stay, close to the airport, simply pay 10 SGD you can reach almost all the famous location Singapore.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Very good service, convenient location
desc: This is my second or third stay at Village Hotel Katong. The hotel is clean with good facilities (pool, gym, restaurant) and amenities for a 4 star hotel. Very clean and spacious room and bathroom too. For this stay, we booked 3 rooms over 3 nights to suit our needs. Most of the front desk staff provided excellent customer service, are friendly and efficient. A little hiccup on the billing by the system; all 3 bookings were made directly on the hotel website and fully paid as far as I was aware but only 2 bookings were charged to my credit card initially. The hotel also provided free upgrade so we need not change room on the second day and to a better club room on the third day - kind gesture well appreciated! The club lounge is smaller than most 5 star hotels and open 24x7.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Second time's still a charm
desc: Stayed here again over Lunar New Year holidays, and it's nice to be familiar with the place and to see friendly staff every morning (hello, Ayub!). We got a room upgrade our first night, a thoughtful gesture to someone who traveled over 20 hours by plane and arriving after 1 a.m. We woke up to a wonderful view in Room 917! It would be nice to be given a late check-out if a guest arrived in the wee hours of the morning. The continuing construction work for the new MRT by Parkway Parade is still MASSIVE, although no noise reaches the hotel itself. We had to bear with it as we walked to bus stops and the shopping center. Just a few suggestions to make for an even better stay: (a) Please consider extending your complimentary airport shuttle to start earlier in the mornings and to

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Stay
desc: We had a free upgrade which was very nice, the room was excellent. We overlooked a carpark but we were out most of the time. There was no balcony furniture which seemed a bit strange. The staff and breakfast were excellent and also the free shuttle to the airport.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Pathetic buffet breakfast
desc: Staffs are fantastic but not accessible to public transport. Price is too high for the facilities provided. Don't even think about the buffet breakfast as it is waste of time. I only enjoyed the Club Lounge service as the staffs were friendly and took care of all guests very well even though the food was running out fast and unable to replenish as there wasn't enough stock.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Superb Service
desc: The staff was very kind and welcoming and seemed to genuinely care. “To be doing good deeds is man’s most glorious task”. This had been the greatest experience that we had in our stay in the hotel. We were able to know someone who is really approachable, kindhearted, passionate, and hardworking staff. She is in the person of Mary. The first time we met her, we really salute her for being dedicated and helpful. As a matter of fact, when we had our first dining experience, she welcomed us with her sweet smile. She greeted us pleasantly. We really felt delighted the first time we saw her. The moment we sat down she then said to us to enjoy the foods. She informed us regarding the kind of foods they serve. She mentioned that if we need something we should not be hesitant to

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: What a great experience. Excellent and friendly staff. Very welcoming.
desc: Nothing was too much trouble for the staff. Although we had a upgrade the room was beautiful and great aircon. There us a supermarket below where you can get food and drink or snacks for the room. We will definitely stay here again

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Comfortable and convenient
desc: There is a supermarket on the 1st floor and the bus stop is very close to the entrance. Also there are lots of restaurant and shopping places, so it was very convenient. As the bus came frequently, it was also very convenient to visit famous tourist attractions. Taking 5 minute walk to the beach was also good.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: great stay
desc: great place to stay highly recommend in all areas pool area and steam room was great loved all the shops so much to choose from staff were great shower was great nice and quiet thoroughly enjoyed and would easily recommend

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great hotel
desc: I stayed 12days for the biz conference, very comfortable room and lounge. Easy access to the supermarket in the same building was very convenient. Wi-Fi was little unstable, but it worked. Thanks for everything.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Good
desc: My overall experience over at Katong village hotel is very good and it exceed my expectations. It’s clean, good, value for money but importantly, it feels like home. There is NTUC at the ground level which makes you everything convenient.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Comfortable
desc: staff were courteous. Location was close to mall, restaurants. Grocery store at the bottom of the hotel. Room was comfortable, Wifi kept dropping out, but managed to get some work done. Comfortable stay overall.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Please do something about the erratic in-room WiFi!
desc: Stayed here two nights over a weekend, one night in Superior and second night in Deluxe. Pros: Very convenient, right above a (small) shopping arcade with Fairprice Supermarket and a lot of good local dining options within short walking distance. Generously spacious room and shower area. Long and spacious work desk for working. Large roomy closet. Usual necessities (hot water pot, iron and ironing board, toiletries etc.) are provided. Good shower pressure. Fast elevator / no need to wait. Cons: Room cleanliness is average (found stray hairs and scraps and floor boards were sticky), hairdryer doesn't work well so better prepare your own, frequently no one answers the phone when trying to reach operator or housekeeping at night (although front desk service staff - Ninn in

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great service
desc: Wasn't a fan of the location of the hotel as its a bit too far out for me. However, exceptional service and helpful reception staff!! Hotel provides free smartphone with data to use outside as well as free calls which was great! The smartphone also has fantastic offers for things like cable cars and safari which we used. Breakfast was good with a nice choice of food, waiters were efficient. One of the days we all woke up with itchy bites, reception informed the housekeeping manager who immediately inspected the room for bugs. Luckily it was just mosquito bites from the balcony being left slightly open overnight. Regardless hotel was extremely helpful, reception supervisor kindly provided us with a soothing cream too!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Recommended
desc: We stayed in a very spacious and clean family room. Really appreciated the balcony and a charming green pool area with a nice refreshing pool. Convenient supermarket downstairs. Picturesque and rather quiet historical neighborhood. A short taxi ride to downtown, complimentary shuttle to airport. Staff was friendly and helpful. Definitely would stay here again.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great location, friendly staff
desc: We stayed here for two nights - family room, with two small boys. The location was excellent to explore Singapore, the boys were happy with the pool, and we were happy with the friendly staff. Rooms are not enormous, but sufficiently big. For the price and the location definitely recommendable.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Stay near Changi airport.
desc: A breathe of fresh air , relaxed and interesting . Worth visiting and seeing the local area instead of Singapore’s main attractions if one has already visited them already. Free shuttle bus and well appointed modern rooms and bathrooms. Nice outdoor pool that is wonderful during the heat of the day.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Compliments to Villagr Hotel Katong
desc: leasant evening to Village Hotel Katong,   My husband surprised me with a night staycation here in Village Hotel Katong on 24-25 Mar.We were celebrating our 7th years wedding anniversary. To be honest,once we parked our car,the impression I had from the outlook of the hotel is just an average hotel. But..once we stepped in,I can feel the aura of more than just an average hotel.We were welcomed by a very pleasant and forthcoming front desk male officer (this is on 24 Mar@4.15pm).He congratulated us on our anniversary and very sweet gesture presented to us 2 boxes of truffle chocs. We were given privileges to use the level 6 lounge too! I am indeed impressed the moment I stepped out of the lift at level 5.The corridor dont match with the impression I first had from outside the

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: this hotel was a pleasant surprise
desc: had a meeting in this part of town and stayed at this hotel for convenience. Honestly i didnt expect much but it was a pleasant surprise. The rooms are big, the beds are comfortable, the hotel and the rooms are clean and the staff is really nice. The breakfast is more than ok i would definitely come back to this hotel if i had the chance

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Initially worried about location
desc: Decided to stay here and was initially worried about hotel location. Once arriving realised it is actually in a great part of Singapore, and easily accessible from airport. Hotel rooms a smartly furnished with all modern conveniences, rooms are great size and well equipped Currently large amount of construction work in progress within 5 min walk of hotel, as they are extending rail for MRT access. This was no issue during our stay, and will only improve the very effective public transport options for our next visit.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Very comfortable
desc: We really enjoyed the location of the hotel and all the amenities all around. We appreciated the swimming pool and the gymnasium. We went there for a tennis tournament and the hôtel was perfect for physical training.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Shopping and food trip
desc: This hotel is very clean and comfortable. We stayed here for 5 days. Very close to all the shopping area. It’s about S$10-20 for a taxicab to explore Singapore city. swimming pool is warm. Free breakfast. Walking distance to all local food.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great stay & lovely place
desc: The staff is super professional and friendly. They been very helpful. The breakfast food was nice. There is a nice supermarket that you can some groceries. Behind the hotel is a street with access of nice food and beer. Is a enjoyable stay and looking forward to my next stay.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Good!
desc: Lovely Peranakan themed hotel, situated inside a small but very decent shopping mall and within stone's throw from Parkway Parade and the upcoming MRT station that is being built right now. Well maintained and pretty deluxe room, even though hotel is starting to show signs of wear. Accommodating and polite service staff. Thank you for the pleasant stay!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Quiet, comfortable and big room which is perfect to relax
desc: Perfect hotel if you want to relax in exotic atmosphere. The room is quit big and decorated in lovely Peranakan style. The hotel has supermarket and coffee shops downstairs. However you can enjoy the stylish cafe and bars on east coast road which is behind the hotel, or Parkway Parade shopping center on marine parade road which has a good food coat with variety of local foods. It costs only S$15 to access China town by taxi.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Not comfortable for business
desc: The room is nice and clean. The wifi was terrible, was disconnecting evry 10 seconds, it was impossible to work. No mini bar in room. Poor room service menu. Crazy expensive the loundry service. Never again!!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Service and cleanliness
desc: Have free shuttle btw airport and hotel,free mobile to use in SG.The room is clean.The hotel isn’t near subway but bus stop is very near to hotel.I can buy something at Fairprice finest on the 1st floor.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Good value
desc: Staff are lovely; they go above and beyond... there are a few little touches that keep this from being an oustanding hotel but the people and their manner, as well as its location, makes this property a good place to stay.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: 3 days in Singapore
desc: Stayed here for 3 nights ,we booked a club room(large and spacious) which was great value as you get admittance to the Peranakan lounge including food and drinks ,shuttle to airport 8am to 8pm ,2 hours in lounge at airport Lewis is in the lounge at night her realy looked after us and was always available for a chat. Hotel was quite close to airport bit farther out from centre but taxis cheap and plentiful. went to little India, Chinatown and Bugis market loads of food courts and hawker centres .i tried food at Hawker centres very cheap some tasty some bland ,had my feet done at a old guy in shopping centre in chinatown $20 for 40 mins fixed my feet and neck. breakfast at hotel wide and varied lots of choice, supermarket attatched to hotel. bars and eateries in street behind

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great value hotel
desc: We paid so little for this room and were completely satisfied with the hotel. Space for suitcases and amount of general storage space was excellent. Staff were super helpful and friendly. The only downside was that we couldn't find any maps for this area to help us get around, but hotel staff pointed us in the right direction when we needed help.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: HOME AWAY FROM HOME
desc: Cannot be beaten for price, friendliness and convenience. Having been here before we could not wait to get back to meet friendly staff. Great location for us with family close by. I can thoroughly recommend to all our friends and relations.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Perfect service
desc: Everything was perfect there is no words to say, employees are very serviable and helpfull, hotel is hygenic and clean and also there is alady her name is Ann Quanbao she is very hepfulland can give you always riht recomandations in your trip.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: "You wont feel like leaving you room!"
desc: We were staying at Village Hotel Katong for 1 night as a lay over. And we were making alot of plans during that 1 night stay. But as soon as we reached the hotel we didnt feel like leaving! it has such an amazing Home feel. A hotel need not have to have high ceiling for it to feel luxurious. The lobby smells amazing! All of the staff were helpful. Cudos to Melvin and Zydney for making my stay extra comfortable. They definitely went out of their way to check on me and made sure that everything was alright. Once we entered the room, We didnt feel like leaving! the bed was so soft and firm. I tried the bathtub while watching TV! shower was great and even the Shampoo and Body Gel smelled great. I will definitely come back and stay in this hotel.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Average stay
desc: Blackout once during my stay and maintenance staff came knocking on my room door early in the morning to check the aircon, causing my rest to be interrupted. Wonder why they wanted to check in the morning and not after my checkout.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Village Hotel Katong
desc: I have come back to the hotel more than a few times and am very pleased with the quality and service. will recommend this to my friends and family as well. Am very pleased that the staff always oblige to my requests and they are friendly and approachable

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Staycation
desc: Great staycation to relax ourselves. Peranakan lounge is a small place to relax. However would be better if there's a drink list on what drinks are available. Only one cocktail available, but it's a nice drink.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent service from the hotel manage Mr Lim Brandon
desc: Due to business, I travel to Singapore regularly. I am regular visitor to Katong V hotel. I really appreciate Brandon's great service to me during my regular visit. He is really a customer oriented staff and have helped me solved many troubles encountered during my stay. There are many reasons I choose this hotel, but his great service definitely is the most important reason that made me to regularly visit this hotel although there are few similar nice hotels nearby. I visited this great hotel many times, but this is the only review I have written for it. In summary, this is a great hotel with clean room, nice location, great food and most importantly-customer oriented statff like Brandon, thanks a lot for your great service throughout the year and I will do continue supporting

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Expected more but...
desc: Booked a deluxe room with complimentary upgrade to Club room as accorded with Birthday Treat. Upon check in, I was shocked to be told that although we get to enjoy Club benefits, we won’t be given late checkout at 4 pm as the upgrade was complimentary. I was displeased to say the least. Club benefits minus the late checkout? That is totally unacceptable. Although the check in staff obtained approval from his manager to grant us late check out but what happened earlier, already left a bad aftertaste. We weren’t entitled to send 2 pieces of laundry for cleaning too, as we would stay only for a night. I certainly wasn’t expecting all these “minuses”. I would think thrice (not twice) about staying here again. In any case, the room was spacious and clean. The tiled floor was very

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Very satisfied
desc: The location was very good. The staff were very friendly and very helpful! Convenient access to the NTUC downstairs. The location is awesome as everything is withing vicinity. Me and the kids had an enjoyable stay.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: very good experience
desc: I have a very excellent experience in Village Katong hotel. They provide very nice and warm service to guests. my family enjoy the stay very much. I will still choose Village Katong hotel in my next trip to Singapore.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Home away from home
desc: I would like to compliment a front desk staff of Mrs Anna for her warmth hospitality during check-in. Even though it was a short ‘transaction’, I genuinely felt her sincerity. She treats me like a valuable guest even though Im younger in age and it was my first time staying with the hotel. I did not feel a tint of bias-ness or prejudice against me in some of my past stays. Im particular about the finest detail and she exceeds my expectations. Her promptness to answer my queries and constant warm smile certainly made my stay a better one. It felt like home in my own country. I worked in a service oriented industry too and I valued great customer service. Its the human touch that makes a difference and creates valued-added service. I certainly find the room decor pleasing

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Breakfast food served cold
desc: Breakfast menu each day was served cold, reported this to staff on 2 occassions but the following day the food was the same. They need to review the fixtures the food is served in because the current utensils are inadequate to generate enough heat. Overall food offered was good spoilt by lack of heating.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: excellent location, not too far from city centre
desc: our third visit, we love this hotel for its calm, quiet atmosphere and its warm and welcoming staff. The location is ideal for restaurants, and it is only a fifteen minute trip by taxi or bus to the city centre.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice Hotel in good location
desc: I was staying at the Village hotel Katong for 2 nights. The room was quiet, clean and comfortable. Breakfast was not included, so I cannot tell anything about it. The reception was friendly and professional. The hotel is directly connected to a small shopping mall at the backside, which also includes a supermarket. Behind that mall is a street where differnt kind of bars and restaurants are located. We had Indian food there, which was quite delicious and was open also at 2 a.m in the night. The price of the hotel was for Singapore and the standard they offer, quite reasonable. I didn´t have a look at the gym and pool, due to the quite busy time.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: The Best Hotel!
desc: We enjoyed a lot our stay at your hotel which we can say that is excellent as a Hotel, there is a great Services, all your staff are very helpful and warm. Thank you for your warm hospitality! We will do our best to come back. BLESSINGS!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great hotel
desc: We needed a night only but loved our hotel. We are budget travelers but did not want to sleep in a pod or a shoebox room without window, this room was massive, they have a free shuttle bus to the airport which goes every hour or so plus there are shopping no centers, food courts near by so all your needs are met. We will be back.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Perfect hotel in East Coast
desc: Perfect hotel in East Coast. Very good location with restaurants, shops, and close to the beach and East Coast Park. Very good quality and service, with a balanced value for money. Recommended for Business or Personal trips.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Good
desc: The location was very good which near to my office. But Breakfast menu each day was served cold and not much varity. Had great hospitality and pleasant stay. I will still choose Village Katong hotel in my next trip to Singapore. thanks

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Awesome service rendered
desc: Pleasant stay! Had complimentary upgrade to club for my birthday and service was flawless. Check in/out by Elfi & Iffa was great and late night housekeeping requests were well met by Rizal.
