We also had chng tng served by Lina and another concierge/bell staff (i didnt manage to catch the name) at the lobby. Definitely coming back! Keep up the great service guys! ❤️

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Happy Staycation
desc: The hotel is very near to a bus stop so in terms of accessibility and travel is not a problem.there's also a supermarket and mini mall attached to it to no fretting where to get emergency supplies from. Lots of eateries and a couple of malls about 10min slow walk away. The hotel ambience is great and spacious. The rooms are nicely equipped and clean. Nice touch on the sim-enabled phone for tourist use. Seldom see it in other local hotels. All in all, I have no regrets booking this hotel staycation to celebrate my birthday with my family! Thanks to all the staff members at Village Hotel Katong!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Good stay in Eastern coast
desc: Good location, close to transport and eastern coast. Lots of nice restaurant nearby. Room service was good and family room was big for 2 kids family. Hotel stuffs were really friendly and helpful, strong recommended for families to stay.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Thumbs up!!!
desc: Satisfied with overall service.. quality of room n facilities cleanliness n price. Privacy n comfortable environment ...Very therapeutic room atmosphere..check in and out service very good handle by the excellent staff

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: My experience at Village Katong
desc: Stayed for two nights - business conference. food is good but some dishes were there at all meals making it feel like leftovers. the food though tasty is very repetitive. Staff are very friendly and ready to help. room is excellent. I would have prefered to have CNN on TV. international news channel choice was limited. There seemed to be a lot of Singaporean channels. I wonder if a Singaporean will stay in a hotel in Singapore and watch TV. The one time we wanted to go out for Chillie crab the concierge was not able to to give us good recommendation.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Singapore holidays
desc: Superb hospitality at Village hotel katong ...it's a comfortable stay with all facilities available...The breakfast was great with decent spread of everything continental, Chinese and Indian..supermarket is at the ground and first floor..thank you Anne for guiding us.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Hotel Experience
desc: Excellent place to stay with prompt hotel services. Good facility shuttle Service to aiport, and overall facility is good. It also has a good buffet selection that feature authentic Singapore cuisines, surely a recommendable place to stay at when in Singapore.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great location for everything
desc: The Village Hotel Katong is located near the old town of Katong and an amazing choice of shops and restaurants. I usually stay in the city centre for work but this is a much better location for a holiday trip. Room was big. We had the room with a bath so we made good use of that facility. Breakfast was only average at best but you are surrounded by great breakfast places in the same building that are better quality and half the cost.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great service staff (Elfi)
desc: I would like to extend my compliments to Mr Elfi whom was on duty on Friday 11th April 2019 1715hrs. Even though hotel was booked near capacity, Elfi tried his utmost to obtain for me 2 rooms that faced each other as I had made 2 bookings. I applaud his effort and wish the management will commend and reward him where possible. Thanks and good work Elfi😊

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Peranakan Club
desc: Big room and huge bath tub for my size. Breakfast was great! Staffs were super friendly. What i didn't like was the limited food provided at the peranakan lounge. Checking in and check out was a breeze.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Had high expectations after reading reviews from Agoda
desc: Not a mindblowing experience. Despite having mentioned that it was our 5 years wedding anniversary, not even a late checkout was offered as complimentary (we had to ask for it and despite agreeing, they started calling from 12.15 onwards, asking us when we are leaving; barred our club lounge access from 12; we couldnt even get a bottle of water; pathetic customer service). TV in room is ages old, takes a lifetime to recognise external drive (on which we had a few photos we wanted to reminisce). Buffet breakfast was average; reception said that buffet time is 7am-11am; we went at 9.30am, staff started to inform us that they are closing at 10.30am; despite asking for muffins, no one topped up. We just had what was left and left. The only saving grace was the club lounge access and

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Highly recommended but get a bed count if accompanied by children!
desc: We have stayed in numerous hotels in Singapore and the Katong Village Hotel has to be one of the better ones. It is also very good value for money according to the tour director, my wife. Large, modern rooms with good facilities, comfortable, large beds and spacious bathrooms. In the heart of Katong, so very close to several shopping centres, food courts and restaurants. If you like Indian food we recommend the Zaffron Kitchen on East Coast Street, wonderful food at very reasonable prices. If you are accompanied by children you need to be very vigilant about the bed configuration. Singaporeans seem to have a bizarre concept about parent-child sleeping arrangements. 2 children and two parents in one king sized or 2 single beds is taking parent-child bonding or quality time to

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Disappointing
desc: We stayed here for 3 nights in a family room with two beds. First impression, the room we were given did not look like the advertised picture. No fancy blue bedhead, or cushions, or fancy floor rug and most disappointing of all, no bath tub. Our beds were just rested against the wall, with two small floor mats (ones that you use in the toilet) by the beds. Anyway, decor doesn't really affect my stay but disappointing mood. Overall, the negatives: - Breakfast disappointing again. I expect a lot more then just cereal, egg station, sausage, baked beans, fruits and breads. It is just a typical breakfast, nothing exciting. - Pool is small. No attendance. We were there once and no towels were available. - there was once when we came back from being out all day, the door was not

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing
desc: Amazing as always. NTUC at lower ground, Variety of eateries surrounding the vicinity. Parkway Parade was just a few minutes away. Bed was comfortable as always, quiet and peaceful. Rain shower was a plus point!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Stay in the heart of the vivid Katong quarter
desc: Great location with excellent connections to all major attractions across the city (a bus stop is directly in front of the hotel). The neighborhood is full of restaurants and bars, and there are also several shopping centres in walking distance including a small one directly connected with the hotel (with a useful supermarket). Our family room was fine and clean, the only problem was with the A/C control panel that looked a bit dated - changing the temperature or the fan speed didn't seem to do much. The bathroom felt a bit cramped, although it was nicely designed. Balcony can't be used, as its door is permanently locked. There's also a mobile with unlimited data called 'Handy' (German inspiration, perhaps), which comes in, well, handy. Especially, eh, handy to navigate

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Good location.good hotel.
desc: Good location good hotel. They offered us early check-in ,but not very early. Lots of eateries and shops around the property. Getting to the beach involves a 15 min walk. If th hotel can provide a shuttle to and from the beach it would be great.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Good Stay
desc: Room was clean, spacious and tidy. Bed was very very comfortable - we almost didn't want to leave the next morning! Be careful during check in timings tho - waited for about 30-40mins on a weekend just to check in. Overall good stay, will come back again!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Always the best hotel!
desc: booked a deluxe room but was given complimentary upgrade the a club room! love the Cleanliness of the room, and i love that the rooms are spacious, the bed is very comfy! ouh only the breakfast buffet, there isnt much variety of food.. other than that everything else is perfect!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Good value for money
desc: The friendly staff, cleanliness of room and baths with quality amenities, comfortable bed with quality pillows, spacious bath and room are also a good feature, a huge grocery store at the hotel basement is an extra facility which remains open until 11pm.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent
desc: The overall experience was wonderful. The location of hotel is near many nice food places and it is very convenient. Furthermore, the room was very clean and bed was extremely comfortable. The facilities are also very good and easily accessible.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice Shopping Plaza
desc: I stayed one night because I had a 24 hour layover in Singapore. The hotel is beautiful and has a hoping center attached it to, making it very convenient. The shopping center had a grocery store, a nail salon, you name it. The room was large but I was a little disappointed when I revived a room with 2 twin beds instead of a king size bed, as my reservation stated. The room was still very large. The glass separating the shower from the room doesn’t allow much privacy. I was alone so it was fine for me. To get to the downtown area to sightsee, it was about a $15 taxi ride away.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Frequent
desc: This is a nice Hotel. But frequent/returning guests are not rewarded for their loyalty. There is no rewards program. The Club Lounge food is poor. The rooms are spacious and clean. The lighting in the bathroom could be better

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Best Staycation!
desc: The family room we booked in was clean! My friends and I never expected it to be that big honestly. The hotel staff were friendly and warmth. They called our room immediately after check-in just to check whether we liked the room or not. It was easy to go around as the hotel was near to the places we wanted to go! We’re surely coming back for another staycation!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Recommended and will return.
desc: Everything went well. Appreciated the Peranakan Lounge amenities with free flow of snacks and drinks, as well as the complimentary shuttle bus. A proper breakfast buffet accommodating western and local taste buds. The employee, Elfie at the reception and Peranakan Lounge served us well. We felt at home.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Pleasant stay.
desc: Overall is consider good for us but if there's MRT nearby will be more convenient. The reception staff is very nice, polite & very helpful. The room is comfortable & big enough to fit 4 adult & I like it. i enjoy my stay there.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Good property with an also good access for commuting
desc: Overall good experience. The hotel room is quite spacious and the hotel staff is friendly. Not the most modern hotel you can have, but it is comfortable to stay in. my highlight would be the bus stop just behind the hotel that i can reach city center pretty easily. Even going to and from changi airport is reachable by bus (and no transfer!). that saves some dollars for us. So for anyone thinking to stay in this hotel, i suggest you to buy EZ link card at the airport and you can start using the bus right from the airport to the hotel One downside was my tv and its remote didn't work properly. but that's not a big issue to me as i didnt spend much time in the room

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: A delightful stay
desc: We booked the rooms for our VIP guests and they were most pleased with the overall experience from the welcome to the meals and departure. A cosy and welcoming hotel with warm and friendly staff at all levels

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Clean, friendly place to stay
desc: The hotel was very clean, comfortable beds and showers, good conditioning. A nice street with many cafes and restaurants right next to it. It is close to the East Coast Beach park, but the shore and the waters were very dirty with debris from the ships. Not for swimming! The location is pretty far (40-50 min on the bus) from the downtown and the Sentosa island (good beaches). But the public transportation system is great. Numerous buses at several bus stops close to the hotel, run on schedules. "Handy" cel phone provided by the hotel is a very handy tool, which we used as GPS and transfer planner. You can even make international calls to certain countries from it free of charge.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Complimentary
desc: Service Excellent Cleanliness need some improvement, especially the Toilet and flooring Location Excellent, surround alot of dinning place and nearby shopping Room to Room sound proof partition can be improve

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Superb location, Renovated Hotel
desc: - Superbly located. - Rooms are renovated & well done up. - Silent and good quality of sleep - The same breakfast buffet spread each day, very few options for strict veg. - Service levels can be improved.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Family vacation, great stay!
desc: Stayed here for the 1st time family vacation. Great shopping location, free airport transportation, free breakfast with lot of selections. Convenient store and 7-eleven is around the corner. Great customer service!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Classy hotel with excellent staff
desc: I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone who enjoys shopping and who delights in sampling authentic Singaporean dishes, especially Peranakan food. The hotel provided an atmosphere of class and classic sophistication. The rooms were spacious and had a balcony with a view either of the city of a pool. The location was fantastic as it was central to everything, food and shopping which we women adore! Overall, good experience and value for money.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Comfortable hotel
desc: The room is clean and tidy. It's very convenient with a supermarket and cafe. Staff are friendly and helpful. Lots of restaurant on East Coast Road. Highly recommended. It is also very easy to get to the city centre.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Super Value for money
desc: I personally love the check in lobby very much. It's a very comfortable place for guest to enjoy. The supermarket in the hotel is really a plus point. Room is very spacious and bathroom too. The room was very clean and bed is super comfy. Staff are very polite and check in and out is very swift

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Bad check-out experience
desc: I stayed in the Peranakan King Lounge room, was generally pleased with the room except that the toilet was soiled upon check-in. Was also really upset to find myself locked out of the room with no access to either the floor or room half an hour before our agreed check-out time.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Hotel
desc: Great hotel situated in the Marine Parade / East Coast Road area of Katong, super clean, close to lots of bars and restaurants and only 20 mins from the CBD. Excellent staff very friendly and efficient. Will definitely return soon.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Relaxing Stay in an Interesting Neighbourhood
desc: The rooms were spacious and contained all the amenities required for a comfortable stay. The beds were very comfortable. The Club Room benefits ensured that one had a breakfast and an evening snack in calm quiet surroundings. The neighbourhood is one of the older areas of Singapore with interesting restaurants and bars which are are a short walk away. Orchard Road is a pleasant bus ride away through very interesting neighbourhoods with period style homes. If one ignores the neighbourhood outside the front entrance of the hotel where construction for a new MRT line mars the landscape and just uses the back entrance into Joo Chiat Road, its really pleasant and peaceful.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: 강추!!! So great!!!
desc: 전 너무 좋았어요 공항이랑 가깝고 클럽룸도 잘 사용하고 갑니다 저는 싱다폴에 3번째 오는데 이스트코스트오시는 분들께는 추천합니다!!! Wendi wendy see 이분은 클럽룸에 계신분인데 너무 친절하십니다 감사드려요 I was so great. The hotel is close to the airport and I useed the club room veey well. I have been to Singapole for the 3rd time and I recommend it to those who come to East Coast !!! Wendy see She is in the club room. He is so kind and the best. Thank you for her. If I come back here , because of her!!!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Good
desc: Bed is comfortable,there are supermarket down the hotel, it's very convenience, but it is too far from the MRT(you need to walk about 30 minutes, or you need to take a taxi), the air conditioner can not switch temperature.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Dedicated Support in the Seminar Room
desc: My/ our deepest gratitude for the Banquet staff team on the 4th floor. Especially Four Wong's support was beyond our expectation. He seamlessly prepared everything, checked in with us for further need with friendly and professional manner.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent Hotel for a stay in Singapore
desc: Have stayed at this hotel about six times over six years and its still my first choice. The hotel is modern and tastefully decorated to reflect the local area of Singapore. The area contains modernised Shop Houses, now mainly restaurants and bars together with shopping malls. The staff are very friendly and accommodating. Anne Rose is particularly helpful at the front desk. The swimming pool on a roof time is very good as is the modern Gym. The restaurant is good as is the Business Lounge. A local MRT station is being built but the buses stop more or less outside to take you down town or to the excerlent Botanical Gardens (Free entry).You can walk to the East Coast promenade to enjoy a costal walk and beach. A good choice hotel.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Mr Sam e
desc: I had made a reservation 2 days before, when we arrived late in the evening, the staff receiving us was very friendly, as if she has been waiting for us, eagerly waiting for us, we felt the warm and care demonstrated to us, we are very happy to received a room upgrade. The facility is good, quite and very comfortable, we enjoy staying. Nearby there are many food stall of different varieties, public transport is also very convenience any traveler, it is just right outside the hotel building.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: WHOA. Chic place.
desc: My husband and I loves spending the first part of our honeymoon here. Our deluxe room was dreamy and superb. The breakfast buffet was very delicious. Having a supermarket in the basement floor was highly convenient as well.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Hotel
desc: Just spent 3 nights at the Village Hotel Katong in Singapore. Hotel is really nice, clean and efficient. Lounge on the 6th floor is good with snacks and free drinks between 6-8pm if you have access. Location is only about 15 mins from the airport with free shuttle buses available throughout the day. Lots of shops, restaurants and bars nearby.... and the beach is not far. Well worth trying this hotel for business or pleasure

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Wow!
desc: Loved it! We were so tired and lovely reception put us into a gorgeous Club Room - heaven! Most beautiful room I've stayed in for a very long while! Never heard a sound from the corridor or other rooms so got a great sleep. Next morning it was pouring with rain but we could take the hotel lift into the shopping centre for a light breakfast. Really impressed with this hotel and would happily stay here again.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent Hotel to Visit
desc: An excellent experience was also enhanced by the location of the hotel being not far from the Airport. The staff were very good and polite. Most of the facilities as ranked here were excellent. It is a hotel that is also near a shopping centre giving opportunities for quick shopping. Breakfast was also very good.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Pricing and food
desc: Lovely place to stay. Amazing shower. Great service and food. Pretty well located in Katong. Maximum 5 mins walk to everything nearby in Katong. Beds are comfortable, great coffee downstairs in Katong V. Overall a great trip

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Satisfied
desc: As a regular quest at the village rating hotel, I am always welcomed back with a smile and the warm genuine and helpful staff makes me want to return next time. Good club house service, variety of food and friendliness. Clean room.and efficient housekeeping service.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Overall Very good
desc: All things are very good. Restaurant dont give options to indian travellers but nearby good indian restaurent so no problem and hence we saved money as well. Water bottles size is very small, here needs improvement as we need to ask again and again.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Hotel with excellent location!
desc: Great Hotel! Excellent location! Friendly staff! Clean rooms and toilet! Would surely recommend and return in the future! Worth every single penny! Easily accessible with nearby amenities. Club lounge was great to wind down too!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent choice in suburb of Singapore
desc: It's the choice of place to stay for quick taste of the suburbs of Singapore. The local flavour that Village Hotel Katong offers is one of a kind! No regrets for sure! Easily accessible to Parkway for all your shopping needs.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: One night stopover
desc: Close to the airport and the KKKL bus goes from the hotel to KL. All the staff were friendly and helpful. The local restaurant strip at the front of the hotel were great. Checkout and concierge were great. Room was well maintained and spotless.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent service, excellent hotel
desc: Definitely one of the best hotels I have been to, from check in to room and lounge experiences, down to check out. Wendy, at the check in, was very helpful and attentive. She introduced me to the upgrade to the Peranakan Club lounge, which was simply awesome. Love the cocktail spread, which was just nice and sufficient though would have been perfect if the laksa soup was hotter. Alcohol drinkers will love it, unfortunately, both my partner and I don't drink. Room is very clean and spacious, with thoughtful touches such as total blackout curtains, a little booklet to introduce the places to go around the area and even a small bottle of mouth rinse! Got a surprise note and chocolate bar from Wendy at check out too!! Will definitely be back.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Awesome service!
desc: Stayed for a week and I had the best service at a hotel in a while! Friendly, efficient, welcoming and called me by my name. Room was very comfortable, pool was lovely, breakfast was yummy! Easy to get into the city. I would definitely stay here again.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice
desc: I love this hotel! So nice! Big space, clean and comfortable bed to sleep. Easy to find foods too. Everythings is good about this hotel and front dest also friendly. I would like to stay here again! :)

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Spacious, Clean and Great Customer Service
desc: I had a weekend staycation at Village Hotel Katong for my birthday weekend in the Peranakan Club King room and had a really great time here. Check-in was fuss free and the counter staff provided me with a box of chocolates. Which was nice :) I went to the Peranakan Club Lounge at level 6 and was attended to by Lina who recommended me the Katong Sling which is really tasty. The food provided there were of a high standards as well. I was also surprised by Lina and the other club lounge staff with a slice of cake. This was a really really good surprise :) Thank you Lina for singing Happy birthday as well:) To summarize, the stay was pretty awesome,the room was really spacious and clean with a nice comfortable bed. The club lounge had great food and drinks. I had a great time

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Efficient Service to make your business efficient
desc: I have stayed many times at this hotel for business and I found the location is very convenient for me. Not too far from Changi Airport and surrounded by a lot of good restaurants in walking distance. Yet, there's one Japanese Restaurant in the Mall that attached to this Hotel. All staff are very courteous and always offer assistance. I think I have some concern to be addressed here for the good sake of the hotel management as follow; 1. Staff turn-over might be high so that I see many new faces. As a repeat customer, I would expect that everybody would call me by name not sir. 2. Sometimes I see only 2 staff working behind the Reception Counter whilst many guests queue. 3. I noticed that the Taxi booth (where you could actually book a taxi yourself) has gone so that

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Beautiful Spacious Room and Great Location!
desc: You aren't in the downtown area but if you prefer a more quiet area with easy access downtown than this is the place to stay. There is a bus stop right in front of the hotel that will take you downtown-it only costs about $2USD one way. You will need coinage if you don't have a bus card. The rooms are gorgeous and comfortable, mine had a balcony with a view overlooking the round pool. Great in house restaurant-be sure to try the breakfast buffet-it is wonderful. You do have to pay extra for the buffet but it is well worth it with loads to choose from. The surrounding neighborhood is FULL of eateries all reasonably priced and be sure to walk to Sri Senpaga Vinayagar Temple which is very close and interesting.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Stay
desc: From the warm friendly welcome at reception to the free shuttle to the air terminal our stay was a wonderful experience. Many thanks to all staff at this wonderful establishment. Looking forward to a return experience.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Perfection!
desc: Generous staff, big rooms with lots of storage space, clean and designed. Sleep is easy with a bed mattress and pillows like sleeping on a cloud, amazing shower: plenty hot water and what a water flow. Quiet, great gym. Not one downer. close to bus stations, chip taxi ride to city center.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Katong
desc: I spent there 4 nights. From check-in till check-out everything was perfect. People very nice, always helpfull, rooms clean, great choice of breakfast, nice location, behind the hotel are a lot of restaurants and seaside park for runners not far away. I recommend a stay in this hotel and would like to come back.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Comfortable hotel with excellent service
desc: We have been very happy with this hotel. We wanted to be out of the centre of the city and have found this neighbourhood to be much quieter. The buses are close by so this location is no problem. It is a fairly basic hotel in terms of room facilities, but the service is exceptionally good. We purchased the upgrade for breakfast and access to the Club Lounge which gave us excellent value for money.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Feels like home
desc: We have stayed several times at this terrific hotel. We love the Katong district for the food and the architecture but the stayed is made memorable with this hotel. The staff at the hotel and the club room are really friendly and professional. Special thanks to Wendy and Ravin for their wonderful welcome and service. We will be back. John &Irene

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Room is spacious and clean
desc: reasonably acceptable. other than the bed sheet is a bit rough. We usually had a late dinner and as for Food wise, only left the Japanese restaurant for which it is good. But they close pretty early and last order is at 9:30pm. The waitresses are nice but seem to chase us away especially when it comes to last order time. Perhaps they should improve on this, not to chase the client away as they take their time to eat. Give the client a bit of buffer time.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Friendly and awesome staff
desc: I went to the club lounge with my friend and we had a wonderful cocktail time not just with the food selection but the staff Anne and Elfi that stands out that evening because of there warn smile and passion of what they are doing, Kodus to the Department for having a staff like them.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Near eateries & lovely rooms
desc: Katong is known for a wide selection of eateries and good choices. Armed with that knowledge, I booked the hotel. The room was bigger than most Village Hotels and I loved the decoration & ambience. Very comfortable bed and pillows. Loved that a shopping centre is attached and a big convenience store is below. The gym was well equipped and pool was cozy.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Location
desc: It is very convenience for travel to airport as well as downtown and take a few minutes to reach there by cabs. Amenities & shopping mall are also nearby. Food courts are just stone away from the hotel.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: It was great
desc: The facilities and staff were really good. Only thing is that it is kinda far from the city center, but there are some great spots to eat in Katong and it's connected to a mall with a grocery store, so it's very convenient.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Have enjoyed being a Village Hotel guest the past few times. Definitely returning to both I stayed.
desc: I enjoyed both my stays at village Hotel Katong and Changi. My children as well. We are looking forward to the next trip with them. The staff have been lovely. Katong is fantastic with all the nearby amenities.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great place to stay in Singapore
desc: Good value hotel to stay in interesting Katong district with loads of eating options. Excellent facilities, friendly efficient staff, good sized rooms with comfortable beds. Bathroom very nice. Easy access to airport via bus 36.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Still our Favourite Hotel
desc: You won't be disappointed when staying at the Village Hotel Katong. The staff are wonderful, always helpful and going out of their way to make sure your stay is perfect. The hotel is situated between Changi Airport and the city and its only a short walk to the beach front. The hotel shuttle runs between the airport and the hotel. The rooms are tastefully decorated and moderately priced. Tip - book a Club Room - gives you late check out, cocktails and canapes,breakfast and all day refreshments. Will definitely be back again.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Wonderful
desc: Had a great stay here. Lovely and kind staff, clean and comfortable rooms with good amenties. We were able to use the gym shower facilities after checking out to freshen up and make use of the complementary shuttle. Will be back when in Singapore next.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Comfortable hotel and value for money
desc: We had a great experience staying in this hotel. The water pressure of the showerhead and the rain shower was strong and excellent. We love the cleanliness of the room and the softness of the bed. Overall, we enjoyed our staycation in this hotel and definitely will come back for our stay soon.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: clean & quiet
desc: Possible to have more discount with breakfast. Hotel provide family rooms x 4 pax which is good & seldom find in other hotels. Location is relatively nearby airport which is good. wi fi was weak in the beginning but rectify later. Thank you.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Impeccable service and it feels home!
desc: This is our 3rd time staying at this hotel and we may say that the service is impeccable. Special mentioned to Anne as she always find time to meet us each time, her recommendations help us so much.She makes us feel home. The hotel location is very convenient. Supermarket below the building. Local eateries around the area.We do highly recommend this hotel. It is a must to try and stay.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Village Katong
desc: This is first time to stay there for business trip. Good service and quality as well as variety of food and beverages however it is quite far away from city. Without subway trains connected. They provided free shuttle bus service from airport to hotel whole day.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: If u planning to get double bed please book deluxe room
desc: If u planning to get double bed please book their deluxe room. I made a mistake by booking superior room and upon checking in I was told that double beds for superior rooms are very limited and hence i have to pay an additional SGD20++/night to upgrade myself to deluxe room in order to get a double bed or king size bed! On a positive note, rooms are good, clean. Beds are comfy. Sliding doors in balcony are hard to open once u are out on the balcony trying to get in. Service wise above average

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Business Hotel that also lets you live like a local
desc: Great service, fast wifi and good options for breakfast. If you can, book the floor with the Peranakan Lounge, they serve breakfast there as well as afternoon cocktails full of local delicacies. The place is not in the busy part of SG but culture is right at the back of the hotel. Feel free to explore and live like a local.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Clean and comfortable
desc: Clean and big room. They rent a cell phone for free. Location is pretty good. There are a lot of bars and restaurants near by the hotel. If you want to go downtown, take a bus right in front of the hotel. It's so fun using public buses because you can see around the city during on your way to down-town.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Hotel with interesting concept but can do with more variety
desc: Had a staycation with my family in the Peranakan Club Room over the weekend. The room is huge and lots of space to maneuver which is great for families, especially those with small children. Very interesting design where they incorporated Peranakan elements into the rooms and the hotel in general. It was a decent stay for the price that I paid for, which includes access to the Peranakan Lounge. However, there are several areas for improvement. Check in: Perhaps it was the school holidays but I didn't managed to get my room until 230pm even though check-in time was 2pm. However, the hotel staff kindly allowed me to wait at the Lounge, so I could have some drinks and snacks while waiting. I also requested for a baby cot which took a while to arrive after check-in. Room: As

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Okay
desc: Ok stay. Needs abit of upgrade for rooms, as things getting old. Prices can get better as it’s not exactly a centralized location with easy access to subway. Staff can get friendly n recognize their frequent hotel patrons more.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Staycation
desc: The hotel has good location.Almost near to the Airport. On one side of the hotel is the Parkway Parade Shopping Mall. You can find almost anything here besides shopping itself. They have groceries store. Fashion and beauty. Even entertainment such as a cinema and game arcade. On the other side of the hotel where situated old shop houses. Many shop there too. The hotel rooms was very clean. Staff were friendly. I love staying in this hotel.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice and comfortabel hotel with super staffservice
desc: We are a family with 3 kids and booked 2 rooms at Village Hotel for a long weekend in Singapore Village hotel is a really nice and comfortabel hotel with super staffservice They helped and advised us going into town. Also they had good advise renting bikes and going to local restaurants nearby We had a great stay before we continued our trip towards Australia

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Visit to Singapore
desc: Very Good Hotel for Families, with a small nice mall attached. I especially like the optician in the facility because i had accidentally broken the spectacles. the swiming pool is also very nice and clean. Recommend improving the breakfast menu, but overall it is very nice.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Location - Location - Location
desc: Friednly staff, clean and expansive room. While you have a seperate bathroom, shower etc., the bath is just next to the bed. It works. Crazy but it works. We had Club/Exec., lounge access and although for the 5 to 7pm drinks etc., it was great but please do not have breakfast there. Seriously the main dining room had possibly the best buffet breakfast we have ever had. You are just a 10 to 15 minute walk to the beach. On doing so you go past a great "Hawker" food mall and several department stores. Well worth the walk. The hotel itself it attached to a mall which had some of the best restaurants in Singapore. I highly reconmend TOMI the Japanese restaurant. In my top three of Japanese restaurants outside of Japan and Hawaii. A must try.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Time in Katang
desc: Met our basic expectation. I would give it three rather than four stars as far as Europeans standard. Nice swimming pool and good breakfast. Very pleasant and helpful staff. Good location and the airport shuttle did the job

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great stay
desc: We were a family of 4 staying in the family room with 2 double beds. the beds were comfortable and we had a large tv in the room. The wifi and airconditiong worked well, the pool was great in the evening after our days of sightseeing. The breakfast was great with lots of choices. the boys loved the pancake machine ! I would recommend the hotel. We also used the free shuttle bus to and from the airport.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent Stay; Great Value
desc: Beautiful room and hotel, friendly staff, clean and great breakfast options. They also provided me with gluten-free bread. They provided shuttle transportation for our group. Easy access to lots of busses. Would definitely come back.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Good location
desc: Nice Hotel, very clean and tidy. Staff are very friendly and helpful. Rooms are modern clean and have everything you need. Regular free shuttle service to airport. Good swimming pool and gym. Would recommend this hotel.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Stay
desc: Excellent service from the club lounge. Good spread of food. WIll stay again in near future. Thanks to the staff from executive lounge. Swimming size is decent.Room is clean and neat. Amenities are great. NTUC finest is just at basement. Katong 112 walking distance.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: とても幸せです
desc: いまはにかいめでとまります、へやがふるいけどばんごはんはとてもおいしいです。みんなのスタフがやさしくていいえがおがくれまます。ほんとに幸せになっております。みなさんシンガポルに行ったら village ホテルでとまってくださいませ。 これでいろいろよろしくおねがいいたします。 じゃまったじかんがあればもいっかいとまります。もっとがんばって village hotel おきゃくさまのためにうれしいきもちをさせてくださいませ。 All Thank you I'm happy, nice, and enjoy stay village hotel

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: 5-star service
desc: Was in Singapore for a brief stopover and needed somewhere close enough to the airport and city. I have stayed in some of the other Far East Hotels in Singapore previously and found them to be respectable experiences. Village Katong has taken it to a new level of personal service and unique room design. A great experience if you don't need to be in the centre of the city. High level of service attention, good quality room F&B ok too.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Village Hotel Katong - Superb!
desc: Excellent hotel with superb facilities. Convenient location with complimentary airport shuttle. Everything was quite superior about this hotel, other than the fact that the airport shuttle is at a frequency of 90 minutes, so you need to plan ahead.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Best Service and polite staff👍
desc: I would like thank all the staff of hotel village katong specially thank to IFFA & Housekeeping They are the precious gem of the hotel so kind and helpful as always katong hotel is our 1st choice keep it up team see you soon😊👍

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: very good
desc: very good, good room and good swimming pool,and the supermaket is convernice,and near the local building,and near the makets,and near the bus station,and the price is OK,and is clear and good,and check in and check out is quick.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Family visit
desc: The hotel was ok, it's attached to a small mall with a supermarket selling almost everything you may have forgotten to bring. The big downside is if you are looking forward to beacon at breakfast you are going to be disappointed as its a halal restaurant, yet the rooms have a bible in the bedside drawers. Never notice anywhere in the hotel information when booking that it was halal.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Good experience
desc: Very nice staff. Spacious room. Nice breakfast. We were happy with the shuttle service as well as the fact that we were allowed to go shower in the gym after checkout and before going to the airport..

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: no complaints
desc: Quiet, clean comfortable friendly no complaints friendly helpful staff Great transport to andfrom airport Enjoyed pool andgym.Location ok but a long wY from CBD , lovely andclose to East Coast Park forrecreation and walk to C B D. Lors of shops nearby.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great experience
desc: Many famous eatery and restaurant around this hotel. Hotel quality is at top-notch and the most importantly it provide the quietness that we look for. Although is a little out of town but is worth every mile to stay there.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice new hotel in Katong
desc: We booked the family room with 2 adults/2 children. The room is very specious and the beds were excellent. Bathroom was bright and comfortable and bathing supplies were more than sufficient. The hotel is conveniently located opposite the Parkway Parade shopping mall - and the charming part of East Singapore (Joo Chiat road/East cost park). The pool was better than I expected from the pictures. Big enough to swim with children and cool down - and a lovely place to hang out. Staff is friendly and helpful - the hotel is big enough to offer everything you expect - but not too big to loose the human touch. Will come back when I am in Singapore again.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Very clean, friendly service, good location
desc: Staff was friendly and efficient. Rooms and bathroom were very clean all the time. Location is good, a lot of shopping malls around. Even in the same building there is a shopping mall and a supermarket. Good breakfast.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Awesome!
desc: This was our 2nd stay at Village Katong. The staycation was a birthday treat for my daughter. The hotel gave her a box of chocolate truffles and a chocolate cake sprinkled with mini marshmallows. The cake was delicious. More importantly, it was a pleasant surprise for us and much appreciated. The pool wasn’t crowded that weekend so we enjoyed ourselves thoroughly. Room was clean and spacious too. Special mention to the nice lady who checked in for us. She was friendly, efficient and helpful; a stark contrast to the “not so pleasant” check in experience we had in April with a male staff. Will definitely be back when prices are right 😀

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great layover hotel
desc: Second stay for us at this property. Like the option of family room for 4 adults. Great location half way to downtown and airport. Lots of great places to eat around the hotel. Buffet breakfast was plentiful with lots of options.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Quick stay in Singapore
desc: Nice hotel, lovely pool, good size room, bathroom a bit small. Breakfast ok. Staff ok but not as friendly as in other hotels. Easy to reach from airport. We missed the shuttle and didn’t want to wait 1.5 hours for the next one, same on return Sonja’s to take taxis

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent
desc: It was a nice stay. Hotel staff was very friendly and helpful. Definitely would come back to stay here again. Hotel was so clean and comfortable. Location was also great with supermarket which is a walking distance.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Eastern Charm
desc: The Village Hotel, Katong, is highly recommended for couples and, at a stretch, couples with a single child. It is run efficiently by a very nice group of staff, a big shout out to the hotel porters in particular. The in-house dining is well stocked with both local and overseas favourites. The hotel pool is very nice, and the gym (although not used), appears to have all the essentials, including a small sauna. Although currently Katong has no MRT station, one is under construction. But the taxis are excellent.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Super value
desc: Fantastic location with plenty to eat (local and international) and see around the hotel. Walking distance to a number of nice malls like Parkway Parade and I12 Katong! Room is sparkling clean and spacious. Tub is strategically positioned! Staffs are friendly and helpful. Club Lounge is very comfortable too. I'm very pleased. Highly recommended!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: nice stay, family hotel, yet quiet
desc: Our family stayed in the hotel over a holiday weekend so the hotel was full (unable to get early check-in), yet it was actually quite quiet and peaceful, so the rooms must have had good soundproofing. The rooms were individual rooms without a connecting door to the adjoining room (at least on the floor I stayed in), so you might want to check with the hotel in case you have children and need rooms with a connecting door. The location was good and there was free parking for guests. Supermarket in the same building and lots of eateries around. Like most Far East properties, they supply a handphone in the room that you can use to make calls (if you don't have a handphone...) Very good value for the price.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: EXCELLENT STAYCATION
desc: Hotel located at very good location. There are many eatery around the Hotel. Hotel staffs are friendly. We were being upgraded to a Junior Suite for free. I would recommend this Junior Suite to Business traveller staying a week or more because you do not have to worry about your laundry, there is a washing machine and iron board in the room. Hotel are very thoughtful, they even prepare a hanging rack in the room to hang your laundry out in the balcony.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: services
desc: clean and tidy rooms, good service, excellent club services. very comfortable bed rooms. I really like the club services. I will recommend this hotel to everyone I know who is coming to Singapore. food is good. I recommend to add some vegetarian dishes in the breakfast.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Katong village
desc: Very friendly reception Very good service Sound proofing need to be improved as I'm a light sleeper. Cn hear the pipe N water sound middle of the night. Room is spacious Pool is good Hotel breakfast variety limited. Must be improved

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing Stay!
desc: No doubt I had an amazing stay! Totally love the concept of the room and the comfort of the bed. The breakfast package was delicious. Only minor downfall was the availability of room during checkout. Hence, they were unable to accommodate my request and did not give other alternatives.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice quiet family hotel
desc: We stayed in a family room which are comfortable enough to accommodate 2 adults and 2 kids. Breakfast choices were extensive. Hotel is located within walking distance to Park Parade Mall and other neighbourhood malls. Closed to restaurants and food court.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Katong Village for Convenience
desc: Easy to get to - although they changed the bus on this trip and signage was not good. Overall the stay was easy and comfortable. Easy to get to food of all types within walking distance and shopping centres.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent service and room
desc: Excellent from the hotel staff especially the front desk staff Ravin and duty manager Clemence for the upgrade. Great and spacious room with quiet environment for relaxation together with lounge excess.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Cuti2 Singapura 2019
desc: Overall good experience at the hotel. Location, food, room a d services. Hotel sldo provides free shuttle service to and fro Changi Airport to hotel. Within hotel located shopping complex and surrounding area few complexes, the bigger one being Parkway Parade. Once the MRT under construction is ready hotel accessibality will be even better.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Perfect location
desc: We were looking for an overnight stay in Singapore , that was reasonably close to the airport and restaurants, with a good quality room . The Village Hotel ticks all these boxes and we actually wished we had stayed a few more nights ! Great selection of food in Changi Village and an easy walk through the park to the river ! A fifteen minute cab ride from the airport, at $14.00 . We thoroughly enjoyed it !

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Double charged me
desc: They double charged me, and I have to wait 2 - 3 weeks to get my money back.. this is not good, they should do an immediate reversal... But the service quality and cleanliness was excellent... It’s very close to bars restaurants and shopping. And close to the airport too..

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: A decent stay option at Katong
desc: The room was decently sized, with balcony, and with all basic amenities in the room. Though its an old hotel, its decently managed. Breakfast served was good and had wide variety (though not much for vegie like me). Overall a value for money.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Very clean and friendly staff. Rooms bit outdated
desc: We stayed here for 8 days in August. The hotel smells very fresh and clean. The staff are very polite and nice. However, don't expect North American service where they provide free early check in, give you room options or explain your stay and perks, especially given we stayed for a long duration. Rooms are a little bit old and outdated, but clean and well kept. The thermostat in our room kept making a grr noise which affected our sleep. Room service and in-room dining is prompt and well done. I found writing down what I want working well for us. Their housekeeping seems very confused about what their guests use and need help in knowing what to replenish (e.g they kept replenishing body wash when we hadn't even opened the bottles from the first day in a 3-day stretch, but

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Comfortable and quiet
desc: We had an enjoyable 3 night stay early September. Easy access to supermarket and cafes downstairs in a shopping centre. Our room was spacious and had comfortable, twin queen beds (a definite luxury!) Staff very helpful and friendly. Short walk to main shopping strip with a huge variety of eating places in both directions. Breakfast was delicious. Good value and highly recommended.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Clean and comfortable
desc: We stayed in this hotel in September when the F1 was on. We booked as part of a package so I don't really know how much we paid for the 5 nights we stayed. The package included F1 tickets, flights and accommodation through Singapore Airlines. We did have a choice of hotels and this one was a little cheaper plus we chose not to go with the breakfast option as we knew we probably wouldn't use it. So I cannot comment on the meals in the hotels restaurants. We did have a few little issues that the team there worked to rectify as quickly as possible of which we appreciated. In some of the hotel photos on different websites you will see what looks like a fridge in the room, it isn't it is a wine chiller. So please be aware there is no fridge in the room if you wish to have your own

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Exceeding Expectations
desc: Just returned back from a whirlwind 4 nights in Sing......this hotel has completely blown me away. Did a family room on this trip which had balcony and was spacious for the 4 of us. 11th Floor views were spectacular, there is so much happening in all directions. The room itself was comfortable and well serviced, the staff even went as far as asking for feedback or preferences which was nice halfway through our stay. Room was well cleaned each day. Aircon in the heat was seamless and worked perfectly. The breakfast was a treat, varied menu and different items each day along with your normal favorites meant the kids didn't get bored. Egg station ladies were on the A game the whole time. The star of the show for us was the Staff.....super helpful, friendly and very

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Anne Rose Herrera Quiambao(front desk manager) WOW...Anne and Sankar(house keeping) delivered world class service..
desc: very friendly and helpful staff...very clean and refreshed rooms/hotel.. AWESOME variety of food at breakfast...very efficient staff and processes...no issues with WIFI ..Anne (front desk manager) arranged shower facilities even though we were 10 hours past check out(late night flight)....Anne also made us feel extremely welcome at the hotel even though we had checked out early morning- Anne treated us as if we were family-...compliments to Sankar for ensuring our room was clean and neatened up every day ON time ..Sankar also extremely polite and patient-what a nice guy....I would recommend this hotel for business or leisure..restaurants and supermarket available as you step out hotel.....feels safe and secure

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Weekend Staycation
desc: Check in was a breeze except for a slight hiccup, but still acceptable. Room was neat and tidy, as well as the bathroom. Hotel had NTUC nearby, very convenient. We had an event at the hotel’s Katong Kitchen, the staff were very accommodating and efficient.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Stayed here on way back to Australia. Found the hotel ideal for our stopover.
desc: Wonderful service here, let us into our room at 10am in the morning as we arrived early. The receptionist at front desk was very helpful in giving us advice on the area and so friendly.........ROOMS WERE GREAT and will definitely stay here next time in Singapore. Many thanks.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Awesome service
desc: We have events here. And four has been an examplary host. He is attentive, helpful, proactive and has made us feel much welcomed in many ways. Food is often replenished. Places are often cleaned up. Requests are listened too! Thank you.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing experience!
desc: Amazing experience in Village Hotel Katong. Very friendly staff and perfect room. Hotel is not far from Bay Area. Me and my girlfriend enjoyed all the hints given by the staff from restaurants to must do's in Singapore.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Be back soon
desc: Why Village Hotel Katong is my go to hotel in Singapore: 1) Reception staff. I felt welcome to be in Singapore and at the hotel; everyone was always extremely helpful and smiling. Thank you to Clemence for helping me with directions of the nearest bus stand. Also to Wendy and Ninh for helping me practice Chinese. Location: At less than 15 mins to reach the hotel from the airport, a short bus journey to the heart of Singapore, the location is very convenient. Facilities: well kitted out gym where i smashed a few decent workours. The pool is decently sized, actually allowing you to swim. Room: Spacious, squeaky clean and an extremely comfortable bed. After a day of 40000 steps walking, I slept like a baby. For the price, Village Hotel Katong is excellent. See you next time!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Power maintenance staycation
desc: My humble abode is so comfortable so hardly any chance for a staycation. The opportunity came when my apartment had a 2 night power maintenance shutdown - no electricity for 2 nights? I can’t sleep without air condition! Village Hotel Katong checked all the boxes I was looking for in a staycation - quiet area in the east, close to amenities and free parking. Service staff was friendly. Great area for food choices. The room had a nice long table where I could do my work with free WiFi. Close to city centre where I had lunch appointments. But the best part of staycation is NO housework - all taken care of.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice rooms but lacking good facilities and food/coffee
desc: Hair dryer didn't work. Coffee machine in the breakfast room didn't work. On plus side the room was lovely, I had a delusion and the shower was great. I would stay again because of the room but that's really all.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Peranakan Themed Hotel
desc: My husband and I stayed in this Peranakan themed hotel for the first time. Was upgraded to the Peranakan Club Room, very beautiful, quiet and clean with a balcony. Very friendly and happy staff. We are happy there is a nice swimming pool and fitness centre. There is a supermarket next to the hotel, many restaurants and bars, shpoing malls like Parkway Parade, 112 Katong etc and East Coast Park. Although is not near MRT at the moment(a MRT at Parkway Parade soon) there are buses to town and other MRT stations. Thanks to Wendy See and the staff who served us at the Peranakan lounge and throughout our stay. To our surprise, Wendy offered some chocolate and sweets for us to eat on our way to the airport. The hotel also has free shuttle bus to and from the airport which is very

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: HUGE surprise - this place is great!!
desc: This place was nearly perfect in terms of overall quality for the price. The staff was very friendly, attentive, and followed up via email prior to the reservation with alacrity. The room was spacious, A/C worked perfectly, TV was good, and lighting was very adequate. Bathroom was a bit more than adequate, but the shower was great, with strong water pressure and was hot. Stayed in the club level and having the club room to get a quick soda or snack was great. Also served as a workspace when needed. Gym has everything someone needs for a good workout. Location is awesome, in a little nook outside of the city, but shops and restaurants all around. Really a hidden gem. Singapore is extremely safe, so feel free to take the MRT (subway) when the terminal is built.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Good location
desc: The hotel is in a very convenient location. The reception is very nice and modern. The rooms are big and clean. Decoration is not to my taste and bit tacky in my opinion. The internet is terrible in my room. I had to go to near by shop to attend some online meeting

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: After our cruise
desc: The hotel and staff were amazing. Our only trouble was the published shuttle from the airport location was changed and we were at the airport about 2 1/2 hours trying to get to the hotel. At the hotel we were so well taken care of that I would recommend this hotel to anyone. Great experience

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: 2 extended nights at Village Hotel Katong
desc: highly recommended. overall rating is 8.5/10. room is spacious and very comfy. lobby is huge and welcoming. female staff "Niixxx" very helpful and kind. pool is nice and cold. excellent customer service with refunds and exchange due to error in hotel chose. Thanks!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent stay.
desc: Clean, large and comfortable rooms with excellent amenities and very friendly, helpful staff. Thank you to Joanne Wong in the restaurant who helped my daughter with her fussy needs. She was so lovely and patient.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Good hotel
desc: Good hotel with nice locality Friendly staff Clean and tidy maintained rooms Excellent room service and peaceful environment We have enjoyed staying in this hotel And front desk is very cooperative and helpful

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Cozy boutique hotel in good location escaping from bustle
desc: I love this hotel. I used several times for 5-6 years. Especially I stay upon arrival and before departure as it is only 15 min taxi ride if their shuttle bus schedule does not fit to flight schedule. There are lot of restaurants and bars, and shops.Also this hotel and surrounding town has charming atmosphere of Orient culture and not noisy like downtown of Singapore. Rate is always reasonable and good value. .

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Everything is good except the location
desc: This is a good hotel, a lot of good restaurants closed to you and just 5-10 mins walk, have a large super market downstairs and 7-11 in the opposite side, the only one comment is the hotel not nearby MRT station, only can take bus to others visitors point.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: a good value hotel with a different view of singapore
desc: this hotel is located in the middle of an interesting neighbourhood, so it's ideal for someone who likes to stroll the street looking for local food and seeing how the locals go about their lives. the hotel is attached to a small shopping arcade so while it's not like a 5-star with in-house conveniences, all necessary shopping and services are all close by, including a good size supermart, hairdressing, reflexology, travel agents, and so on. there are also plenty of food outlets in nearby shops or food courts, serving western and local fairs, including a famous Katong laksa outlet. the room i had was clean and blameless. sleep quality was fantastic. i consider the buffet breakfast above average in terms of quality and ambience of the restaurant. the coffee was so good... the

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent location
desc: I love how it’s located in the middle of heritage area of Katong. Everything I need is within the walking distance: supermarkets, cafe, restaurant, museums, shops, and bus stop. Also not far from Changi airport and the city center.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: It was good
desc: Cost performance is high.There are restaurants and supermarkets nearby, making it a great place to stay cheap.It is convenient to buy souvenirs and beer at the supermarket on the 1st floor. I used Grab several times, but most of them were picked up at the entrance of the supermarket on the 1st floor, not the lobby on the 2nd floor.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Flower power night
desc: On behalf of my company and my batch mates from B19 we would like to thank the banquet team for the great support and wonderful service provided. From the onset of our negotiations with Eugene right till the completion of the event, no requests is deemed to be too big nor too difficult to fulfill. What can we say about the event Food - yummy Ballroom- exquisite PA system - 👍 Staff - an absolute gem. I must mention these people whom were all the way giving their all for the success of your event Manager - Eugene (he is the man!!!) Four Wong - though your name is four, you are number 1 to us. Mr Kana- your service kena (touched) our hearts Thank you village hotel katong for everything done We are looking forward to do more events at your venue

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Staycation
desc: Clean and nice comfy room. Luxury space. Bath room with glass type shower was good hygiene. Housekeeping was excellent, anytime u need they provide good service. Lastly check out late was awesome sometimes over slept or have issue in the toilet. Overall was good. For sure i will come again for staycation. Thank you Katong Village Hotel

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Value for Money
desc: The room is spacious, bathroom is clean, location is ideal (downstairs have restaurant and NTUC), price is reasonable, I would recommend this hotel to friends whoever need a short stay-cations like me.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Different area to explore
desc: My boyfriend and I stayed at this hotel for a night as an airport stop over. I originally chose it due to its close proximity to the airport and the free airport transfers, which were absolutely seamless and I would highly recommend using. After staying in Singapore for a few days at the beginning of our trip, we knew we wanted to head into the Marina area to see the supertrees show at Gardens by the Bay. As the hotel is not near an MRT (which I think could be slightly inconvenient if you are staying for longer than a night), we had to get a taxi in. We tried to use Grab however had our trips cancelled, so opted for the hotel to call us a taxi. The concierge did this and it arrived within 2 minutes, which was really helpful. To get to Marina Bay Sands was $16 SGD, and when we

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent
desc: Excellent accommodation and value for money. Suitable location for my business visits and I recommend this hotel highly. Nearby local food and amenities. Friendly and efficient staff. Finally, it is reasonably near the Singapore international airport.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Company event at Saffron Room
desc: Recent company event held at this hotel, Saffron Room was very satisfactory. From their Banquet Manager, Eugene to their servers Four and Kunalan, the entire experience was nothing but exceptional. Eugene has been fabulous in accommodating our requests and our frequent changes of itinenary were met with pleasant obligations. Nothing is too small nor too troublesome for the 2 servers that I had mentioned. They were wonderful and worked tirelessly the whole night. Definitely recommend this place for company events and you will not be disappointed. Great job GUYS!!!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: [Events] Ground Service Staff Four sets the standard for service!
desc: We're a training company that hosts trainers from all over the world, and participants mostly based in Singapore. We have utilised Village Hotel Katong's hotel rooms as well as event rooms like Serai (for 9 days in total) & Galangal (1 evening event). Location: Location is not too central, but the hotel rooms are clean and well-maintained. Concierge: Service at the hotel desk & concierge is fine - could be friendlier Food: Buffet food is quite tasty, quality of ingredients is only so-so, and apart from salads there are very few vegetarian options. Understand that vegetarians would have to order ala carte - hope to see more vegetarian-friendly food served at the buffet. Break items' menu doesn't offer healthier choice options. Looking forward to seeing more variety of

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Compliment to Mr Eugene Thia, Mr Four Wong, Mr kana and team for 18Oct19 event at Saffron ballroom.
desc: I must compliment Senior Catering Manager Eugene Thia and the Banquet assistant Four and Kana for a great job in helping to ensure we had a successful event . Four was helpful in the set up of our laptops for playing of audios and videos during the event. Four and Kana for allowing the decoration team some time in advance to decorate the ballroom. Kana and Four was helpful with ensuring the the event and drinks were promptly refilled. I must compliment you “Eugene” for a great event you have help us with. From the planning stages, you have time and again help to relook into our budget constraints to help us out with a win win package for our event. We are very happy with the way the events turn out. You were hands on to ensure the food was sufficient for the evening.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Staycation
desc: Nice place for a staycation. Location is convenient. Room is clean and spacious. Very convenient location with a fairprice downstairs and food and etc just a short walk away. Would definitely return again

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Good choice
desc: Large clean comfortable room with balcony. Good Wi-Fi and pool too. Friendly and polite staff. Hotel located in a quiet neighborhood very close to restaurants and shops within a short walk. Everything was perfect

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: comfortable stay
desc: stayed here a couple of nights on our way to Italy to board our cruise ship, nice quiet room and comfortable beds, lots of shopping, restaurants and temples nearby plus a 15 minute walk down to the ocean, Good location and helpful staff, a bit pricey but it was a nice hotel. Good views from the balcony although there were some bits of rubbish obviously left behind by previous occupants out there.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Very good
desc: Spacious room. With balcony. The king-size bed was very comfortable. My shower experience was good. Front desk staff was efficient and friendly. Surrounded by an array of eateries and shopping. Good value.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Katong near the Beach
desc: The hotel is clean and professionally managed. It is near a shopping centre and a few restaurants. The hotel restaurant is alcohol free. At one time the hotel was beside the beach but reclaimed land makes it about a 1km walk. Worth it as it has a bike and walking path along the beach for 10+kms. My only issue was maintainance work that commenced at 2am but stopped once I phone reception. Other than that it was very quiet.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Highly recommend it!
desc: Can’t fault it!! Punches way above its weight! Location is great, rooms are very well appointed and large. Pool is good enough to spend time relaxing in and by, gym, food and overall service is exactly what you need. And very reasonably priced today!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Family room
desc: Even though the room was named the family room, there is nothing attractive to kids in the room. Only one cartoon channel, no waddling pool, no playground. The only pool they had was a round pool where 1.2 and 1.8 depth is together.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Convenient & Superb Stay
desc: Good service and variety of breakfast, very convenient complimentary hourly airport pickup! Helpful staff and convenient as there is a supermarket downstairs (NTUC FairPrice), shopping mall next door (Katong 112) and many restaurants nearby.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Eco green Hotel!
desc: I love staying at this hotel. Go down you can reach NTUC Fair Price Supermarket. Go Behind it a lot of food and you go front of it with a little bit crossing the road, you will find mall. So convenient! And the amenities is very loveable. They provide the bamboo toothbrush!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Overall good experience
desc: My first time staying in V Village hotel though it was only a night stay. Loved the interior modern look after renovated. The room was spacious and it was quiet. Breakfast was average, but cleanliness could be improved.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Disappointed that standards have dropped
desc: Our family has stayed here multiple times over the years, and so, we have past experiences to compare to. The good: - The family room is spacious enough for our family, especially as the children are growing up and not that small in size anymore. - Walking distance to amenities for family activities like eating and shopping (Parkway Parade), recreation (East Coast Park), movies (Katong 112), last-minute things to buy (supermarket on the 1st floor). The neutral: - Lockers are finally available at the steam room, but there were no operating instructions. I spent a bit of time but couldn’t figure out how to lock the locker. What’s the point of having a locker when it cannot be locked? However, I guess it’s better than previously when there were no lockers at all to store your

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Hotel with a heart
desc: Friendly people that compliments well with a great place to stay. Very comfortable and the first hotel in the Singapore that has a great air conditioning in the room. The room we had was quiet and you feel at home.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Average
desc: Stayed for 3 days with 4 people the rooms are okay the location is good . The staff are nice and were eager to get us taxis . The Indian restaurant nearby is excellent and the area is surrounded by restaurant and super markets

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Wonderful staff
desc: I have just had one glorious week at this hotel where the staff went over and above call of duty to assist me as I was on crutches. Special mention to Ann and to the housekeepers on Level 6. Only comment is that the Hotel's Shuttle Bus would only drop at Terminal 2 even though there were no other passengers on the bus and I needed to get to another Terminal.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice hotel in good area
desc: The prices here are reasonable for Singapore and they have a small pool and medium sized gym. The staff are incredibly helpful and the rooms are clean. Bathrooms are excellent and if you are a foodie there is a big selection of local restaurants

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: business trip
desc: It's a business trip, overall is good stay, clean, comfortable, with wifi, friendly staff.... You need to press the button for room housekeep if not, you will be wondering why no room housekeeping....

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Lovely Hotel and Wonderful Staff
desc: From the bellhop to the front desk manager, they were always eager to please. Some of the names that I would like to mention are Anne, Wendy, Ayob, brendon, and Iffy, not too sure about the spelling. There were also others but I cannot seem to remember their names. The rooms were comfortable and clean. The breakfast served at Level 6 was a delight, and the area was very relaxing. Shops and restaurants are within walking distance. Our first stay at this Hotel but under a different name was some 34 years ago. We would definitely come back to this Hotel again.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice and clean hotel with good ambience. Value for money.
desc: hotel location is good, surrounded by famous Katong heritage, food, trail etc., supermarket and churches. Regular on- time shuttle service thru and fro Changi Airport. Hotel staff are friendly and helpful.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Check-in Hiccup but Comfortable Stay
desc: I stayed for 2 nights with my teenage son. The check-in was a little slow as we were told that the twin-bedded rooms were unavailable even though I had already paid beforehand and requested for twin-bedded room.
