They offered to put us in a double-bedded room and transfer us once a twin-bedded room was available the next day. We were pretty reluctant as it wasn't what we requested for. So they checked some more and after waiting for about 10-15 minutes, they finally informed us that there was indeed a twin-bedded room. The experience from then onwards was much more pleasant. The room was reasonably comfortable although there wasn't a whole lot of privacy for the bathroom as the door didn't close tightly/securely. The location of the hotel wasn't great in terms of being

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great hotel in great location
desc: I'm happy to say I've been staying at Katong Village for the past few weeks with work having stayed at Changi village in the past. This hotel is in a far better location with lots of nice restaurants and bars near by. During my last trip I was upgraded to an executive suite which was a pleasant surprise. With this upgrade I was able to visit the executive lounge where they served free food and drinks between the hours of 6-8pm. The staff here really go above and beyond when trying to make you comfortable. I will definitely be pushing my company to have me stay here again in the future.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent location, facilities and service
desc: We stayed at Village Katong hotel for 4 days. It was a pleasant surprise to see how well the facilities and services were maintained. The rooms were very spacious and clean. The hotel staff were very friendly and helpful. Special thanks to Shankar (housekeeping) for his professionalism and service. We will definitely will recommend Village Hotel Katong to our family and friends.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great hotel and good value for money
desc: Very friendly and service oriented staff at this hotel. Nice, clean and good location. Great value for money. This was our third visit in three years and we will be back at the Village Hotel Katong next year.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: No nice gesture
desc: Indicated it's our 3rd anniversary, but nothing been done to let us feel welcome, etc folded towel in a shape of heart, chocolates. I don't know, do I need ask for it? Staff Wendy was very friendly and helpful at the club lounge.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Club Room
desc: Value for money. Room was spacious and cleanliness was decent. Staffs at club room were professional and efficient, especially Wendy See, who serve us during evening cocktail. Will definitely stay here again

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Power shutdown
desc: I checked in the hotel on 3 Nov 2019, and was alerted during check-in that there will be power shutdown on 4 Nov 2019 at 12 mid-night, for 6 hours - no lights and air-cond. I raised my concern, and Mr Brandon Lim (Assistant Front Office Manager) has kindly arranged to transfer us to Village Hotel @ Changi on 4 Nov night. He is very helpful and efficient. He even made it a point to call us after we have checked in Changi hotel, to ensure that everything is ok. Thank you very much, Brandon!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent Stay
desc: We have stayed at this hotel in the Katong district on several occasions and can't fault the facilities and friendly staff. We occupied a Club Room and had access to the excellent Club Lounge for evening drinks and lovely food and would highly recommend this option. Special thanks to Wendy and Ravin for the excellent service and friendly conversation which made our stay so memorable.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Singapore star
desc: The facilitiea were great as was the locatiin, close enough to both the airport and city. Staff were very friendly and helpful. Room was beautiful, well appointed and decor was very tasteful. Hreat rainwater shower. We were a bit disappointed at limited.breakfast choices, but what was there was fresh and good. All in all geeat hotel

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Another great stay in Singapore
desc: We always stay in Katong when visiting Singapore as we used to live here as ex-pats years ago and know the area well. It suits us to get away from the "tourist" area however Katong is now getting well known for it's Peranakan heritage attractions and very popular. We chose the Village Hotel Katong this time,based on excellent reviews and were not disappointed. Normally we used to stay at another big hotel next door but a bit of nostalgia brought us back here again. The Village Hotel used to be called the Paramount Hotel which was where we first stayed at while we were being located in Singapore. The hotel has since been renovated and re decorated featuring a Peranakan theme with lovely Club rooms and decor. The standout feature of our 6 day stay was undoubtedly the staff.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent hotel
desc: Well appointed room and very friendly staff. I would definitely stay there again and recommend it to friends visiting Singapore. I stayed on the club floor which is good value for money with breakfast, evening snacks and drinks included. I would like to comment on how helpful Wendy was who worked in the club lounge who took the time to write down instructions for me to get to the Gardens by the Bay by bus and train, without which I would have been very lost!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Stay at Village Hotel Katong
desc: Great hotel and great experience! I enjoyed my stay very much and would recommend the hotel to other travelers always! It was a wonderful experience and I will definitely come back soon maybe around Chinese New Year 2020!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Experience
desc: It was overall a great experience, the food is great, the location is convenient but some staffs are still ignorant towards people of color, so you might want to keep that in mind. There is a supermarket just downstairs.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Awesome Location
desc: Had a great stay at Hotel Village Katong. The location is very central to everything, grocery store below, ATM's accessible, very close to all of the food and shopping and short trips to the city. The staff are very friendly and helpful, the hotel has a very warm and welcoming atmosphere upon arrival and also whilst staying, the staff can't do enough for you. Really enjoyed the hotel and will return in future - highly recommend.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Fabulous and Convenient
desc: Second stay at this property and still amazing. Large room, comfortable bed, clean and convenient. The staff were lovely and professional. Always helpful whenever I ask about something in the area. Close to eateries and bus transport. The shuttle from the hotel is another bonus. The area is lovely, away from the hustle and bustle of the city and also just a short walk to East Coast Park and beach. Everything exceeded my expectation. I will definitely stay at Village Hotel Katong whenever I am in Singapore.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Family Staycation
desc: Had 2 nights of great stay with my family. I enjoyed myself so does my family. Venue was excellent with lots of eateries around. Will be back soon! I would also like to praise Yu Feng for his great service and smile. Seen working from morning will late cleaning the room at level 9. He greeted me with a smile and short chat even though i can see he is tired. Overheard he was checking with another room which is staying more than 1 night on the need to top up any items in the room. Great service!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Great stay
desc: Friendly staff, clean rooms. Great service by staff, and I’ve got a late check out extension and free chocolates, and a free room upgrade as I was celebrating my bday. Really appreciate it. Love how convenient the hotel was as food and supermarket was located right below. Eateries and shopping malls within walking distance as well.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Very Good
desc: Even though there was serious emergency in the family, the hotel, upon our request gave us only four days to decide the next date of our arrival. It could have been much better if they could understand our emergency situation and as requested by us, kept our whole credit with them for our future use.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Deceived by total amount paid to hotel
desc: Deceived by total amount paid to hotel.location also was an issue.we had to take the cab to move around since metro and bus services were a bit far. plus point for this hotel is the staff.very friendly,professional and always ready to be at their best

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice hospitality hotel
desc: Check out this morning after stay for 3 weeks. Always come back to this hotel which has nice hospitality, nice neighborhood, near to the east coast park and to the airport. Thank you for Mr. Wei Kang taking care my room. Nice and honest person...thank you.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Services
desc: Excellent services from Brandon and Melvin. Feel warm when reached lobby. The room is big and clean for us. Thank you for the shuttle bus arrangement from airport. Will be back soon. Favourite hotel in Singapore.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Top Spot
desc: As an over-nighter in Singapore, Katong is wonderful. The hotel is brilliantly placed. Easy access to great food and away from the 'in yer face' tourism & shopping that is Singapore central. That's what we wanted and thats what we got. The Hotel provided other pre-requisites such as a good size room, great beds with cotton sheets and opening windows/sliding door.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Disappointing
desc: Very disappointed with this years experience at the Village Katong, we paid for the Paranakin Club room and found that the whole experience was lacking in just about everything we were told we would get. Breakfast was a very poor show at the club room and restaurant was even worse. We arrived first day a little later than usual and there was almost nothing left so we put it down to late arrival. The following day was even worse, with the food being hard and inedible, and coffee disgusting. We were at the hotel 2 years ago and found that this year it had gone down hill quite a bit

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Average
desc: Stayed 2 nights for work. I had a corner room which feels larger than usual Singaporean hotel room and the amenities were good. Room was clean and internet was strong throughout the building. Overall the hotel feels dated and while the staffs are quite courteous, there is nothing extraordinary about the hotel and I find the breakfast spread to be bland compared to other good hotels I've stayed in South East Asia. If you are a tourist, I'd suggest looking for somewhere else more central / closer to the city.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Average
desc: Of course they are not 5 star hotel and the price is in slightly affordable range when it comes to Singapore hotels but I wish the service they provide was bit nicer... The location is good if you want to explore the Katong area.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Village Hotel Katong
desc: We really like the hotel for its location, near to airport, nearby shopping and eating areas! We could try our favorite local fruit like durian and rambutan, try our favorite local hawker food Hainan chicken rice, teh tarik etc. The hotel is pretty new, very clean and model!

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Dr
desc: An absolutely wonderful/perfect experience at Katong Village Hotel Singapore Everybody and everything is out of this world. The staff is so very helpful and friendly. Everybody went out of their way to make us feel at home. Thank you so very much staff and management. You guys really are great.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: An excellent option in Singapore
desc: This hotel is not in the fancy downtown area, but rather a more traditional area called Katong, The hotel even urges guests to eat, view, and play "like a local." Has a great restaurant with a mix of local and western food, and waiters like Joey and Jack who will go out of their way to make sure that you get things such as gluten-free dishes and decaf coffee. The hotel building is connect to a 3-story mall, with a supermarket, laundry and dry cleaning store, 3 restaurants, and even a gluten-free bakery!! No business center, but a very nice pool. Free shuttle to airport.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Short stay
desc: Overall stay fantastic, close to restaurants and shops. Food was yummy although very pricey. Staff very friendly but not impressed with man at door, was quite rude when we arrived at hotel entrance, had been raining and so we were proceeding to put umbrellas in bags, he followed us and watching us like a hawk. Intimidating, we were not doing anything wrong

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Peranakan club room
desc: Quiet ambience, convenient supermarket below, love the design concept and big bathtub next to the bed, all the staff are friendly no.1 service, food was delicious, cozy bed, definately will come back again.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: Club room experience
desc: Was staying at peranakan club room and the room was spacious and nice. Like the lounge also. Not crowded and hassle free dining. Will surely stay again. The staff was also very friendly and courteous. Always greeting and smiling.

hotelname: Village Hotel Katong by Far East Hospitality
title: organising a 4 day event at the hotel
desc: We had an 4 day event at this hotel with our guest from around Asia. Most pleased with the hospitality and banquet team, catering to our needs with professionalism and friendliness. All of our guest were very happy with their stay. Well done!
